T02TD1915E:217b-1: tsa tur de ba ti pa ri primtstsha by'a khya nam au pa de sha booshata kan'a ma /
T02TD1915E:217b-3: lha mo bzhis yongs su zhus pa'i rnam par bshad pa man ngag rgyas pa zhes bya ba //
T02TD1915E:217b-4: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1915E:217b-5: 'dod chen bcom ldan dga' chen po //
T02TD1915E:217b-6: bde chen kun bdag chags chen po ;
T02TD1915E:217b-7: / mgon po rdo rje sems dpa' la //
T02TD1915E:217b-8: btud nas rnam bshad 'di bris so //
T02TD1915E:217b-9: rgyud don bla ma la thos pa //
T02TD1915E:217b-10: slob mas zhus bas 'di byas kyang //
T02TD1915E:217b-11: 'di la skyon yod bdag nyes te //
T02TD1915E:217b-12: mkhas pas slad nas dpyad du gsol //
T02TD1915E:217b-13: rgyud 'di ni thams cad gsang ba'i mchog ces bya ba stong phrag gcig bzhugs te ;
T02TD1915E:217b-14: de'i rgyud phye ma lha mo bzhis yongs su zhus pa 'di'o //
T02TD1915E:217b-15: 'di'i bshad pa la rtog pa sngon du byed pa'i shes rab la rjes su 'brang ba'i sems can dad pa la rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'i don du tshig dang don dang tshig dang don mtshams 'brel pa dang /
T02TD1915E:217b-16: dgos pa dang dogs pa'i yang dgos pa lnga yang gdon mi za bar brjod par bya'o //
T02TD1915E:217b-17: de la tshig ni gsum sde /
T02TD1915E:217b-21: de la gzhung tshig ni rgyud do //
T02TD1915E:217b-23: tshigs bcad ni tshig rkang bzhi'o //
T02TD1915E:217b-28: lhag pa byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bo bde ba chen po rdo rje sems dpa' la lha mo bzhis yongs su bskor ba ni bsdus pa'i don to //
T02TD1915E:217b-30: chos kyi dbyings kyi rim pa dang /
T02TD1915E:217b-31: chos kyi dbyings bsdu ba dang /
T02TD1915E:217b-32: chos kyi dbyings kyi don sgrub pa ni rgyas pa'i don to //
T02TD1915E:218a-1: gzhom pa la sogs pa ni khyad par gyi don to //
T02TD1915E:218a-2: tshig dang don mtshams 'brel pa ni bsdus pa'i don gzhung tshig dang 'brel zhing rgyas pa'i don le'u'i tshig dang 'bral la /
T02TD1915E:218a-3: khyad par gyi don tshigs bcad dang 'brel to //
T02TD1915E:218a-4: dgos pa ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i bde ba chen po'i ye shes mngon du bya ba shin tu sbyor bas skye bo rnams kyi log pa'i 'dod chags la sogs pa nyon mongs pa'i spyon can bcom nas yang dag pa'i 'dod chags la brten nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid thob pa'o //
T02TD1915E:218a-5: dgos pa'i yang dgos pa ni sangs rgyas zin nas kyang sems can gyi don byed pa'o //
T02TD1915E:218a-6: 'o na 'dod chags kho na srid pa na 'khor ba la 'jig rten pa las 'gal bar 'dod chags byang chub kyi rgyur byas nas 'di lta bu'i rgyud bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa ci'i phyir zhes smra na lan btab pa /
T02TD1915E:218a-7: 'dod chags la spyod pa'i sems can thams cad thabs gzhan gyis sangs rgyas nyid du mi 'gyur te /
T02TD1915E:218a-8: de bas na sems can gyi don du 'dod chags yang dag par spyod pa'i sgo nas byang chub ba bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa ste /
T02TD1915E:218a-10: 'dod chags zhes bya ba'i nyon mongs pa don dam par ni rang bzhin med cing mi dmigs pa'o zhes de ltar yang dbu ma las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:218a-11: gang ngam chags pa gang du'ang //
T02TD1915E:218a-12: chags pa gang gis sam chags pa //
T02TD1915E:218a-13: chos de dag ni mi dmigs te //
T02TD1915E:218a-14: dmigs su med pa'i chags pa ni skyon med ces so //
T02TD1915E:218a-15: yang mnyam sbyor las kyang gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:218a-16: chags med chags pa dang bral min //
T02TD1915E:218a-17: dbu mar yang ni mi dmigs te //
T02TD1915E:218a-18: bud med thams cad sgyu ma'i rgyu //
T02TD1915E:218a-19: gnyis su med pa'i theg ba'i mchog / ces pa'o //
T02TD1915E:218a-20: de bas na de kho na bzhin du zhe sdang spyod pa'i sems can rnams la yang phan pa'i don du thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang sdang ba'i tshul khro bo'i rgyud bstan pa'o //
T02TD1915E:218a-21: de ltar yang dag pa'i chos las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:218a-22: snod mi rung ba'i bu rnams la //
T02TD1915E:218a-23: de rnams snod rung mdzad bzhed pas //
T02TD1915E:218a-24: thugs rje khro rgyud bstan pa ste //
T02TD1915E:218a-25: sdang ba nor 'dod ma yin no //
T02TD1915E:218b-0: yang mnyam sbyor las kyang gsungs @218b par shin tu sdang zhing gtum pa la /
T02TD1915E:218b-1: zhi ba nyid ni mi 'byor te //
T02TD1915E:218b-2: sdang ba thabs dang shes rab dngos //
T02TD1915E:218b-3: de bzhin gshegs ba kun gyis mdzad //
T02TD1915E:218b-5: de ltar gti mug can gyi sems can rnams la yang gti mug gi dbang gis bdag dang bdag gis 'dzin pa la sogs ba'i phyin ci log gi lta ba gzhom pa'i don du nyan thos kyi theg pa la gang zag la bdag mod pa'i don bstan pa dang /
T02TD1915E:218b-6: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la chos la bdag med pa'i don bstan pa dang /
T02TD1915E:218b-7: bla ma dang bcas pa'i sangs rgyas la chos thams cad bdag med par bstan pa dang /
T02TD1915E:218b-8: rdo rje'i theg pa la ma rig pa gzhom pa'i don du /
T02TD1915E:218b-9: shes rab kyi 'khor lo bsgom pa la sogs pa zhi ba'i pho gzugs kyi lha bsgom pa la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan to //
T02TD1915E:218b-10: de ltar yang thams cad gsang chen rgyud las gsungs pa //
T02TD1915E:218b-11: chos bdag med pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1915E:218b-12: bcom nas rang nyad 'jigs byas te //
T02TD1915E:218b-13: rang sems kho na sangs rgyas nyid //
T02TD1915E:218b-14: rang sems kho na shes par bya //
T02TD1915E:218b-16: de ltar ye shes zhabs kyis kyang gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:218b-17: yang dag byang chub sems bskyed nas //
T02TD1915E:218b-18: byams pa chen por rab 'byor te //
T02TD1915E:218b-19: chos thams cad la bdag med par //
T02TD1915E:218b-20: de ltar shes na rnam par grol //
T02TD1915E:218b-24: gti mug can gyi sems can rnams la du ma'i thabs kyis sems can gyi don byed pa la 'gal ba med do //
T02TD1915E:218b-25: de ltar yang bkra shis sgrub pa las gsungs pa //
T02TD1915E:218b-26: gang dang gang gis bcings 'gyur ba'i //
T02TD1915E:218b-27: skye bo drag po'i las rnams kyi //
T02TD1915E:218b-28: thabs dang bcas na de nyid kyis //
T02TD1915E:218b-29: srid pa'i bcing ba las grol lo //
T02TD1915E:218b-31: de ltar yang de nyid bsdus pa'i rgyud las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:218b-33: sems can rang bzhin du ni 'gro //
T02TD1915E:218b-34: de lta de ltar sems can don //
T02TD1915E:218b-35: 'dod chags la sogs dag bas bya //
T02TD1915E:218b-37: de lta bas na rnal 'byor ma'i de kho na nyid kyi rgyud 'di yang 'dod chags can la phan 'dogs pa'i don du bstan to //
T02TD1915E:218b-38: de nas dang la sdud pa po rnams kyi rgyud dag par bya ba'i don du phun sum tshogs pa bris pa //
T02TD1915E:218b-39: lha mo bzhi dang mnyam ldan zhing //
T02TD1915E:219a-2: shin tu dga' ba'i sbyor chen la //
T02TD1915E:219a-3: rdo rje sems dpa' cher bzhugs te //
T02TD1915E:219a-5: de la lha mo bzhi zhes pa ni /
T02TD1915E:219a-6: sdud pa po phun sum tshogs pa ste /
T02TD1915E:219a-7: 'og nas spyan ma la sogs pa bzhis zhus pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:219a-8: lha mo zhes pa ni rang gi 'od la longs spyod pa dang /
T02TD1915E:219a-9: lha'i ris su gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:219a-10: lha mo yang de bzhi yang de nyid pas lha mo bzhi zhes pa ni gsum dang lnga'i grangs sun phyung ba ste rang bzhin tshad med pa bzhi dang 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:219a-11: lha mo de dag gis yongs su bskor ba ni de dag mnyam ldan zhes pa ste /
T02TD1915E:219a-12: lha mo de bzhis yang dag par ldan pa'i phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD1915E:219a-14: dbus kyi gtso bo ni rdo rje sems dpa' yab yum bzhugs pa las me mtshams na spyan ma dang /
T02TD1915E:219a-15: bden bral gyi mtshams na m'a ma k'i dang /
T02TD1915E:219a-16: rlung gi mtshams nan bza' dkar mo dang /
T02TD1915E:219a-17: dbang ldan gyi mtshams na sgrol ma bzhi'i sku ste phyag rgya bzhis bskor nas bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD1915E:219a-18: de ltar yang gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud phyi ma las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:219a-19: spros nas phyag rgya bzhi dag ni //
T02TD1915E:219a-20: dkyil 'khor de la bskor bar brtag / bdag nyid dbus su gnas byas te //
T02TD1915E:219a-21: 'khor lo thams cad bsdu bar bya //
T02TD1915E:219a-23: yang na lha mo bzhi dang mnyam ldan zhes pa ni gsang ba'i bsnyen sgrub yan lag bzhi'i sgo nas thabs dang shes rab rol pa la rdo rje sems dpa' lha mo bzhi dang ldan te /
T02TD1915E:219a-25: nye bar sgrub pa la m'a ma k'i //
T02TD1915E:219a-26: sgrub pa lan bza' dkar mo //
T02TD1915E:219a-27: sgrub pa chen po la sgrol ma rang gi rig ma la sgom pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:219a-28: gsang ba'i bsnyen sgrub bzhi ni 'di lta ste /
T02TD1915E:219a-29: thabs dang shes rab sku sbyor ba ni bsnyen pa'o //
T02TD1915E:219a-30: gsang ba'i rdo rje dang padmar sbyor ba ni nye ba'i bsnyen pa'o //
T02TD1915E:219a-31: bskul zhing sngags bzla ba ni sgrub pa'o //
T02TD1915E:219a-32: bde ba chen po ni sgrub pa chen po'o //
T02TD1915E:219a-33: de ltar yang gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud phyi ma las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:219a-34: bsgrub bya sgrub par sbyor ba gang //
T02TD1915E:219a-35: de ni bsnyen pa zhes su gsungs //
T02TD1915E:219a-36: rdo rje padmo mnyam sbyor ba //
T02TD1915E:219a-37: nye bar bsnyen pa zhes bya ste //
T02TD1915E:219a-38: h'um phat tshul dang ldan pa ru //
T02TD1915E:219a-39: bskyod pa sgrub par gsungs pa'o //
T02TD1915E:219b-0: rang @219b bzhin rang bde zhi ba ni //
T02TD1915E:219b-1: sgrub ba chen po zhes bya'o //
T02TD1915E:219b-3: zhing zhes ba ni gzhan gyi don la bsnyegs pa ste //
T02TD1915E:219b-4: lha mo bzhi kho na dang ldan pa ma yin te /
T02TD1915E:219b-5: lus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams dang yang ldan pa'i don ston pa'o //
T02TD1915E:219b-6: 'khor phun sum tshogs pa bstan pa //
T02TD1915E:219b-7: sangs rgyas gzugs kyis nyer brgyan pa //
T02TD1915E:219b-9: de la sangs rgyas zhes pa ni bla na med pa yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rigs lnga dang /
T02TD1915E:219b-11: lcags kyu ma la sogs pa bzhi dang /
T02TD1915E:219b-12: spos me ma la sogs pa bzhi dang /
T02TD1915E:219b-13: sgeg mo la sogs ba bzhi dang /
T02TD1915E:219b-14: byang chub sems dpa' brgyad de /
T02TD1915E:219b-15: padma bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad thugs su chud nas ma lus par byang chub pa la blo rgyas pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:219b-16: de dag gi sku phyag rgya ni sangs rgyas gzugs zhes so //
T02TD1915E:219b-17: sangs rgyas kyi gzugs des rdo rje sems dpa'i phung po lnga dang /
T02TD1915E:219b-19: rnam par shes pa brgyad dang /
T02TD1915E:219b-20: yab yum gyi bdud rtsi la sogs pa'i rigs lnga la sogs par nye bar sbyor ba dang ldan pas na /
T02TD1915E:219b-21: sangs rgyas gzugs kyis nyer brgyan pa //
T02TD1915E:219b-23: yang na sku gsung thugs dang ldan zhing spro ba dang bsdu ba mdzad pas sangs rgyas gzugs kyis nyer brgya na ba zhes so //
T02TD1915E:219b-24: gnas phun sum tshogs pa bstan pa /
T02TD1915E:219b-25: shin tu dga' ba'i sbyor chen la //
T02TD1915E:219b-27: de la shin tu dga' ba'i zhes pa ni khyad par skyon med cing rtag par kun du khyab pa'i sems can gyi don la chags ba'o rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sku'i gsang ba'o //
T02TD1915E:219b-28: de ltar yang mnyam sbyor gyi rgyud phyi ma las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:219b-29: skyon med rtag pa gtan du ni //
T02TD1915E:219b-30: thams cad 'dod chags rjes chags pas //
T02TD1915E:219b-31: de nyid gsang ba bcom ldan 'das //
T02TD1915E:219b-32: 'dod chags chen po dga' ba che //
T02TD1915E:219b-34: yang na shin tu dga' ba'i zhes pa ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo bde ba chen po'o //
T02TD1915E:219b-35: de gnyis mngon du bya ba'i don du thabs dang shes rab mnyam par sbyor ba ni sbyor chen zhes pa ste //
T02TD1915E:219b-36: sems can gyi don chen po mdzad pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:219b-37: la zhes pa ni gnas de la zhes pa'i don to //
T02TD1915E:219b-38: ston pa phun sum tshogs pa bstan pa /
T02TD1915E:220a-0: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes pa ste de yang dam tshig sems dpa'i sgo nas ni rigs lta'i @220a * //
T02TD1915E:220a-1: bdag nyid ye shes lnga'i ngo bo nyid do //
T02TD1915E:220a-3: stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin rdo rje steng 'og gi rtse lnga ni rigs lnga dang ye shes lnga'i don bsam pa bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:220a-4: de ltar yang gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud phyi ma las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:220a-5: rgyud lnga dang ni 'bras dag ni ;
T02TD1915E:220a-6: / rdo rje zhes su bstan pa yin //
T02TD1915E:220a-9: rdo ni me long lta bu'i ye shes dang rnam par snang mdzad /
T02TD1915E:220a-10: rje ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang rin chen 'byung ldan /
T02TD1915E:220a-11: se ni so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes dang snang ba mtha' yas /
T02TD1915E:220a-12: ma ni bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes dang don yod grub pa /
T02TD1915E:220a-13: sa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes dang mi bskyod pa //
T02TD1915E:220a-14: de dag dang ldan pa'i don ni dpa' ba'o //
T02TD1915E:220a-15: yang na rdo rje sems dpa' zhes pa ni ye shes sems dpa'i gnas skabs su mchog gi byang chub ye shes las byung ba'o //
T02TD1915E:220a-16: de ltar yang thams cad gsang ba'i rgyud las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:220a-17: mchog gi byang chub dngos ye shes //
T02TD1915E:220a-18: de ni rdo rjer der gsungs te //
T02TD1915E:220a-19: rdo rje ye shes las byung ba //
T02TD1915E:220a-20: de ni rdo rje sems dpar gsungs //
T02TD1915E:220a-22: dus phun sum tshogs pa mtshon pa ni cher bzhugs te zhes pa ste /
T02TD1915E:220a-23: rdo rje sems dpa' sbyor ba chen po la bzhugs pa'i dus su rgyud 'di bstan pa yin no zhes pa'i don to //
T02TD1915E:220a-24: de la cher zhes pa ni thabs dang shes rab rol pa rnam pa sna tshogs rnam pa gcig tu bskal pa gzhan dang gzhan gyi mtha' med par bde ba chen po'i longs spyod la bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD1915E:220a-25: bzhugs so zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po'i ngo bo byang chub sems kyi thig ler yum gyi gsang ba'i padmar gnas pa'o //
T02TD1915E:220a-26: de lta bas na rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis kyang lha dang sbyor ba mngon du byed 'dod na 'di la goms par bya'o //
T02TD1915E:220a-27: da ni re zhig bcom ldan 'das kyis sku'i sgo nas chos bstan pa 'od zer 'chang zhing zhes pa la sogs pa ste ;
T02TD1915E:220a-28: de la 'od zer zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo kha dog lnga dang ldan pa'i don to //
T02TD1915E:220a-29: 'chang zhing zhes pa ni 'od zer gyis chos kyi 'byung gnas la chags pa'o //
T02TD1915E:220a-30: 'khrigs pa'i zhes pa ni snga ma bsdu ba dang phyi ma bsnol ba'o //
T02TD1915E:220b-0: gsang chen zhes pa ni bde chen po'i rnam par mi @220b rtog pa'i ye shes te theg pa 'og ma dang thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:220b-1: yon tan de dag dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'byung gnas ni /
T02TD1915E:220b-3: gsang chen chos kyi 'byung gnas zhes ba ste gsang ba ni gsang ba'i padma'o //
T02TD1915E:220b-4: de la chos zhes pa ni phung bo dang khams dang skye mched la sogs pa'i 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtshan nyid de /
T02TD1915E:220b-5: mtshan nyid 'dzin pas chos zhes bya //
T02TD1915E:220b-7: de dag gi skye gnas ni chos kyi 'byung gnas zhes so //
T02TD1915E:220b-8: 'di lta ste chos kyi 'byung gnas ae gru gsum ni sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin yin pa dang ;
T02TD1915E:220b-9: chos thams cad sku gsung thugs kho na 'phros pa yin no //
T02TD1915E:220b-10: de ltar yang gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud phyi ma las gsungs pa //
T02TD1915E:220b-11: sku gsung thugs kyi bye brag gis //
T02TD1915E:220b-12: gru gsum la ni rnam par bsgom //
T02TD1915E:220b-14: yang de kho las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:220b-15: sems can thams cad 'byung ba ni //
T02TD1915E:220b-16: dus gsum rdo rje'i ngo bo nyid //
T02TD1915E:220b-18: la zhas pa ni 'phros pa'i gnas mtshon pa'o //
T02TD1915E:220b-19: byang chub sems zhes pa ni gsang ba'i rdo rje dang padma'i sbyor ba las byung ba brjod kyis mi lang ba'i bde ba chen po'i ngo bo lhag ba'i byang chub kyi sems te //
T02TD1915E:220b-20: don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems thob pa'i rgyur gyur pa'o //
T02TD1915E:220b-21: de ltar yang zla gsang thig le'i rgyud las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:220b-22: byang yig rdo rje zhes gsungs te //
T02TD1915E:220b-23: yi ge chub ni gzungs ma'i tshig / sems yig bzhu ba gsungs pa te //
T02TD1915E:220b-24: yi ge dpa' ni bde ba che //
T02TD1915E:220b-26: 'phros nas su zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po thig le'i gzugs sems can gyi bdag nyid ye shes lnga'i ngo bo lhag pa'i byang chub sems su gyur nas gsang ba'i rdo rje nas gsang ba'i padma la phab pa'o //
T02TD1915E:220b-27: chos kyi dbyings zhes pa la chos zhes pa ni bshad zin to //
T02TD1915E:220b-29: don ni 'di lta ste chos thams cad kyi sa bon phra mo'i yig 'bru yi ge ksh'um gi ngo bor bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD1915E:220b-30: yi ge 'bru de zhu mdzad do //
T02TD1915E:220b-33: da ni gsung gi sgo nas chos bstan pa thos par 'dod nas lha mo spyan mas chos kyi dbyings 'phro ba'i don zhus pa //
T02TD1915E:220b-34: zhu ba'i dngos po de mthong nas //
T02TD1915E:220b-35: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1915E:221a-1: po zhes pa ni bshad zin to //
T02TD1915E:221a-2: de mthong nas zhes pa ni sku'i sgo nas chos ston pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' de mthong nas lha mo spyan mas yongs su zhus pa zhes te /
T02TD1915E:221a-3: de la lha mo ni bshad zin to //
T02TD1915E:221a-4: lha mo yang de spyan ma yang de bas na lha mo spyan ma zhes te /
T02TD1915E:221a-5: spyan dang 'dra ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i bdag mo yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:221a-6: yongs shes pa ni don ma lus pa'o //
T02TD1915E:221a-7: zhus pa zhes nga ni rang gi stan las langs pa dang bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar ba dang /
T02TD1915E:221a-8: lan gsum bskor nas phyag byas pa dang /
T02TD1915E:221a-9: pus mos la btsugs te thal mo sbyar ba rnams zhu ba'i tshul lngas gsol ba btab pa'o //
T02TD1915E:221a-11: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la zhes te /
T02TD1915E:221a-12: ston pa po la zhus pa'i tha tshig go //
T02TD1915E:221a-13: yig 'bru 'joms pa ni bcom ldan 'das yang ste /
T02TD1915E:221a-14: rdo rje sems dpa' yang de yin pas bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02TD1915E:221a-15: de la bcom ldan zhes pa ni theg pa bzhi'i bye brag gis bshad de /
T02TD1915E:221a-16: rdo rje'i theg pa la theg pa 'og ma'i don bcug kyang mi 'gal te /
T02TD1915E:221a-17: rdo rje sems dpa' theg pa kun las sangs rgyas pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:221a-18: de ltar yang sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor gyi rgyud las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:221a-19: sems dang sems dpa'i ting 'dzin dang //
T02TD1915E:221a-20: byang chub spyod pa sna tshogs nyid //
T02TD1915E:221a-21: bdud dang de bzhin bdud las rgyal //
T02TD1915E:221a-22: byang chub sangs rgyas der 'gyur ro //
T02TD1915E:221a-24: yang mnyam sbyor gyi rgyud phyi ma las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:221a-25: dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog / dbang phyug la sogs lhag pa'i lha //
T02TD1915E:221a-26: rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin pa che //
T02TD1915E:221a-27: yig 'bru dam pa mchog tu dga' //
T02TD1915E:221a-30: nyan thos kyi theg pa bcom ldan zhes pa ni nyon mongs pa dang /
T02TD1915E:221a-33: lha'i bu'i bdud bzhi bcom zhing zad pa dang mi skye ba'i ye shes dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD1915E:221a-34: de ltar yang mdo las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:221a-35: nyon mongs las dang skye ba dang //
T02TD1915E:221a-36: nyon mongs shes bya'i sgrib de bzhin //
T02TD1915E:221a-37: rnam par smin chos gang de ni //
T02TD1915E:221a-38: bcom pas des na bcom ldan 'dod //
T02TD1915E:221b-0: bcom pa'i rim pa ni 'di lta ste byang chub kyi shing drung du rdo rje'i gdan mnan pa'i dus su srod kyi dus dang po la 'dod pa'i zag pa zad bas lha'i bu'i bdud @221b bcom /
T02TD1915E:221b-1: nam phyed kyi dus gnyis pa la lha'i spyan phye bas 'jig rten thams cad gzigs te tho rangs kyi dus gsum pa la ma rig pa'i zag pa zad pas nyon mongs pa'i bdud bcom /
T02TD1915E:221b-2: rtsva mchog gi grong khyer du yon bdag bram ze mo dze t'a'i don du zla ba gsum srog gi 'du byed byin gyis brlabs te srid pa'i zag pa zad pas shi ba'i bdud bcom mo //
T02TD1915E:221b-3: de'i 'og tu mya ngan las 'das pa'i dus mkhyen nas rang gi tshe'i 'du byed btang ste lta ba'i zag pa zad pas phung po'i bdud bcom mo //
T02TD1915E:221b-4: de gnyis gzhom pa ni kha cig chu bo ni ranydza n'a'i 'gam na til phyed kyi zas la brten nas lo drug gi bar du dka' thub mdzad pa'i dus su 'chi ba'i bdud dang /
T02TD1915E:221b-5: phung po'i bdud bcom zhes zer na de yang bden te /
T02TD1915E:221b-6: der bcom par gyur na yang 'dir bcom pa'i don mngon du bstan pa'o //
T02TD1915E:221b-7: de bas na lang kar gshegs pa'i nang na rtsa mchog gi grong khyer du shi ba'i bdud dang phung po'i bdud bcom zhes bstan to //
T02TD1915E:221b-8: byang chub sems dba'i theg pa chan po la bcom ldan zhes pa ni dbul po dang /
T02TD1915E:221b-13: ma rig pa go rims su pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis bcom ste /
T02TD1915E:221b-19: ye shes rnams dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:221b-21: dbang phyug dang ni mchog dang ni //
T02TD1915E:221b-22: gzugs bzang dang ni grags dang dpal //
T02TD1915E:221b-23: ye shes nan tan thos pa drug / bcom ldan zhes bya 'dod pa'o //
T02TD1915E:221b-24: rdo rje'i theg pa la bcom ldan zhes pa ni sems tsam gyi lta ba la kun gzhi dang nyon mongs pa'i yid dang /
T02TD1915E:221b-25: rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par shes pa dang /
T02TD1915E:221b-26: sgo lnga'i rnam par shes pa bcom zhing me long dang /
T02TD1915E:221b-31: rdo rje lta bu'i ye shes drug dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:221b-32: dbu ma'i gnas skabs su gnyis su med pa'i shes rab kyis nyon mongs pa thams cad bcom zhing rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD1915E:221b-34: nyon mongs shes rab kyis bcom nas //
T02TD1915E:222a-3: de lta bu'i khyad par can rdo rje sems dpa' la zhes pa ste bshad zin to //
T02TD1915E:222a-4: tshig 'di dag ni zhes pa ni /
T02TD1915E:222a-5: chos kyi dbyings rnams 'phro ba ni //
T02TD1915E:222a-7: bdag gi the tshom lhas bka' stsal //
T02TD1915E:222a-8: zhes bya ba'i bar gyi tshig la mtshon pa'o //
T02TD1915E:222a-9: chos kyi dbyings rnams 'phro ba ni //
T02TD1915E:222a-10: gang las skye bar 'gyur ba lags //
T02TD1915E:222a-11: zhes pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi khungs zhus pa ste yig 'bru ni bshad zin to //
T02TD1915E:222a-12: dang po ji ltar 'ong ba yin //
T02TD1915E:222a-13: zhes pa ni chos kyi dbyings 'phro ba'i lam zhus pa'o //
T02TD1915E:222a-14: de bzhin phyir 'gro ji ltar lags //
T02TD1915E:222a-15: zhes pa ni chos kyi dbyings 'phro ba'i gnas zhus pa'o //
T02TD1915E:222a-16: yan lag med pa gang de ni //
T02TD1915E:222a-17: zhes pa ni chos kyi dbyings spyi'i mtshan nyid kyi sgo nas zhus pa'o //
T02TD1915E:222a-18: yan lag dang bcas gyur nas su //
T02TD1915E:222a-19: lus dngos 'gyur ba ji ltar lags //
T02TD1915E:222a-20: zhes pa ni rang gi mtshan nyid rags pa'i don zhus pa'o //
T02TD1915E:222a-21: lus de'i nyid lag skye mched dang dbang po'i don zhus pa'o //
T02TD1915E:222a-22: mig dang rna ba sna dang ni //
T02TD1915E:222a-23: de bzhin lce dang lus dang yid //
T02TD1915E:222a-24: dbang po zhes pa ste de la mig ces pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rten nang gi gzugs dang ba go snyod kyi me tog 'dra ba gang de mig gi dbang po'o //
T02TD1915E:222a-25: rna ba zhas pa ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rten nang gi gzugs dang gro ga gcus te bcad pa 'dra ba gang nge rna ba'i dbang po'o //
T02TD1915E:222a-26: sna dang ni zhes pa ni sna'i rnam par shes pa'i rten nang gi gzugs dang ba zangs kyi mo khab gshibs pa 'dra ba gang de sna'i dbang po'o //
T02TD1915E:222a-27: de bzhin lce dang zhes pa ni lce'i rnam par shes pa'i rten nang gi gzugs dang lce'i dkyil na zla ba kham pa 'dra ba gang de lce'i dbang po'o //
T02TD1915E:222a-28: lus dang zhes pa ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i rten nang gi gzugs dang ba bya reg 'jam gyi pags pa 'dra ba gang de lus kyi dbang po'o //
T02TD1915E:222a-29: yid ces pa ni mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa drug 'das pa'o ;
T02TD1915E:222a-30: / de ltar yang chos mngon pa las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:222a-31: drug po 'das ma thag pa yi //
T02TD1915E:222a-32: rnam shes gang yin de yid do //
T02TD1915E:222a-34: dbang po zhes pa ni mig la sogs pa lngas bzhi la dbang byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:222a-36: bdag mdzes par bya ba dang /
T02TD1915E:222b-0: rang rang gi @222b rnam par shes pa skyed pa dang /
T02TD1915E:222b-1: rang rang gi spyod yul la spyod pa bzhi'o //
T02TD1915E:222b-2: de ltar yang chos mngon pa mdzod las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:222b-3: dbang po lngas ni don bzhi la dbang byed ces so //
T02TD1915E:222b-4: yid ni gnyis la dbang byed de //
T02TD1915E:222b-5: srid pa gzhan la 'brel pa dang //
T02TD1915E:222b-6: dngos la 'jug pa la dbang byed pa'o //
T02TD1915E:222b-7: yang phung po dang khams kyi sgo nas zhus pa phung po'i dngos rnams dang /
T02TD1915E:222b-8: khams rnams su ni 'jug pa yang //
T02TD1915E:222b-10: de la phung po zhes pa ni 'dus pa'i don te /
T02TD1915E:222b-11: gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po lnga'o //
T02TD1915E:222b-13: de la gzugs kyi phung po ni dbang po lnga dang yul lnga ste bcu'o //
T02TD1915E:222b-14: de yang dus gsum gyi gzugs bzang ngan dang che phra gcig tu 'dus pa'o //
T02TD1915E:222b-15: gzhan bye brag tu smra ba na re /
T02TD1915E:222b-16: rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i gzugs dang bcu gcig 'dod do //
T02TD1915E:222b-17: tshor ba'i phung po ni myong ba'i mtshan nyid de bde ba dang /
T02TD1915E:222b-20: sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa mig gi 'dus te reg pa la sogs pa drug gsum bco brgyad 'dus pa'o //
T02TD1915E:222b-21: 'du shes kyi phung po ni mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid de /
T02TD1915E:222b-22: dkar po zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD1915E:222b-23: nag po zhas bya ba dang /
T02TD1915E:222b-24: bzang po zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD1915E:222b-25: ngan pa zhas bya ba dang /
T02TD1915E:222b-26: ring po zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD1915E:222b-27: thung du zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'dus pa'o //
T02TD1915E:222b-28: gzhan mdo sde pa na re /
T02TD1915E:222b-29: de yang gong ma bzhin du mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i 'du shes la sogs pa bco brgyad la 'du shes zhes zer ro //
T02TD1915E:222b-30: 'du byed ni phung po bzhi la ma gtogs pa'i 'du byed kyi chos kun te sems las byung ba'i chos can bzhi kas 'dus byas pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:222b-32: sems las byung ba'i chos la sogs pa 'du byed lnga bcu rtsa gcig go //
T02TD1915E:222b-33: rnam par shes pa'i phung po ni yul tha dad pa so sor shes pa'i mtshan nyid de /
T02TD1915E:222b-34: mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes ba drug dang yid dang bdun 'dus pa'o //
T02TD1915E:222b-35: de yang sems tsam pa na re /
T02TD1915E:222b-36: gong ma bdun dang kun gzhi rnam par shes pa dang brgyad 'dus pa la 'dod do //
T02TD1915E:222b-37: de bzhin du dbu ma pa na re /
T02TD1915E:222b-38: rnam par shes pa drug 'dus pa la 'dod de /
T02TD1915E:222b-39: de dag gi khungs ni bstan bcos la gsal bas ma bris so //
T02TD1915E:223a-0: dngos rnams dang zhas pa ni @223a * //
T02TD1915E:223a-2: khams rnams su ni 'jug pa yang //
T02TD1915E:223a-3: zhes pa ni de la khams ni rigs kyi don te /
T02TD1915E:223a-4: chos kun gyi 'byung khungs yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:223a-5: khams de rnams kyi sgras ni grangs bco brgyad 'dren pa'o //
T02TD1915E:223a-7: mig gi dbang po'i khams dang /
T02TD1915E:223a-8: rna ba'i dbang po'i khams dang /
T02TD1915E:223a-11: lus kyi dbang po'i khams dang /
T02TD1915E:223a-12: yid kyi dbang po'i khams dang /
T02TD1915E:223a-19: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /
T02TD1915E:223a-20: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /
T02TD1915E:223a-21: sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /
T02TD1915E:223a-22: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /
T02TD1915E:223a-23: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /
T02TD1915E:223a-24: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams rnams so //
T02TD1915E:223a-25: 'jug pa'ang zhes pa ni chos kyi dbyings de dag gi rnam pa la khyab cing 'jug pa ji ltar lags zhes zhus pa'i tha tshig go //
T02TD1915E:223a-26: 'ang zhes pa ni zhus pa'i rnam grangs bsnyag pa'o //
T02TD1915E:223a-27: nyon mongs pa'i sgo nas zhus pa /
T02TD1915E:223a-28: ma rig bag chags sred pa yis //
T02TD1915E:223a-29: bcings pa'i nyon mongs 'dod chags sogs //
T02TD1915E:223a-31: de la ma rig ces pa ni tshe snga ma'i 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa ste yang dag pa'i don mthong ba'i sgrib pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:223a-32: bag chags zhes pa ni 'du byed de tshe snga ma'i dge sdig gi las bag la nyal bas tshe 'di'i rnam par shes pa la 'debs pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:223a-33: srid pa yis zhes pa ni 'dod chags la chags pa ste tshe phyi ma byed pa'o //
T02TD1915E:223a-34: de bas na bcings pa zhes pa ste tshe snga ma'i ma rig pa dang /
T02TD1915E:223a-35: 'du byed kyis tshe 'di la grol bar mi byed pa dang /
T02TD1915E:223a-36: tshe 'di'i sred pas tshe phyi ma'i srid pa las mi grol bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:223a-37: bcings pa'i dngos po nyon mongs pa gang zhe na /
T02TD1915E:223a-38: dngos po de bstan pa nyon mongs 'dod chags sogs zhes te de la nyon mongs zhes pa ni mnar med pa'i dmyal ba nas srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar gyi sems can gyi sems sdug bsngal gyi sa bon yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:223a-39: de ltar yang chos mngon pa mdzod las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:223b-0: 'dir ni @223b nyon mongs sa bon yin //
T02TD1915E:223b-1: klu bzhin rtsva bzhin ljon shing bzhin //
T02TD1915E:223b-2: de bzhin shun pa bzhin du 'dod //
T02TD1915E:223b-4: nyon mongs pa yang de 'dod chags kyang de bas na /
T02TD1915E:223b-5: nyon mongs 'dod chags sogs zhes pa ste /
T02TD1915E:223b-6: de yang de la 'dod chags zhes pa ni zhen pa'i mtshan nyid de /
T02TD1915E:223b-7: de yang 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang sred pa'i 'dod chags so //
T02TD1915E:223b-8: sogs pa'i sgras ni zhe sdang dang gti mug la bzung ste /
T02TD1915E:223b-9: de la zhe sdang ni gzhan la gnod par sems pa'o //
T02TD1915E:223b-10: gti mug ni dge ba dang mi dge ba la khyad par du mi shes pa'o //
T02TD1915E:223b-11: de dag bcing ba gsum yin te /
T02TD1915E:223b-12: tshor ba gsum gyi rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:223b-13: 'di lta ste 'dod chags ni bde ba chor ba'i mtshan nyid do //
T02TD1915E:223b-14: zhe sdang ni sdug bsngal ba tshor ba'i mtshan nyid do //
T02TD1915E:223b-15: gti mug ni bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa tshor ba'i mtshan nyid do //
T02TD1915E:223b-16: de ltar yang chos mngon pa mdzod las kyang gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:223b-17: tshor ba'i dbang gis 'ching ba gsum //
T02TD1915E:223b-19: nyon mongs pa des bcing ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /
T02TD1915E:223b-20: khams gsum du gyur pa dang bsdu ba'i don zhus pa /
T02TD1915E:223b-21: rnam par shes pa sna tshogs pa //
T02TD1915E:223b-22: ji ltar dngos su 'dus pa lags //
T02TD1915E:223b-24: de la rnam par shes pa zhes pa ni sems tsam la 'dod de /
T02TD1915E:223b-25: de ltar yang rab tu byed pa nyi shu pa las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:223b-26: sems dang yid dang rnam par shes //
T02TD1915E:223b-27: rnam par rig pa zhes rnam grangs //
T02TD1915E:223b-29: sna tshogs pa zhes pa ni rnam par shes pa de khams gsum gyi snod dang bcud de dngos su gyur pa'o //
T02TD1915E:223b-30: ji ltar dngos su 'dus pa lags //
T02TD1915E:223b-31: zhes pa ni 'jig pa'i bskal ba la khams gsum de yang rnam par shes pa tsam du ji ltar 'dus pa lags zhes zhus pa'i tha tshig go //
T02TD1915E:223b-33: dngos po med pa bsgom pa'i gzugs //
T02TD1915E:223b-34: zhas pa ste de la don 'di yod ma thag byed pa ni dngos po zhes so //
T02TD1915E:223b-35: de yang don dam par dpyad na mi rung ba ni dngos po med ces pa ste /
T02TD1915E:223b-36: gzung 'dzin kun brtags kyi phyir dang /
T02TD1915E:223b-37: yod pa dang med pa mi skye ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:223b-38: de ltar dngos po dngos med la sku phyag rgyal sogs pa khyad par du bsgom pa'i gzugs zhes pa ste bsam pa'o //
T02TD1915E:224a-1: gong du 'phro 'du gzugs la sogs pa'i skye mched kyi sgo nas zhus pa /
T02TD1915E:224a-2: gzugs sogs spyod yul mtshan nyid rnams //
T02TD1915E:224a-3: zhes pa ste de la gzugs sogs zhes pa ni gzugs kyi skye mched nas chos kyi bar du drug ste /
T02TD1915E:224a-4: de la yang gzugs ni nyi shu ste /
T02TD1915E:224a-16: phya le ba ma yin pa dang /
T02TD1915E:224a-25: sgra yi skye mched ni brgyad de /
T02TD1915E:224a-26: zin pa'i 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i rgyun can dang /
T02TD1915E:224a-27: ma zin pa'i 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i rgyun can dang /
T02TD1915E:224a-28: sems can dang sems can ma yin par ston pa bzhi phrag gnyis yid du 'ong ba dang yid du mi 'ong bas te brgyad do //
T02TD1915E:224a-29: dri'i skye mched ni bzhi ste /
T02TD1915E:224a-34: ro'i skye mched ni drug ste /
T02TD1915E:224a-41: rig bya'i skye mched ni bcu gcig ste /
T02TD1915E:224a-50: chos kyi skye mched ni bdun te /
T02TD1915E:224a-54: rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dang /
T02TD1915E:224a-55: so sor brtags pa'i 'gog pa dang /
T02TD1915E:224a-56: so sor brtags pa ma yin pa'i 'gog pa dang /
T02TD1915E:224a-58: spyod yul zhes pa ni gzugs la sogs pa de dag mig gi dbang pos dmigs pa'i rten yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:224a-59: mtshan nyid rnams zhes pa ni gzugs la sogs pa'i rang gi mtshan nyid do //
T02TD1915E:224a-60: gong du bshad pa'i sngon po dang ser po la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1915E:224a-61: rang bzhin med cing zhes pa ni gzugs la sogs pa'i spyod yul te /
T02TD1915E:224a-62: gcig dang du ma mi 'byor ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:224a-63: de ltar yang dbu ma rgyan las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:224a-64: de bzhin nyid du brjod pa yi //
T02TD1915E:224a-65: dngos po 'di dag rang bzhin med //
T02TD1915E:224a-66: gcig dang du ma mi 'byor phyir //
T02TD1915E:224a-67: rang bzhin gyis ni gzugs brnyan 'dra //
T02TD1915E:224a-69: rang bzhin med cing dmigs med la //
T02TD1915E:224b-0: zhes pa ste dbang po la 'das @224b pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:224b-1: de 'dra ba yi spyod yul la //
T02TD1915E:224b-2: dmigs pa dang bcas ji ltar lags //
T02TD1915E:224b-5: de dag ngo mtshar chen po ni //
T02TD1915E:224b-6: bdag gi the tshom lcas bka' stsal //
T02TD1915E:224b-7: zhes pa de la de dag ces pa ni gong du thal ba'i zhus pa'i tshig rnams so //
T02TD1915E:224b-8: ngo mtshar chen po ni zhes pa ni sngon ma rtogs pa'o //
T02TD1915E:224b-9: bdag ces pa ni lha mo spyan ma ste /
T02TD1915E:224b-10: de'i the tshom zhes pa ni som nyir gyur pa'o //
T02TD1915E:224b-11: lha zhes pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
T02TD1915E:224b-12: lha'i rjes su skye ba mdzad pa dang /
T02TD1915E:224b-13: rang gi 'od zer la longs spyod pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:224b-14: bka' stsal zhes pa ni the tshom de dag bsal bar bya ba'i don du gnas rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa'i gsung gi sgo nas ston cig par zhus pa'o //
T02TD1915E:224b-15: gnas rnam pa lnga ni 'di lta ste /
T02TD1915E:224b-21: de la nges pa'i tshig ni 'dus byas pa'i chos thams cad mi rtag pa zhes smra ba lta bu'o //
T02TD1915E:224b-22: rgyu ni rgyu rkyen tshogs nas 'dus byas pa'i phyir zhes smra ba lta bu'o //
T02TD1915E:224b-23: dpe ni bum pa dang 'dra zhes smra ba lta bu'o //
T02TD1915E:224b-24: nye bar 'gro ba ni ji lta ba ni 'jim pa dang /
T02TD1915E:224b-27: rdza mkhan rnams 'dus nas byas pa'i phyir bum pa mi rtag pa yin zhes smra ba lta bu'o //
T02TD1915E:224b-28: nges par 'gro ba ni de bzhin du 'dus byas pa'i chos kyang rkyen rnams tshogs nas byas pas mi rtag go zhes smra ba lta bu'o //
T02TD1915E:224b-29: de ltar yang tshig don thams cad la yang gnas rnam pa lnga shes par bya'o //
T02TD1915E:224b-30: da ni gsung gi sgo nas chos bstan pas zhus pa'i lan gsungs pa //
T02TD1915E:224b-31: de ltar ma thag tu zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1915E:224b-32: de la de ltar zhes pa ni gong du zhus pa'i tshig la bsnyeg pa'o //
T02TD1915E:224b-33: zhus ma thag tu ni zhes pa ni de ma thag pa'i don to //
T02TD1915E:224b-34: lha mos zhus pa ste kho nar dus gzhan du ma bsnyad par lan btab po zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
T02TD1915E:224b-35: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs //
T02TD1915E:224b-36: zhes pa ni ston pa po ste bshad zin to //
T02TD1915E:224b-37: gsungs zhes pa ni brjod kyis mi lang ba'i chos yin yang thugs rje'i dbang gis bshad pa'o //
T02TD1915E:224b-38: ston pa'i chos nyid kyi don mtshon pa /
T02TD1915E:224b-39: shes rab zab pa zad med ni //
T02TD1915E:225a-0: zhes pa ste de la shes rab ces pa ni @225a * //
T02TD1915E:225a-1: gnyis su med pa'i shes rab ste /
T02TD1915E:225a-2: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dang bral ba'i phyir dang /
T02TD1915E:225a-3: yod pa dang med pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:225a-4: de bas na de nyid zab pa zhes pa ste rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:225a-5: de ltar yang 'jig rten snang ba las kyang gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:225a-6: mi rtog pa ni zab pa yin /
T02TD1915E:225a-8: zad med ces pa ni chos nyid de 'dus ma byas pa'i phyir bskal pa grangs med pa gzhan du yang de bzhin du gnas pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:225a-9: de ltar yang de nyid du 'dus pa las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:225a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa byung yang rung de bzhin gshegs pa ma byung yang rung chos nyid de bzhin du gnas pa'o zhes so //
T02TD1915E:225a-11: nyon cig ces pa ni bum pa kha mar sbubs ba dang /
T02TD1915E:225a-12: bum pa zhabs rdol ba dang /
T02TD1915E:225a-13: bum pa mi gtsang bas gang ba lta bu'i skyon gsum spangs te /
T02TD1915E:225a-16: yang dag pa'i lta ba gsum dang ldan na //
T02TD1915E:225a-17: rna ba'i dbang pos sgra la dmigs //
T02TD1915E:225a-19: yang na shes rab gsum dang ldan nas nyon cig ces smra ba'o //
T02TD1915E:225a-20: spyan ma zhes pa ni bod pa'i tshig go //
T02TD1915E:225a-21: bshad par bya zhes pa ni gnang ba'i tshig go //
T02TD1915E:225a-23: da ni re zhig chos nyid de'i yon tan bstan pa ni dpyad du med cing zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1915E:225a-24: de la dpyad du med cing zhes pa ni mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pas shes su med pa'o //
T02TD1915E:225a-25: de la mngon sum gyis mi shes pa ni dbang po'i rnam par shes pa dang /
T02TD1915E:225a-26: yid kyi rnam par shes pas dpyad du med pa la so so yang dag par rig pa dang rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyis dpyad pa'o //
T02TD1915E:225a-27: 'o na gnyis kyis dpyad pa de la dpyad du med cing zhes bstan pa'i phyir zhe na lan btab pa /
T02TD1915E:225a-28: dbang po'i rnam par shes pa dang /
T02TD1915E:225a-29: yid kyi rnam par shes pa gnyis kyis dpyad du med pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:225a-30: dper na rta rkang lag gsum yod bzhin du lag pa gcig bcad na 'jig rten pas rta rkang med gcig ces brjod pa lta bu'o //
T02TD1915E:225a-31: rjes su dpag pa gnyis kyis kyang dpyad du med pa ste /
T02TD1915E:225a-32: mtshan gsum dang rtags gsum gyis dpyad du med pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:225a-34: chos nyid ni ji ltar snang ba de bzhin du ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:225b-0: de bas @225b na shes bya min zhes pa ste thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyod yul gyi phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:225b-1: de ltar yang rab tu byed pa nyi shu pa las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:225b-2: rang sems ye shes mi shes pas //
T02TD1915E:225b-3: ji ltar sangs rgyas spyod yul lo //
T02TD1915E:225b-6: de bzhin dpyad mkhan gyis shes dka' //
T02TD1915E:225b-7: zhes pa ste shes rab kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyis mthong ba dang thos pa tsam gyis mi rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:225b-9: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang chen ni //
T02TD1915E:225b-10: nam mkha' nam mkha'i spyod yul lo //
T02TD1915E:225b-11: zhes pa ste de la sangs rgyas kyang de kun yang de bas sangs rgyas kun zhes pa ste ;
T02TD1915E:225b-12: phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma lta bu'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa 'dir 'dod de 'di lta ste /
T02TD1915E:225b-13: gsang ba'i rgyud rdo rje theg pa las sangs rgyas pa ni bla na med pa yin te de'i gong du theg pa gzhan med pa'i phyir ro /
T02TD1915E:225b-14: yang dag pa yang yin te theg pa chen po la gnas pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:225b-17: mdo sde chen po'i theg pa la sangs rgyas pa ni theg pa gong na yod pas bla dang bcas pa yin la yang dag par rdzogs pa yin te /
T02TD1915E:225b-18: theg pa chen po la gnas pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:225b-19: theg pa chung du las sangs rgyas pa'i nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas ni bla dang bcas pa yang ma yin /
T02TD1915E:225b-20: yang dag par rdzogs pa yang ma yin te /
T02TD1915E:225b-21: theg pa gong na yod pa'i phyir dang yang theg pa chung du las phyir ldog dgos pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:225b-22: de lta bas na sangs rgyas rnam pa gsum du shes par bya'o ;
T02TD1915E:225b-23: / de rnams kyi gsang chen ni zhes pa ni gong du bshad zin to //
T02TD1915E:225b-24: nam mkha' nam mkha'i spyod yul lo //
T02TD1915E:225b-25: zhes pa ni stong pa nyid kyi sems kyis dmigs pa med par stong pa nyid bsgom pa'o //
T02TD1915E:225b-26: de ltar klu sgrub zhabs kyis dbu ma las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:225b-27: dmigs pa med pa'i sems dag ni //
T02TD1915E:225b-28: nam mkha'i mtshan nyid du gnas te //
T02TD1915E:225b-29: nam mkha'i sgom pa kho na de //
T02TD1915E:225b-32: de bas na gsang chen ni theg pa chung du ba rnams kyis kyang mi shes pa'i don gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:225b-33: mi shes mun pas sgrib pas na //
T02TD1915E:225b-34: nyan thos rnams kyis shes pa min /
T02TD1915E:226a-1: de la mi shes zhes pa ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pas mi shes pa ste /
T02TD1915E:226a-2: nyan thos rnams dang rang sangs rgyas la thams cad mkhyen pa dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:226a-3: mi shes kyang de mun pa yang de bas na mi shes mun pa zhes pa ste /
T02TD1915E:226a-4: yang dag pa'i don rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes la mi gsal bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:226a-5: des bsgribs pa ni mi shes mun pas bsgribs pas zhes pa ste /
T02TD1915E:226a-6: nyan thos kyis shes bya'i sgrib pa ma spangs pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:226a-7: de ltar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:226a-8: rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i zag pa med pa'i phung po mthong ngam /
T02TD1915E:226a-9: bcom ldan 'das ma mthong zhes so //
T02TD1915E:226a-11: nyan thos rnams kyis shes pa min //
T02TD1915E:226a-13: de la nyan thos zhes pa ni nyan thos kyi sangs rgyas te /
T02TD1915E:226a-14: ston pa la nyan zhing thos nas nges par 'byed pa'i cha bzhi mthar phyin te mthong ba'i lam mngon du gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:226a-15: de rnams kyis shes pa min zhes pa ste gzung ba dang 'dzin pa ma spangs pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:226a-16: spyod yul zhes pa ste gzugs la sogs pa'i phyi'i skye mched drug go //
T02TD1915E:226a-17: de dag tshe snga ma'i las kyi dbang gis med par snang ba ni spyod yul bag chags zhes so //
T02TD1915E:226a-18: de ni kun brtags tsam du rtogs pa ni /
T02TD1915E:226a-19: spyod yul bag chags shes mkhan ni //
T02TD1915E:226a-20: rang sangs rgyas su sprul pa ste /
T02TD1915E:226a-22: de la rang sangs rgyas zhes pa ni tshe 'di'i sngon du nges par 'byed pa'i cha bzhi mthar phyin nas mthong ba'i lam du zhugs ma khyad la tshe 'das nas phyi ma'i tshe la ston pa la nyan zhing thos mi dgos nges par rang gis nges par 'byed pa'i cha bzhi mthar phyin te mthong ba'i lam rang mngon du gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:226a-23: sprul pa ste zhes pa ni dbyung ba'o //
T02TD1915E:226a-24: de kun gyis kyang zhes pa ni rang sangs rgyas kun gyis kyang mi shes pa ste /
T02TD1915E:226a-25: 'dzin pa'i rtogs pa ma spangs pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:226a-26: de ltar yang mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:226a-27: gzung don rtog pa spong phyir dang //
T02TD1915E:226a-28: 'dzin pa mi spong phyir dang ni //
T02TD1915E:226a-29: rten gyi bse ru lta bu'i lam //
T02TD1915E:226a-30: yang dag bsdus pas shes par bya //
T02TD1915E:226a-32: kyang gi sgras ni nyan thos kyis mi shes pa de rang sangs rgyas kyis kyang shes pa ma yin no zhes pa'i don snyeg pa yin pa'o //
T02TD1915E:226a-33: shes med so so'i skye bo yis //
T02TD1915E:226a-34: zhes pa ni mi shes pa'i sgra ni gong ma la snyeg pa ste /
T02TD1915E:226b-0: so so'i skye bo @226b yis kyang mi shes zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
T02TD1915E:226b-1: de la shes med ces pa ni nyon mongs pa can gyi ma rig pa ste so so'i skye bo nyon mongs pa dang /
T02TD1915E:226b-2: shes bya'i sgrib pa can yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:226b-3: shes med kyang de so so'i skye bo yang de bas na shes med so so'i skye bo'i zhes pa ste /
T02TD1915E:226b-4: 'phags pa las gzhan du gyur pa ste /
T02TD1915E:226b-5: 'phags pa'i chos mthong ba'i lam ma thob pa'i phyir dang mi dge ba las ma grol pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:226b-6: dus kun la mi shes pa'i don bstan pa /
T02TD1915E:226b-9: da ltar byung pa'i dus gsum la zhes pa ste go sla'o //
T02TD1915E:226b-10: byol song zhes pa ni lha dang mi'i 'gro ba las byol nas song ba ngan song gsum mo //
T02TD1915E:226b-11: de'i mi dge ba'i las ni byol song bag chags zhes so //
T02TD1915E:226b-12: de las skye ba ni de las byung ba'i /
T02TD1915E:226b-13: dud 'gro yi dags skye ba rnams //
T02TD1915E:226b-15: de la dud 'gro zhes pa ni lha dang mi'i 'gro ba ma gtogs par phyugs kyi khams su gtogs pa yin pa de dud de 'gro bas na dud 'gro zhes pa ste de ni mi 'am ci la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1915E:226b-16: 'on kyang phyugs la sogs pa don gyis shes par bya'o //
T02TD1915E:226b-17: yi dags zhes pa ni 'di las ye nas phyir mi ldog par 'das pa'o //
T02TD1915E:226b-18: yang na bkres pa dang skom pas sdug bsngal pa'o //
T02TD1915E:226b-19: 'gro ba de gnyis la lhung ba ni /
T02TD1915E:226b-20: dud 'gro yi dags skyes pa rnams //
T02TD1915E:226b-22: de kun gyis kyang mi shes te //
T02TD1915E:226b-23: zhes pa ni ngan song gsum sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis gtses pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:226b-24: mi shes pa gang zhen gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:226b-25: sangs rgyas spyod yul gsang chen ni //
T02TD1915E:226b-26: zhes pa ste yig 'bru ni bcom zin to //
T02TD1915E:226b-27: de ltar chos nyid kyi che ba'i yon tan bstan zin nas /
T02TD1915E:226b-28: da ni don bstan pa la /
T02TD1915E:226b-29: re zhig dang la chos kyi dbyings rnam par 'phro ba ni /
T02TD1915E:226b-30: gang las skye bar 'gyur pa lags //
T02TD1915E:226b-32: snying po shin tu snying po mchog / ces pa la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1915E:226b-33: de la snying po zhes pa ni phyi'i dkyil 'khor te /
T02TD1915E:226b-34: g-yo ba med pa'i phyir dang /
T02TD1915E:226b-35: 'dod pa'i 'bras bu smin par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:226b-36: de ltar yang 'jig rten snang ba las kyang gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:226b-39: dkyil 'khor de las khyad par du gyur pa ni /
T02TD1915E:226b-40: snying po shin tu snying po mchog / ces pa ste 'og nas 'byung ba'i lus kyi dkyil 'khor phra mo'i ting nge 'dzin te dkyil 'khor shin tu zab pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:227a-1: ba'i ngo bor gyur pa'i phyir mchog ces so //
T02TD1915E:227a-2: yang na snying po zhes pa ni sku gsung thugs te /
T02TD1915E:227a-3: khams gsum gyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:227a-4: sku gsung thugs de'i rang bzhin du gyur pa ni shin tu snying po zhes pa ste /
T02TD1915E:227a-5: rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bo bde ba chen po rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes chos kyi dbyings so //
T02TD1915E:227a-7: gang de kun bdag la gnas pa //
T02TD1915E:227a-8: zhes pa ste bcud dang snod kyi rang bzhin du khyab pa'o //
T02TD1915E:227a-9: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang chen ni //
T02TD1915E:227a-10: lha mo khyod la bshad par bya //
T02TD1915E:227a-11: zhes pa ni bshad zin to //
T02TD1915E:227a-12: phra mo'i ting nge 'dzin bstan pa byang chub sems zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1915E:227a-13: de la byang chub sems zhes pa ni bshad zin to ;
T02TD1915E:227a-14: / de nyid bdag ces pa ste gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i bskyon gyis ma gos pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:227a-15: de ltar sems tsam las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:227a-16: gzhan gyi blo yis tshor ba min //
T02TD1915E:227a-17: des kyang gzhan la tshor ba min //
T02TD1915E:227a-18: gzung 'dzin dang ni bral pa'i phyir //
T02TD1915E:227a-19: rang de kho nar snang bar 'gyur //
T02TD1915E:227a-21: de bas na rang bzhin 'od gsal ba zhes pa ste /
T02TD1915E:227a-22: nam mkha' bzhin du nyon mongs pa'i dri ma glo bur ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:227a-23: de ltar yang rab tu byed pa dbus mtha' las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:227a-24: chu khams gser dang nam mkha' bzhin //
T02TD1915E:227a-25: dag pa bzhin du dag par 'dod //
T02TD1915E:227a-27: phra mo'i ting nge 'dzin de'i mdog bstan pa /
T02TD1915E:227a-28: zla pa'i shel dang mnyam pa'i 'od //
T02TD1915E:227a-29: ces pa ste chu shel gyi mdog dang 'dra ba dkar ba'o //
T02TD1915E:227a-30: phra mo'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos po bstan pa /
T02TD1915E:227a-31: de nyid ye shes lnga yi dngos //
T02TD1915E:227a-32: zhes pa ste de la de nyid ces pa ni bskal ba gzhan du yang mi 'gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:227a-33: yang na de nyid ces pa ni rigs lnga'i rang bzhin dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:227a-34: de ltar yang gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud phyi ma las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:227a-35: de kho na nyid rigs lngar gsungs //
T02TD1915E:227a-37: ye shes lnga zhes pa ni me long lta bu'i ye shes dang /
T02TD1915E:227a-38: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes pa dang /
T02TD1915E:227a-39: so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes dang /
T02TD1915E:227a-40: bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes dang /
T02TD1915E:227a-41: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes so //
T02TD1915E:227a-42: de la me long lta bu'i ye shes ni /
T02TD1915E:227a-43: kun gzhi gnas gyur pa de bzhin nyid dang stobs bcu'i ngo bo rdo rje lta bu'i byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin shes bya'i sgrib pa bsal bar byed pa ni me long lta bu'i ye shes te /
T02TD1915E:227a-44: dper na me long la bstan pa'i rdzas gsal ba bzhin du chos nyid la chos thams cad gsal bar rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:227b-0: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes ni nyon mongs pa'i @227b yid gnas gyur pa yang dag pa'i mtha' dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i ngo bo sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa bsal ba ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes te /
T02TD1915E:227b-1: bdag dang gzhan du mi 'byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:227b-2: so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes ni rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par shes pa gnas gyur pa mtshan ma med pa dang /
T02TD1915E:227b-3: yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i ngo bor gyur pa /
T02TD1915E:227b-4: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin las kyi sgrib pa bsal ba ni so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes te /
T02TD1915E:227b-5: dag pa 'jig rten pa'i ye shes yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:227b-6: bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes ni sgo lnga'i rnam par shes pa gnas gyur pa don dam pa dang snying rje chen po'i ngo bor gyur pa mi dmigs pa'i snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin skye pa'i sgrib pa bsal ba ni bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes te /
T02TD1915E:227b-7: sems can kun gyi don byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:227b-8: de bzhi'i ni bar chad med pa'i lam la zad pa'i ye shes lnga'i ngos 'dzin zhes par bya'o //
T02TD1915E:227b-9: shin tu rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes ni /
T02TD1915E:227b-10: chos kyi dbyings dang stobs la sogs pa gong gi chos bzhi'i ngo bor rnam par grol pa'i lam du mi skye pa'i rang bzhin ni shin tu rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes te /
T02TD1915E:227b-11: sangs rgyas kyi rgyur gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:227b-12: de lnga'i ngo bor gyur pa ni ye shes lnga'i dngos zhes pa ste /
T02TD1915E:227b-13: ye shes lnga dang phra mo dbyer med pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:227b-15: yungs kar che pa'i tshad tsam mo //
T02TD1915E:227b-17: de'i dbus su zhes pa ni yungs kar gyi dkyil lo //
T02TD1915E:227b-18: de la bkod pa'i yi ge ksh'um ni bzhugs pa'i lha zhes pa ste rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:227b-20: mi gsal gsal ba'i gzugs can te /
T02TD1915E:227b-22: de la mi gsal zhes pa ni 'khor ba'i dus su rang rig pa'i ye shes ni bu mo'i bde ba bzhin du gzhan la bstan du med pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:227b-23: gsal ba zhes pa ni zad pa dang mi skye ba'i ye shes thob pa'i dus su mngon du gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:227b-24: de ltar sum cu pa las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:227b-25: dgra bcom nyid la de 'gyur te //
T02TD1915E:227b-26: de la brten nas gnas pa'o //
T02TD1915E:227b-28: de 'dra ba'i ngo bo ni mi gsal ba'i gzugs can te zhes pa'o //
T02TD1915E:227b-29: phyed tshad tsam gyi phra mo'i mchog / ces pa ni yungs kar gyi phyed phra ba yig 'bru'i mchog gi tshad do //
T02TD1915E:227b-30: don ni 'di ltar bsgom ste de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rang gi lus la thim nas /
T02TD1915E:228a-0: lhag pa'i byang chub sems su @228a * //
T02TD1915E:228a-1: gyur nas gsang ba'i rdo rje'i lam nas phyung ste /
T02TD1915E:228a-2: rang gi rig ma'i gsang ba'i padma'i sna'i rtse mo la rdo rjer gyur pa bsgom te /
T02TD1915E:228a-3: rdo rje de'i dkyil du yungs kar gyi tshad phra mo la ye shes ksh'um bsgom pa'o //
T02TD1915E:228a-4: de mtshan ma lnga ma byung gi bar du bsgom pa ste /
T02TD1915E:228a-5: mtshan ma lnga byung ma thag 'phro ba bsgom pa'o //
T02TD1915E:228a-6: mtshan ma lnga ni gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud phyi ma las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:228a-7: dang po smig rgyu 'dra ba dang /
T02TD1915E:228a-8: gnyis pa la ni du pa'i tshul //
T02TD1915E:228a-9: gsum pa srin bu me khyer 'dra //
T02TD1915E:228a-10: bzhi pa mar me bzhin du 'bar //
T02TD1915E:228a-11: lnga pa rtag tu snang ba ni //
T02TD1915E:228a-12: sprin med pa yi nam mkha' bzhin //
T02TD1915E:228a-14: de ltar yang gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:228a-15: rin chen kha dog sna lnga pa //
T02TD1915E:228a-16: yungs kar gyi ni 'bru tshad tsam //
T02TD1915E:228a-17: sna yi rtse mor nan tan du //
T02TD1915E:228a-18: rnal 'byor pa yis rtag tu bsgom //
T02TD1915E:228a-19: rin chen brtan par re nas spro //
T02TD1915E:228a-20: brtan par ma gyur yang mi spro //
T02TD1915E:228a-22: de ltar phra mo'i ting nge 'dzin bstan nas /
T02TD1915E:228a-23: thig le'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom bstan pa /
T02TD1915E:228a-24: yid kyi dngos po thig le'i gzugs //
T02TD1915E:228a-25: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1915E:228a-26: de la yid ces pa ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i ngo bo'o //
T02TD1915E:228a-27: de ltar lang kar gshegs pa'i mdo las kyang gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:228a-28: las ni sems kyis sdud par byed //
T02TD1915E:228a-29: yid kyis kyang ni rnam par brtags //
T02TD1915E:228a-30: rnam zhes kyis ni shes bya ste //
T02TD1915E:228a-31: lnga dag gis ni mthong bar brtags //
T02TD1915E:228a-33: de'i ngo bor gyur pa'i thig le ni yid kyi dngos zhes pa ste yid dang thig le dbyer med pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:228a-34: don de kho na ston pa thig le'i gzugs zhes pa ste sran ma'i 'bru tshad tsam gyi thig le'o //
T02TD1915E:228a-35: de ltar yang gsang ba 'dus pa'i sgrub thabs zla ba las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:228a-36: 'bru tsa na ka'i thig le'i 'bras bu zhes so //
T02TD1915E:228a-38: rtag tu snying ga'i dbus gnas pa ;
T02TD1915E:228a-39: / zhes te de la rtag tu zhes pa ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar dang dus gsum mo //
T02TD1915E:228a-40: snying zhes pa ni lus kyi yan lag sgo lnga lta bu la bya ste /
T02TD1915E:228a-41: 'dir ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka na ma yin no //
T02TD1915E:228a-42: dbus gnas pa zhes pa ni thig le rang gi snying gi dkyil du bsgom pa'o //
T02TD1915E:228a-44: zhes pa ni thig le ste kun du 'od zer snang bar byed pa'o //
T02TD1915E:228a-45: don ni 'di 'dus pa'i sgrub thabs zla ba las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:228a-46: 'bru tsa na ka'i du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsdus te /
T02TD1915E:228a-47: byang chub sems kyi 'od du gyur nas 'bru tsa na ka'i tshad yid dang dbyer med pa'i thig le bsgoms nas de'i dkyil du yi ge ksh'um gong ma bzhin du bsgoms te /
T02TD1915E:228b-0: de las byung @228b ba'i 'od kyi thig le gsal bar byas te /
T02TD1915E:228b-1: de las byung bas rang gi snying ga gsal bar byed /
T02TD1915E:228b-2: snying gnas byung bas rang gi lus kun gsal bar byed /
T02TD1915E:228b-3: lus kyi ba spu nas byung ste 'jig rten thams cad gsal bar byas te /
T02TD1915E:228b-4: phyir log pa rim pa bzhin du thim nas yig 'bru dang gcig tu gyur par bsgom mo //
T02TD1915E:228b-5: de ni bsgom pa'i man ngag go //
T02TD1915E:228b-6: yang lhag pa'i byang chub sems tshes grangs kyi rim pas gnas pa'i gnas bstan pa /
T02TD1915E:228b-7: ji snyed dgug pa'i bar du ni //
T02TD1915E:228b-13: mig dang rna ba'i rtsa dang /
T02TD1915E:228b-15: gsang ba'i yan lag mchog rnams te dgu'o //
T02TD1915E:228b-16: de rnams la yang ngo la ni mar brtsi ste mar ngo la ni yar brtsi bar bya'o //
T02TD1915E:228b-17: de ltar 'dod pa'i gtsug lag brgyad brgyad la yang gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:228b-18: nu ma lag rtse mgrin pa dang //
T02TD1915E:228b-19: ma mchu de bzhin 'gram pa mig / sna rtse spyi bo yan lag mchog / de dag kun la gdung byed pas //
T02TD1915E:228b-20: nam zla yar tshes mar yar ni //
T02TD1915E:228b-21: zla ba mar tshes log par bshad //
T02TD1915E:228b-23: yang lhag pa'i byang chub sems kyi gnas bco lnga la sgra yig bcu drug tu bsgom pa bstan pa /
T02TD1915E:228b-24: dpral ba la gnas rkang mthil bar //
T02TD1915E:228b-25: zhes pa ste mthe bong rtsa la yi ge aa /
T02TD1915E:228b-37: rna ba'i rtsa la ao dang /
T02TD1915E:228b-39: lus kun la aam aa:rnams kyi gzugs su bsgom pa'o //
T02TD1915E:228b-40: de ltar yang 'dod pa'i gtsug lag brgyad brgyad las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:228b-41: mthe bo rtser ni yi ge aa //
T02TD1915E:228b-42: rje rang gnyis la de bzhin a'a //
T02TD1915E:228b-43: bral gnyis la ni yi ge ai //
T02TD1915E:228b-44: yi ge a'i ni gsang bar rten //
T02TD1915E:228b-45: lte pa'i rtsa ba la yi ge au //
T02TD1915E:228b-46: de bzhin gsus par yi ge a'u //
T02TD1915E:228b-47: nu ma'i rtse la yi ge ri //
T02TD1915E:228b-48: yi ge r'i ni lag par gnas //
T02TD1915E:228b-49: mgrin pa kho nar yi ge li //
T02TD1915E:228b-50: de bzhin ma mchur yi ge l'i /
T02TD1915E:228b-51: 'gram pa'i phyogs su yi ge ae //
T02TD1915E:228b-52: de bzhin aee ni mig gnyis la //
T02TD1915E:228b-53: rna ba'i rtsar ni yi ge ao //
T02TD1915E:228b-54: yi ge aoo ni spyi bor gnas //
T02TD1915E:228b-55: aam aa:yan lag kun la gnas //
T02TD1915E:228b-56: chog ga rnams ni sbyar bar bya //
T02TD1915E:228b-58: thig le de kho nar bsdus te zhes pa ni gnas dgu dang bco lnga la khyab pa'i byang chub sems snying ga'i padma'i thig le la dang la 'dus pa'i don to //
T02TD1915E:228b-59: lte pa'i dbus su rnam par gnas //
T02TD1915E:229a-0: @229a * // zhes pa ni snying gi padma las babs te lte pa'i padmar gnas pa'o //
T02TD1915E:229a-1: de ltar chos kyi dbyings skye pa'i khungs bstan nas /
T02TD1915E:229a-2: dang po ji ltar 'ong ba yin //
T02TD1915E:229a-3: zhes pa'i lan gsungs pa la /
T02TD1915E:229a-4: re zhig gong du bsgom pa'i yig rtsis bstan pa /
T02TD1915E:229a-5: cha shas lnga pa can yin te //
T02TD1915E:229a-6: zhes pa ste yi ge ksh'um yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:229a-12: zhabs skyed ring po au rnams te lnga'o //
T02TD1915E:229a-14: bcu gnyis kyi yi ni tha ma la //
T02TD1915E:229a-16: ma ning gi yi ge ri r'i dang li l'i gzhag pa'i sgra yig aam aa la sogs pa'i bcu gnyis kyi tha ma ni ka'o //
T02TD1915E:229a-17: cha shas drug pas mtshan pa nyid //
T02TD1915E:229a-18: ces pa ni ya la sogs pa drug pas mtshan pa ste yi ge sha'o //
T02TD1915E:229a-19: nga ro zhes pa ni zhabs skyed au'o //
T02TD1915E:229a-20: thig les rgyan byed pa zhes pa ni steng gi zla tshes dang thig le'o //
T02TD1915E:229a-21: rdo rje kho nas phyung nas su //
T02TD1915E:229a-22: zhes pa ni gsang pa'i rdo rje'i lam nas lhag pa'i byang chub sems yi ge ksh'um gi ngo bo 'phro bsgom pa'o //
T02TD1915E:229a-24: de bzhin phyir 'gro ji ltar lags //
T02TD1915E:229a-26: sa bon skye gnas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1915E:229a-27: de la sa bon zhes pa ni yi ge ksh'um ste /
T02TD1915E:229a-28: khams gsum gyi rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:229a-29: skye gnas dbus gzhag ste zhes pa gsang pa'i padma'i nang du phab pa'o //
T02TD1915E:229a-30: chos kyi dbyings ni bzhu bar byed //
T02TD1915E:229a-31: ces pa ni yi ge ksh'um chos thams cad kyi rgyu lhag pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bo'i chu'i khams su gyur pa'o //
T02TD1915E:229a-33: yan lag med pa gang de ni //
T02TD1915E:229a-35: khams rnams su ni 'jug pa yang //
T02TD1915E:229a-36: zhes pa'i bar gyis lan gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:229a-37: de ni rim par zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1915E:229a-38: de la de ni zhes pa ni yan lag med pa'i chos kyi dbyings so //
T02TD1915E:229a-39: rim par bskyed byas nas zhes pa ni mer mer po dang /
T02TD1915E:229a-43: rkang lag 'dus pa mngal gyi rim pas lngas ming dang gzugs su gyur pa'o //
T02TD1915E:229a-45: sgo dgu la ni kun du 'gro //
T02TD1915E:229a-47: spyi bo tshangs pa'i bu ga dang /
T02TD1915E:229a-55: chu mig gi bu ga rnams te dgu'o //
T02TD1915E:229a-56: de rnams la byang chub kyi sems khyab par gyur to zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
T02TD1915E:229a-57: de las kyang 'phro ba'i don gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:229a-58: khyab cing khyab nas 'gro kun la //
T02TD1915E:229a-59: mi g-yo la sogs g-yo dang bcas //
T02TD1915E:229b-0: zhes te go rims su 'gro ba kun la ni khyab cing mi g-yo ba la sogs pa ni khyab la gnas @229b par gyur to zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
T02TD1915E:229b-1: de la 'gro kun zhes pa ni dus gsum dang khams gsum gyi bcud kyi 'jig rten 'gro ba rigs drug ste /
T02TD1915E:229b-2: 'di nas gzhan dang gzhan du bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:229b-3: mi g-yo zhes pa ni ri rab la sogs pa snod kyi 'jig rten no //
T02TD1915E:229b-4: sogs pa'i sgras ni gzhal yas khang la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1915E:229b-5: g-yo dang bcas zhes pa ni par snang la lding ba'i gzhal yas khang ngo //
T02TD1915E:229b-6: don de gsal bar byed pa gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:229b-7: tshangs sogs lha dang lha min gyi //
T02TD1915E:229b-8: gzhi ni de las gyur pa'o //
T02TD1915E:229b-9: zhes te de la tshangs pa zhes pa ni 'dod pa'i nyon mongs pa zhi pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:229b-10: rnam pa gcig tu mu stegs pa'i gzhung gis tshangs pa zhes pa ni bden ba dang /
T02TD1915E:229b-12: dbang po dul ba la 'dod do //
T02TD1915E:229b-13: by'a ka ra na'i sgra las ni tshangs pa zhes pa ni sa 'og ma'i tshe dang byad gzugs dang longs spyod la sogs pa 'phel bar byed pa la 'dod do //
T02TD1915E:229b-14: sogs zhes pa'i sgras ni khyab 'jug dang /
T02TD1915E:229b-17: nyi ma dang zla ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1915E:229b-18: yang na sogs pa'i sgras ni rgyal chen rigs bzhi nas 'go min gyi bar gyi lha ris la gzung bar bya'o //
T02TD1915E:229b-19: tshangs pa la sogs pa yang de lha yang de bas na tshangs sogs lha zhes pa ste /
T02TD1915E:229b-20: rang gi 'od la longs spyod pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:229b-21: lha min zhes pa ni lha'i ris las smad pa'i rab kyi khong ba dang bar snang la gnas pa /
T02TD1915E:229b-22: gza' r'a hu la la sogs pa ste ;
T02TD1915E:229b-23: rin po che'i 'od la longs spyod pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:229b-24: lha dang lha min de dag chos kyi dbyings de kho na las skyes pas na gzhi ni de las gyur pa'o zhes so //
T02TD1915E:229b-25: gang las gtso bo skyed byed pa //
T02TD1915E:229b-26: zhes pa ni gzugs dang gzugs med pa gang du yang chos kyi dbyings las 'phro ba yin no zhes pa'i tha tshig ste //
T02TD1915E:229b-27: chos thams cad kyi sa bon gtsor gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:229b-28: sa dang nam mkha'i ngo bo yang chos kyi dbyings yin pa bstan pa /
T02TD1915E:229b-29: sa dang nam mkha' de zhes gsungs //
T02TD1915E:229b-30: zhes pa ste de las zhes pa ni dbyibs dang kha dog la mtshon pa'i //
T02TD1915E:229b-31: de yang sa 'og sa bla sa steng gsum ste /
T02TD1915E:229b-32: de la sa 'og ni 'dzam bu'i gling man chad dmyal ba ya na chad do //
T02TD1915E:229b-33: sa bla ni nyi mas gar khyab pa'o //
T02TD1915E:229b-34: sa steng ni ri rab kyi rtse mo'o //
T02TD1915E:229b-35: nam mkha' zhes pa ni mi sgrib par ga 'byed pa'o //
T02TD1915E:229b-36: de zhes gsungs zhes pa ni chos kyi dbyings las 'phro zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
T02TD1915E:229b-37: ma rig bag chags zhes pa nas /
T02TD1915E:229b-38: ji ltar dngos su 'dus pa lags //
T02TD1915E:229b-39: zhes pa'i bar gyi tshig gi lan gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:230a-2: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1915E:230a-3: de la ji snyed ces pa ni lus kyi tshad mtshon pa'o //
T02TD1915E:230a-4: lus zhes pa ni gzugs kyi phung po'o //
T02TD1915E:230a-5: gnas pa'i zhes pa ni ming bzhi'i phung por gyur pa'o //
T02TD1915E:230a-6: bar zhes pa ni dus kyi tshad do //
T02TD1915E:230a-7: de yis zhes pa ni chos kyi dbyings la gzung ngo //
T02TD1915E:230a-8: las dang zhes pa ni lus ngag yid kyi dge ba'i las te 'jig rten du bsngags pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:230a-9: las min zhes pa ni lus ngag yid kyi las mi dge ba kho na ste 'jig rten pas smad pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:230a-10: de gnyis la 'jug pas na byed pa'o //
T02TD1915E:230a-11: de ltar yang mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i rnam par bshad pa las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:230a-12: skye ba'i dge ba 'ba' zhig med //
T02TD1915E:230a-15: ji snyed chos kyi dbyings kyi lus la gnas pa de snyed kyi bar dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las sna tshogs pa byed par 'gyur ro zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
T02TD1915E:230a-16: de snyed kyi sgra med na yang don gyis 'brel par shes par bya ste ;
T02TD1915E:230a-17: gang dang de ni rtag tu 'brel //
T02TD1915E:230a-18: zhes sgra las gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:230a-19: don de kho na gsal bar mdzad pa /
T02TD1915E:230a-20: bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis yang gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:230a-21: dge dang mi dge bsam pa kun //
T02TD1915E:230a-22: bya ba'i las kun byed pa yin //
T02TD1915E:230a-23: zhes pa ste de la dge dang zhes pa ni 'dod chags dang /
T02TD1915E:230a-26: lus ngag gi las srog gcod pa la sogs pa med pa /
T02TD1915E:230a-27: lus ngag gi las bcu ni 'jig rten pas smad pa las 'das pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:230a-28: yang na dge ba dang zhes pa ni tsva ku sha bzhin du rno bo'i shes rab bsten par bye dpa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:230a-29: mi dge zhes pa'i ni 'dod chags dang /
T02TD1915E:230a-31: gti mug dang ldan pa'i lus ngag yid kyi las srog gcod pa la sogs pa lus ngag gi las te /
T02TD1915E:230a-32: 'jig rten gyis smad pa la 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:230a-33: yang na ma dge zhes pa ni ma rig pa spyin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:230a-34: de gnyis la rnam par rtog pa ni /
T02TD1915E:230a-35: bsam pa yang zhes pa ste /
T02TD1915E:230a-36: sems kyi las gtsor gyur pa'i phyir ro ;
T02TD1915E:230a-37: / de ltar yang chos mngon pa mdzod las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:230a-38: bsam pa yid kyi las yin te //
T02TD1915E:230a-39: de skyed ngag dang lus kyi las //
T02TD1915E:230a-41: de ltar dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las byed pas na bya ba'i las kun zhes pa ste /
T02TD1915E:230a-42: de la kun zhes pa'i sgras ni lung du ma bstan pa'i las la shes par bya'o //
T02TD1915E:230b-0: @230b de bas na kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
T02TD1915E:230b-1: rnam par byad pa'i chos dang /
T02TD1915E:230b-2: dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos kun chos kyi dbyings las 'phras pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T02TD1915E:230b-3: dngos po med la zhes pa nas /
T02TD1915E:230b-4: dmigs pa dang bcas ji mi ltar lags //
T02TD1915E:230b-5: zhes pa'i bar gyi tshi gi lan gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:230b-6: sbyor ba rtag tu de gsungs te /
T02TD1915E:230b-9: sbyor ba rtag tu de gsungs te //
T02TD1915E:230b-10: zhes pa ni gang gi chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin phra mo'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
T02TD1915E:230b-11: thig le'i ting nge 'dzin dang rtag tu sbyor pa'o //
T02TD1915E:230b-12: de ltar sbyor bas thabs dang shes rab kyi gsang ba'i mchod pa ni /
T02TD1915E:230b-13: mchod pa bsgom par gyur pa yin //
T02TD1915E:230b-17: rnal 'byor mas le'u bzhi pa'i lus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha bsgom ste /
T02TD1915E:230b-19: thig le'i ting nge 'dzin bsgoms nas /
T02TD1915E:230b-20: thabs dang shes rab rol pa'i gsang ba'i mchod pas de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes par bya'o //
T02TD1915E:230b-21: de ltar bsgoms pas cir 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD1915E:230b-23: gang tshe las kyi lus zhig na //
T02TD1915E:230b-24: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1915E:230b-25: de la gang tshe zhes pa ni shi pa'i dus mtshon pa'o //
T02TD1915E:230b-26: las kyi lus zhes pa ni lus kyi dkyil 'khor bsgoms pa'i dag pa'i bag chags dang ldan pa'i phung po'o //
T02TD1915E:230b-27: de gnas gyur pa ni lus zhig na zhes pa ste 'chi 'pho ba'o //
T02TD1915E:230b-28: de'i tshe zhes pa ni gang tshe dang 'brel pa'o //
T02TD1915E:230b-29: de'i rang mthu yis zhes pa ni rnal 'byor pa'i bsgom pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyis de 'dra'i lus su zhes pa ni lus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi bdag nyid de rnal 'byor pas thob par 'gyur te zhes pa ni mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa mngon du gyur pa ste /
T02TD1915E:230b-30: skye gba dang 'jig pa tha snyad tsam gyi phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:230b-31: de ltar yang klu sgrub zhabs kyis dbu ma las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:230b-32: gnas pa skye ba shi ba yod med dman pa mnyam pa khyad par ni //
T02TD1915E:230b-33: 'jig rten tha snyad dbang gis gsung gi de bzhin nyid dbang gis ma yin //
T02TD1915E:230b-35: de bas na chos kyi dbyings gang gis g-yo dang mi g-yo khyab par ni nam mkha' mnyam pa nyid 'dra ba tha snyad la ni yod la don dam par ni med pa kun nas kun du khyab pa bzhin du /
T02TD1915E:231a-0: chos kyi dbyings de ni gnas @231a * //
T02TD1915E:231a-1: pa snang ba rnal 'byor pas shes par bya'o //
T02TD1915E:231a-2: de ltar sa bcu pa las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:231a-3: rgyal pa'i sras khams gsum ni sems tsam yin zhes smras pa'o //
T02TD1915E:231a-4: da ni de ltar bsgoms pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i yon tan gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:231a-5: bcu gnyis mtha' yi tshig gi don //
T02TD1915E:231a-6: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1915E:231a-7: de la bcu gnyis mtha'i tshig don zhes pa ni yi ge ksh'um ngo //
T02TD1915E:231a-8: rnal 'byor pa gang gis rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gang gi rim pas yi ge ksh'um bsgom byas na rnal 'byor pa des ni mchog gi dngos grub mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyis rgyas pa'i rdo rje 'dzin par ni sgrub pa po bdag nyid kyi bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis 'gyur zhes so //
T02TD1915E:231a-9: de ltar yang dpal mchog dang po'i rgyud las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:231a-10: kun du bzang po'i ye shes ni //
T02TD1915E:231a-11: rang nyid kho nas thob pa'o //
T02TD1915E:231a-13: de la rdo rje 'dzin pa zhes pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste //
T02TD1915E:231a-14: rdo rje phyag tu ldan pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:231a-16: byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje 'dzin pa ni ma yin pa'o //
T02TD1915E:231a-17: rnal 'byor pas bsgom pa'i yig 'bru de la yang don dam par rang ba zhin med /
T02TD1915E:231a-18: stong pa nyid kyi don bstan pa so dang mchu dang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1915E:231a-19: de la so dang mchu dang rka na dang lce zhes pa ni go sla'o //
T02TD1915E:231a-20: de dag 'dus nas byung ba'i yig 'bru'i sgra ni /
T02TD1915E:231a-21: mgul nas gang la yod pa ni //
T02TD1915E:231a-23: de'i phyir gang la de ni yig 'bru nyid ces te yig 'bru'i ngo bo med do zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
T02TD1915E:231a-25: de ni zad dang gnas phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:231a-26: zhes pa ste yig 'bru ksh'um de ni rang bzhin mi rtag par gnas pa'o //
T02TD1915E:231a-28: ka brjod tsam na sha med sha brjod tsam na ka thal te 'gro'o //
T02TD1915E:231a-29: de bzhin du zhabs skyed brjod tsam na ka dang sha thal te 'gro bas thig le ma byung /
T02TD1915E:231a-30: thig le brjod tsam na gong ma thal lo //
T02TD1915E:231a-31: de ltar mi rtog pa ni stong pa'o //
T02TD1915E:231a-32: de ltar yang byang chub sems 'grel las klu sgrub zhabs kyis gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:231a-33: mi rtag pa yi sems kyi ni //
T02TD1915E:231a-34: stong pa nyid du mi 'gal lo //
T02TD1915E:231b-1: 'o na yig 'bru'i rang bzhin byang chub sems ci 'dra ba 'dod ce na /
T02TD1915E:231b-3: brjod pa med cing the tshom pa //
T02TD1915E:231b-4: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1915E:231b-5: de la brjod pa med cing zhes pa ni ming dang gzugs kyi ngo bo med pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:231b-6: de ltar yang gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud phyi ma las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:231b-7: brjod du med pa'i bdag nyid chos //
T02TD1915E:231b-8: ming dang gzugs blo'i ngo bo med //
T02TD1915E:231b-10: the tshom pa zhes pa ni dngos po yod pa yang ma yin med pa yang ma yin pa'i chos nyid mya ngan las 'das par 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:231b-11: de ltar chos kyi sku'i bstod pa las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:231b-12: gang zhig gcig min du ma min //
T02TD1915E:231b-13: bdag gzhan phan phyir bkra shis rten //
T02TD1915E:231b-14: dngos po yod min med pa'ang min //
T02TD1915E:231b-15: nam mkha' 'dra bar ro mnyam pa //
T02TD1915E:231b-16: sdug bsngal med pa'i rang bzhin can //
T02TD1915E:231b-17: 'gyur pa med pa nyes med pa //
T02TD1915E:231b-18: zhi ba mnyam med mnyam pas na //
T02TD1915E:231b-19: khyab cing spros med dpe med pa'i //
T02TD1915E:231b-20: so sor rang rig rgyal ba yi //
T02TD1915E:231b-23: de ltar yang rin po che'i phreng ba las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:231b-24: dngos med mya ngan las 'das min //
T02TD1915E:231b-25: dngos nyid de ni gang la yin //
T02TD1915E:231b-26: dngos dang dngos med mchog 'dzin pa //
T02TD1915E:231b-27: zad pa mya ngan 'das par gsungs //
T02TD1915E:231b-29: sgra yig rnam par spangs pa yi //
T02TD1915E:231b-30: zhes pa ni aa la sogs pa bcu drug gi ngo bo me yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:231b-31: rang gi phyi nang zhes pa ni phyi nang gi skye mched bcu gnyis kyi ngo bor gnas pa'o //
T02TD1915E:231b-32: de bzhin nyid ces pa ni 'gyur ba med pa'o //
T02TD1915E:231b-33: de 'dra ba'i mtshan nyid ni byang chub sems ni rgyud 'dir gsungs so //
T02TD1915E:231b-35: lha mo bzhis yongs su zhus pa zhes pa ni rgyud kyi spyi'i mtshan te go sla'o //
T02TD1915E:231b-36: las zhes pa ni de'i nang du yang lha mo spyan mas yangs su zhus pa zhes pa ste /
T02TD1915E:231b-37: spyan mas gtsor sdud pa po byas pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:231b-38: le'u zhes pa ni rim par phye ba'o //
T02TD1915E:231b-39: dang po ni zhes pa ni gnyis pa'i gong ma'o //
T02TD1915E:231b-40: lha mo pi zhis yongs su zhus pa'i le'u dang po'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02TD1915E:231b-42: // / da ni le'u gnyis pa la chos kyi dbyings byang chub sems kyi rim pa m'a ma k'is zhus pa /
T02TD1915E:232a-1: m'a ma k'is zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1915E:232a-2: de la de nas zhes pa ni le'u dang po dang gnyis pa'i mgo mjug sbyor ba'i tshig go //
T02TD1915E:232a-3: lha mo zhes pa ni bshad zin to //
T02TD1915E:232a-4: lha mo yang de m'a ma k'i yang de nyid pas /
T02TD1915E:232a-5: lha mo m'a ma k'is zhes pa ste /
T02TD1915E:232a-6: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yum zhes bya ba'o //
T02TD1915E:232a-7: rdo rje can zhes pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste phyag na rdo rje dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:232a-8: la zhes pa ni zhus pa'i gnas bstan pa'o //
T02TD1915E:232a-9: 'di zhes pa ni 'og nas 'byung ba'i zhus tshig go //
T02TD1915E:232a-10: zhus te zhes pa ni zhu ba'i rim pa lnga gong du bshad zin to //
T02TD1915E:232a-11: byang chub sems zhes pa ni chos kyi dbyings so //
T02TD1915E:232a-12: de'i rim pa ni byang chub sems kyi rim pa'o zhes pa ste 'og tu 'byung ba'i gnas dang /
T02TD1915E:232a-13: kha dog gi rim par bskyed pa dang /
T02TD1915E:232a-16: kha snying lte ba gsang ba la /
T02TD1915E:232a-19: rdo rje chen pos zhes pa ni ston pa rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
T02TD1915E:232a-20: kun du khyab pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:232a-21: bka' stsal 'tshal zhes pa ni bshad zin to //
T02TD1915E:232a-22: cha shas rnam pa du zhig gsungs //
T02TD1915E:232a-23: zhes pa ni byang chub kyi sems yan lag gi sgo nas zhus pa'o //
T02TD1915E:232a-24: gnas kyi rnam pa bsgyur pa du //
T02TD1915E:232a-25: zhes pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi byang chub sems kyi gnas zhus pa'o //
T02TD1915E:232a-26: kha dog rnam pa du zhig gsungs //
T02TD1915E:232a-27: zhes pa ni chos kyi dbyings byang chub sems kyi kha dog gi rim pa zhus pa'o //
T02TD1915E:232a-28: de bzhin gdan yang ji ltar 'tshal //
T02TD1915E:232a-29: zhes pa ni chos kyi dbyings byang chub sems kyi gdan zhus pa'o //
T02TD1915E:232a-30: da ni ston pas lan gsungs pa //
T02TD1915E:232a-31: rdo rje can gyis bka' stsal pa //
T02TD1915E:232a-32: zhes pa ste gong du bshad zin to //
T02TD1915E:232a-33: cha shas rnam pa du zhig gsungs //
T02TD1915E:232a-35: cha shas bzhi dang mnyam ldan zhing //
T02TD1915E:232a-36: zhes pa ste yi ge ksha dang yi ge aom dang /
T02TD1915E:232a-38: yi ge a'a:rnams kyi cha bzhi dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:232a-39: gnas kyi rnam pa bsgyur ba du //
T02TD1915E:232a-41: padma bzhi la yang dag gnas //
T02TD1915E:232a-42: zhes pa ste kha'i padma dang /
T02TD1915E:232a-46: kha dog rnam pa du zhig gsungs //
T02TD1915E:232a-47: de bzhin gdan yang ji ltar 'tshal //
T02TD1915E:232b-0: snying gi padma la gnas gnag / ces pa la sogs pa @232b ste de la snying gi padma la gnas gnag ces pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi yi ge aom kyi gzugs su kha dog gnag par gnas pa'o //
T02TD1915E:232b-1: kha yi padma la gnas dkar //
T02TD1915E:232b-2: zhes pa ste chos kyi dbyings kyi ksha'i gzugs su mdog dkar bar gnas pa'o //
T02TD1915E:232b-3: nga ro lte pa'i padmar gnas //
T02TD1915E:232b-4: zhes pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi yi ge h'um gi gzugs kha dog dmar par gnas pa'o //
T02TD1915E:232b-5: gsang ba'i padmar nga ro mtha' //
T02TD1915E:232b-7: chos kyi dbyings kyi yi ge aa'i gzugs su kha dog ser bar gnas pa'o //
T02TD1915E:232b-9: stabs kyis mtha' ru 'gro byed nas //
T02TD1915E:232b-10: zhes pa ste chags pa'i dus su 'jig rten kun bskyed par byas nas /
T02TD1915E:232b-11: 'jig pa'i dus su yang thig le'i dbyings su chos kyi dbyings byang chub sems /
T02TD1915E:232b-12: thig le'i sbyor bas rab tu gnas //
T02TD1915E:232b-14: de lta bu'i rim pas bskyed pa'i don te gsal por gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:232b-15: snom byed pa dang thos byed pa dang gang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1915E:232b-16: de la snom byed ces pa ni sna'i rnam par shes pas dri la byed pa'o //
T02TD1915E:232b-17: de bzhin du thos byed la sogs pa yang shes par bya'o //
T02TD1915E:232b-18: dbang po'i go rims 'khrul na yang bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' la skur ba gdab par mi bya ste mdo sde gzhan du rim par shes par bya'o //
T02TD1915E:232b-19: de la bde ba zhes pa ni sim pa'o //
T02TD1915E:232b-20: bde ba ma yin sdug bsngal zhes pa ni sim pa ma yin pa'o //
T02TD1915E:232b-21: de gnyis dbang po dang yul dang rnam par shes pa gsum 'dus pa las myong ba ni tshong ba'o //
T02TD1915E:232b-22: tshor ba de yang chos kyi dbyings kyis byed pas na tshor byed ces so //
T02TD1915E:232b-23: de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa nas /
T02TD1915E:232b-24: mig gi 'dus te reg pas tshor ba dang zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1915E:232b-25: gang las zhes pa la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02TD1915E:232b-26: 'byed pa zhes pa ni shing la sogs pa gnyis su gyur pa'o //
T02TD1915E:232b-27: gcod pa zhes pa ni sta re la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1915E:232b-28: de kho nas zhes pa ni de dag kyang chos kyi dbyings kyis byed do zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
T02TD1915E:232b-29: cho ga rnam pa mang po shes //
T02TD1915E:232b-30: zhes pa ni de las gzhan yang 'jig rten gyi gtsug lag thams cad do //
T02TD1915E:232b-31: rgyal po'i rigs su gyur pa la sogs pa'i ris kyang chos kyi dbyings las gzhan med pa'i don bstan pa /
T02TD1915E:232b-32: rgyal po'i don yang byed 'gyur dang //
T02TD1915E:232b-33: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1915E:232b-34: de la rgyal po zhes pa ni rnam pa gnyis te 'khor los sgyur pa'i rgyal po dang /
T02TD1915E:232b-36: de gnyis rgyal bar byed pa ni /
T02TD1915E:233a-4: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhi la /
T02TD1915E:233a-5: gser gyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos ni /
T02TD1915E:233a-6: gling bzhi mkhar gyi rgyal po la sogs pa tshur 'ong nas mnga' dbul te rgyal po'o //
T02TD1915E:233a-7: dngul gyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos ni byang sgra mi snyan ma gtogs pa gling gsum la phar 'gro ste 'dul nas rgyal po'o //
T02TD1915E:233a-8: zangs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos ni sgra mi snyan dang /
T02TD1915E:233a-9: lus 'phags ma gtogs pa gling gnyis la phar 'gro ste /
T02TD1915E:233a-10: g-yul bshams nas 'dul bas rgyal po'o //
T02TD1915E:233a-11: lcags kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni sgra mi snyan dang /
T02TD1915E:233a-13: ban glang spyod gsum ma gtogs pa 'dzam bu gling gcig la phar 'gro ste /
T02TD1915E:233a-15: de ltar yang chos mngon pa mdzod las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:233a-16: gser dngul zangs lcags 'khor lo can //
T02TD1915E:233a-17: de dag gling gcig gling gnyis dang //
T02TD1915E:233a-18: gsum dang bzhi la mas rim bzhin //
T02TD1915E:233a-19: lhan cig gnyis min sangs rgyas bzhin //
T02TD1915E:233a-20: phas bsu rang 'gro g-yul bsham dang /
T02TD1915E:233a-21: mtshon brtsams pas rgyal gnod pa med //
T02TD1915E:233a-23: mkhar gyi rgyal po rnams ni //
T02TD1915E:233a-24: dmag gi dpung gi stobs kyis pha rol la gnon pa byas te 'dul bas rgyal po'o //
T02TD1915E:233a-25: de rnams kyang dbyings kyi rang bzhin las gzhan med pa'i don to //
T02TD1915E:233a-26: yang zhes pa'i sgra ni don gzhan snyeg pa'o //
T02TD1915E:233a-27: dbang phyug don yang de bzhin du //
T02TD1915E:233a-28: zhes pa ni shing s'a la lta bu phyug pa'i khyim bdag gi longs spyod byed pa yang chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin yin pa'o //
T02TD1915E:233a-29: de bas na gzhan yang bran du gyur pa'i sems can dang sdug bsngal pa'i sems can yang chos kyi dbyings byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin kho na don gyis shes par bya ste /
T02TD1915E:233a-30: chos kun gnyis su med pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:233a-31: de ltar yang gsang chen thams cad rgyud las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:233a-32: chos bdag med pa las byung ba //
T02TD1915E:233a-33: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes mchog / chos nyid dam pa ye shes ni //
T02TD1915E:233a-34: chos kyi dbyings zhes bya ba'o //
T02TD1915E:233a-36: bram ze zhes pa ni bskal pa dang po na dgon par bsnyags shing khyim spangs te /
T02TD1915E:233a-38: rgyal po zhes pa ni bskal ba dang po na rkun ma tshar gcod pa'i don du 'bras s'a lu'i zhing srung ba'i srung mar bskos pa'o //
T02TD1915E:233a-39: rje'u rigs dang zhes pa ni /
T02TD1915E:233b-0: bskal pa dang por @233b phyugs la brten pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:233b-1: dmangs rigs zhes pa ni bskal ba dang por zhing la brten cing gnas pa'o //
