T02TD1915E:233b-2: smad pa zhes pa ni rigs ni lnga ste /
T02TD1915E:233b-7: smad pa'i las la 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:233b-8: de dag dang po bzung nas brgyud pa'i rim pa ni rigs rnams dang zhes pa'o //
T02TD1915E:233b-9: de ltar yang gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud phyi ma las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:233b-10: rigs ni brgyud mar bstan pa ste /
T02TD1915E:233b-11: rgyud ni thog ma zhes bya'o //
T02TD1915E:233b-13: bud med du ma sprul bar byed //
T02TD1915E:233b-14: ces pa ni bskal ba dang po kho na la 'od gsal gyi lha babs pa pho 'ba' zhig kho na las 'dod chags kyi dbang gis mo'i gzugs su sprul pa'o //
T02TD1915E:233b-15: de dag kyang chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin ma bskyed pa las gzhan med ces pa'i tha tshig go //
T02TD1915E:233b-16: dud 'gro yi dags skye ba dang //
T02TD1915E:233b-17: zhes pa ni yig 'bru bcom zin to //
T02TD1915E:233b-18: gzugs can rnams dang zhes pa ni /
T02TD1915E:233b-19: gzugs kyi khams bsam gtan bzhi'i lha ste ;
T02TD1915E:233b-20: gzugs kyi khams la chags nas skye ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:233b-21: de la bsam gtan dang po'i gnas gsum ste tshangs ris dang /
T02TD1915E:233b-24: bsam gtan gnyis pa la yang gnas gsum ste 'od chung dang /
T02TD1915E:233b-27: bsam gtan gsum pa la yang gnas gsum ste /
T02TD1915E:233b-31: bsam gtan bzhi pa ni gnas brgyad de /
T02TD1915E:233b-35: de la gtogs pa gnas gtsang ma lnga ste /
T02TD1915E:233b-40: 'og min ni gnas bcu bdun no //
T02TD1915E:233b-41: de ltar yang chos mngon pa mdzod las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:233b-42: gong ma'i gnas dag bcu bdun ni //
T02TD1915E:233b-43: gzugs khams yin de so so yi //
T02TD1915E:233b-44: bsam gtan sa ni gsum pa yang //
T02TD1915E:233b-45: bzhi pa sa ni brgyad pa yin //
T02TD1915E:233b-47: gzugs med dang zhes pa ni /
T02TD1915E:233b-48: gzugs med pa'i khams kyi sems can bzhi ste /
T02TD1915E:233b-49: gnas ni med pa gzugs med pa'i khams la chags nas skye ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:233b-51: nam mkha' yas skye mched dang /
T02TD1915E:233b-52: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /
T02TD1915E:233b-53: ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang /
T02TD1915E:233b-54: yod min med min skye mched bzhi'o //
T02TD1915E:234a-1: mngon pa mdzod las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:234a-2: gzugs med khams na gnas med de //
T02TD1915E:234a-3: skye ba las ni rnam pa bzhi //
T02TD1915E:234a-5: de bzhin 'dod pa'i srid rnams las //
T02TD1915E:234a-6: zhes pa ni 'dod khams gnas ris nyi shu ste /
T02TD1915E:234a-7: 'dod pa la chags nas skye ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:234a-9: dmyal pa chen po brgyad de /
T02TD1915E:234a-25: sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang /
T02TD1915E:234a-29: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams te nyi shu'o //
T02TD1915E:234a-30: de ltar yang chos mngon pa mdzod las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:234a-31: dmyal ba yi dgas dud 'gro dang //
T02TD1915E:234a-32: mi rnams dang ni lha drug dag /'dod pa'i khams yin dmyal ba dang ;
T02TD1915E:234a-33: / gling dbye ba la de nyi shu //
T02TD1915E:234a-35: 'byung ba thams cad ces pa ni sa dang /
T02TD1915E:234a-39: de dag kyang chos kyi dbyings las skye ba'i phyir skyed byed pa zhes so //
T02TD1915E:234a-40: de kho na nyid ces pa ni chos kyi dbyings so //
T02TD1915E:234a-41: de stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gyur pa ni /
T02TD1915E:234a-42: de kho na nyid rdzu 'phrul gnas zhes pa ste gcig las du mar gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:234a-43: mo gzugs dang ni zhes pa ni skad phra ba dang /
T02TD1915E:234a-45: mo'i dbang po rnams kyis mtshan pa'o //
T02TD1915E:234a-46: pho'i gzugs zhes pa ni nga ro'i skad dang /
T02TD1915E:234a-49: de gnyis kyi 'khrig pa'i 'dod pa'i bde ba ngo bor yang chos kyi dbyings byang chub sems gnas pas na /
T02TD1915E:234a-50: bde ba chen po'i go 'phang gnas //
T02TD1915E:234a-52: de ltar zhes pa ni gong du bstan pa'i don la snyeg pa'o //
T02TD1915E:234a-53: de bzhin nyid ces pa ni 'gyur ba med cing kun du khyab pa'o //
T02TD1915E:234a-54: shes pa zhes pa ni rtogs nas don dam pa'i yig 'bru mya ngan las 'das pa'i ngo bo ksha aom h'um a'a:shes pa'i rnal 'byor pa gang de ni gsang chen shes pa ste yig 'bru bshad zin to //
T02TD1915E:234a-55: de ci 'dra ba yin zhe na khyad par gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:234a-56: gang des bdag nyid kun gnas pa //
T02TD1915E:234a-57: zhes pa de bcud dang snod kyi rang bzhin du gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:234b-0: gong du bstan pa'i yig @234b 'bru'i kha dog gi 'phro bstan pa /
T02TD1915E:234b-1: kha dog med cing kha dog dmar //
T02TD1915E:234b-2: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1915E:234b-3: de la kha dog med cing zhes pa ni nag po ste /
T02TD1915E:234b-4: dkar po la sogs pa kha dog med pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:234b-5: kha dog dmar zhes pa la sogs pa ste go sla'o //
T02TD1915E:234b-6: thig le'i gzugs su gyur pa de //
T02TD1915E:234b-7: zhes pa ni yig 'bru de dag tsa na ka'i tshad kyi thig le'i dbus su gnas pa'o //
T02TD1915E:234b-9: zhes pa ni padma rnam pa bzhi las phyir 'gro ba la khams gsum du khyab cing phyir bsdu pa'i don to //
T02TD1915E:234b-10: don de kho na gsal por bstan pa /
T02TD1915E:234b-11: gang de rig pa rdzu 'phrul che //
T02TD1915E:234b-12: mtha' yas bcas pa sna tshogs gzugs //
T02TD1915E:234b-13: zhes pa ste gang chos kyi dbyings de rig pa rdzu 'phrul che zhes pa ste gcig las du ma'i las byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:234b-14: mtha' yas bcas pa zhes pa ni gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten grangs med par gyur pa'o //
T02TD1915E:234b-15: mtha' yas bcas pa yang de /
T02TD1915E:234b-16: sna tshogs gzugs kyang de bas na //
T02TD1915E:234b-17: mtha' yas bcas pa sna tshogs gzugs //
T02TD1915E:234b-18: zhes pa ste sems can gyi las kyi dbang gis bcud sna tshogs pa'o //
T02TD1915E:234b-20: bcud kyi 'jig rten 'gro ba rigs lnga'i nang na che ba dang /
T02TD1915E:234b-31: mi bde ba la sogs pa sna tshogs pa'o //
T02TD1915E:234b-32: snod kyi 'jig rten la ni dkar po dang /
T02TD1915E:234b-40: phya le ba ma yin pa dang /
T02TD1915E:234b-42: ri rab la sogs pa sna tshogs pa'o //
T02TD1915E:234b-43: de ltar yang chos mngon pa mdzod las gsungs pa ;
T02TD1915E:234b-44: las las 'jig rten sna tshogs skye //
T02TD1915E:234b-46: de ltar khams gsum du khyab pa'i byang chub kyi sems chos kyi dbyings dang po skye ba dang /
T02TD1915E:234b-47: 'jig rten pa'i dus su bsdu pa'i don yang gsal por byed pa gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:234b-48: skye dang bsdus na zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1915E:234b-49: de la skye ba dang zhes pa ni snod dang bcud chags pa'o //
T02TD1915E:234b-51: chags pa'i bskal pa la nam mkha' la sems can gyi las kyi dbang gis rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang /
T02TD1915E:235a-0: sum cu rtsa gsum nas bsam gtan gsum pa'i bar du mas bar gyi bskal pa @235a * //
T02TD1915E:235a-2: bcud ni bsam gtan bzhi pa'i lha rnams gzhal yas khang dang bcas par skye ste /
T02TD1915E:235a-3: de las mar bab ba mnar med pa'i dmyal ba na gcig skyes pa'i par dang /
T02TD1915E:235a-4: bar gyi bskal ba bcu dgu'i dus tshad do //
T02TD1915E:235a-5: bsdus na 'jig pa la zhes pa ni 'jig pa'i bskal pa med pa 'jig pa'i 'jig rten mnar med pa'i dmyal ba na dmyal ba mi skye ste /
T02TD1915E:235a-6: 'jig rten gzhan gyi dmyal ba na skyer song ba dang po bzung nas yar 'pho ste bsam gtan bzhi pa'i lha gzhal yas khang dang bcas par mi snang pa'i bar du bar gyi bskal ba bcu dgur ro //
T02TD1915E:235a-7: snod 'jig pa ni mes 'jig pa'i dus su mnar med pa'i dmyal ba pa nas bsam gtan dang po'i bar du 'jig pa dang /
T02TD1915E:235a-8: chus 'jig pa'i dus su bsam gtan gnyis pa'i bar du 'jig pa dang /
T02TD1915E:235a-9: rlung gis 'jig pa'i dus su bsam gtan gsum pa'i bar du 'jig go //
T02TD1915E:235a-10: de ltar 'jig rten skye ba dang /
T02TD1915E:235a-11: 'jig pa'i dus su byang chub sems chos kyi dbyings yig 'bru can thig le'i gzugs su bsdus nas rab tu gnas so zhes so //
T02TD1915E:235a-12: da ni yon tan gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:235a-13: gang gis brgyad khri rtsa bzhi'i chos //
T02TD1915E:235a-14: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1915E:235a-15: de la gang zhig ces pa ni rnal 'byor pa'am mkhas pa spyi la shes par bya'o //
T02TD1915E:235a-16: brgyad khri rtsa bzhi'i chos zhes pa ni sems can gyi nyon mongs pa brgyad khri rtsa bzhi'i gnyen po'o //
T02TD1915E:235a-17: lam gyi bden pa chos kyi phung po brgyad khri rtsa bzhi'i chos bstan pa'o //
T02TD1915E:235a-18: phrag de gcig nas gnyis su brtsis pa stong phrag brgya zhes pa ni 'bum phrag gcig go //
T02TD1915E:235a-19: de snyed chos kyi don shes na yang mkhas pa de yis chos kyi dbyings de nyid mi shes pa ste rtogs pa ma yin no zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
T02TD1915E:235a-20: de bas na chos kyi dbyings de kho na nyid shes ma thag chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong shes pa'i mkhas pa de dag kun kyang bla na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'bras bu med do zhes pa'o //
T02TD1915E:235a-21: da ni gong gi cha shas kyi yi ge svas bstan pa /
T02TD1915E:235a-22: bcu gnyis lnga yi lnga pa yang //
T02TD1915E:235a-23: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1915E:235a-24: de la bcu gnyis zhes pa ni aa las brtsis pa'i yi ge bcu gnyis kyi mtha' ma aa'o //
T02TD1915E:235a-25: lnga'i zhes pa ni pa'i sde ste ka'i sde las brtsis pa'i lnga pa ni pa'i sde'o //
T02TD1915E:235a-26: de'i lnga pa zhes pa ni /
T02TD1915E:235a-27: pa las brtsis pa'i yi ge ma'o //
T02TD1915E:235a-28: des aom gyi klad kor byas ma thag aom 'dod pa'o //
T02TD1915E:235b-0: brgyad kyi mtha' @235b zhes pa ni yi ge ya las brtsis pa'i yi ge ha'o //
T02TD1915E:235b-1: 'byung ba 'dus zhes pa ni 'byung ba chen po bzhis bskor pa'i ha'o //
T02TD1915E:235b-2: sgra yig dang po yi ge aa //
T02TD1915E:235b-4: lnga pa yis ni zhes pa ni yi ge ma'o //
T02TD1915E:235b-5: des aa la klad kor byas pa ste yang dag brgyan zhes pa ni yi ge aom mo /
T02TD1915E:235b-6: snying rje chen po las byung ba /
T02TD1915E:235b-7: zhes pa ni yi ge ka'o //
T02TD1915E:235b-8: rgya gar gyi skad la ka ka ru zhes bya ba ni snying rje yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:235b-9: drug pa zhes pa ni ya las brtsis pa'i yi ge sha'o //
T02TD1915E:235b-10: de'i yi ge ka la btags pa ni drug pas btags pa de zhes te yi ge ksha'o //
T02TD1915E:235b-11: kha mar lta zhes pa ni /
T02TD1915E:235b-12: kha'i padmar mgo mar lta ba bsgom pa'o //
T02TD1915E:235b-13: yi ge 'bru de'i khyad par gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:235b-14: gdod ma tha ma med pa'i lha //
T02TD1915E:235b-16: de la gdod ma zhes pa ni skye ba'o //
T02TD1915E:235b-17: tha ma zhes pa ni 'jig pa'o //
T02TD1915E:235b-18: de gnyis med pa'i rang bzhin yig 'bru yin pas na gdod ma tha ma med ces pa ste /
T02TD1915E:235b-19: mu stegs pa'i byed pa po ltar sdon du byas pa ma yin pa'i phyir dang /
T02TD1915E:235b-20: rdo rje lta bu don dam par 'jig pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:235b-22: gdod ma tha ma ni nam mkha' las 'byung pa'i mtshan ma tsam nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:235b-23: de ltar mnyam spyor gyi rgyud phyi ma las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:235b-24: nam mkha' las byung mtshan ma'i phyir //
T02TD1915E:235b-25: gdod ma tha ma med pa'i mchog / ces pa'o //
T02TD1915E:235b-26: lha zhes pa ni yig 'bru de dag 'od zer dang ldan pa'i phyir dang /
T02TD1915E:235b-27: rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:235b-28: der ni spyi bor bstan pa yin //
T02TD1915E:235b-29: zhes pa ni yi ge ksha gong na bzhag pa'i tha tshig go //
T02TD1915E:235b-30: de dag ces pa ni yig 'bru bzhi po de dag chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir na gsang chen zhes te bshad zin to //
T02TD1915E:235b-31: dam pa zhes pa ni yig 'bru de dag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sku'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:235b-32: lha mo zhes pa ni m'a ma k'i ste bod pa'i tshig go //
T02TD1915E:235b-33: bdag gis zhes pa ni ston pa rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02TD1915E:235b-34: rab tu bstan no zhes pa ni byang chub sems chos kyi dbyings kyi rim pa bshad zin to zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
T02TD1915E:235b-35: lha mo bzhis yongs su zhus pa las zhes pa ni gong ma dang mthun /
T02TD1915E:235b-36: gnyis pa'o zhes pa ni dang po'i 'og ma'o //
T02TD1915E:235b-37: lha mo bzhis yongs su zhus pa'i le'u gnyis pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02TD1915E:235b-39: // / da ni le'u gsum pa la /
T02TD1915E:235b-40: chos kyi dbyings byang chub sems bsdu ba lha mo na bza' dkar mos zhus pa /
T02TD1915E:236a-0: @236a * // de nas gos dkar mos zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1915E:236a-1: de la de nas zhes pa ni le'u gnyis pa dang gsum pa la mgo mjug 'brel ba'i tshig go //
T02TD1915E:236a-2: lha mo zhes pa ni bshad zin to //
T02TD1915E:236a-3: de nas gos dkar mos zhes pa ni rgyud gzhan gyi nang nas sku mdog dkar ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:236a-4: yang na lha mo na bza' kha dog dkar ba bsnams pa la btags pa'i mtshan ma ste /
T02TD1915E:236a-5: 'dul ba la gos dkar can gyi sde zhes pa btags pa bzhin no //
T02TD1915E:236a-6: yan lag kun gyis btud nas su //
T02TD1915E:236a-7: zhes pa ni lus kun sa la brkyang nas phyag byas te shin tu rab tu ston pa po bskul ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:236a-8: thal mo snyim pa sbyar byas te //
T02TD1915E:236a-9: zhes pa ni lan gsum bskor ba byas nas mdun du pus mo'i lha nga sa la btsugs te /
T02TD1915E:236a-10: snying gar snyim pa'i thal mo sbyar nas /
T02TD1915E:236a-11: rdo rje sems dpa' la gsol ba zhes pa'o //
T02TD1915E:236a-12: zhu ba'i rim pa de ni lha mo gzhan la yang shes par bya'o //
T02TD1915E:236a-14: chos kyi dbyings kyi bsdu ba dang //
T02TD1915E:236a-16: thub pa chen pos bka' stsol mdzod //
T02TD1915E:236a-18: de la chos kyi dbyings zhes pa ni bshad zin to //
T02TD1915E:236a-19: bsdu ba dang zhes pa ni gcig tu gyur pa'i don du zhus pa'o //
T02TD1915E:236a-20: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi //
T02TD1915E:236a-21: zhes pa ni sku'i rdo rje dang /
T02TD1915E:236a-23: thugs kyi rdo rje'i ngo bor byang chub sems bsdu ba zhus pa'o //
T02TD1915E:236a-24: rang bzhin nyid ni ji ltar lags //
T02TD1915E:236a-25: zhes pa ni thabs dang shes rab kyi ngo bor bsdu ba'i don zhus pa'o //
T02TD1915E:236a-26: lha'i dbang phyug ces pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
T02TD1915E:236a-27: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsor gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:236a-28: de la bod cing gsol ba btab pa ni khyod la zhu zhes pa ste /
T02TD1915E:236a-29: sems can gyi don du bdag gzhan phye ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:236a-30: gang gi 'od kyis gong bur bsdu //
T02TD1915E:236a-31: zhes pa ni bdud rtsi'i ngo bo 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'od kyi gong bu'i sgo nas zhus pa'o //
T02TD1915E:236a-32: rdo rje sems dpa' ji ltar lags //
T02TD1915E:236a-33: zhes pa ni 'od kyi gong bu de rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bor yang bsdu ba zhus pa'o //
T02TD1915E:236a-34: gsungs shig de nyid yig 'bru'i tshig /'dus pa ji ltar 'gyur ba lags //
T02TD1915E:236a-35: zhes pa ni sngags kyi sgo nas bsdu ba zhus pa'o //
T02TD1915E:236a-36: chu yi khams dang me yi khams //
T02TD1915E:236a-37: ji ltar ro ni mnyam por 'gyur //
T02TD1915E:236a-38: zhes pa ni sa'i khams dang /
T02TD1915E:236b-1: rnam par shes pa'i khams drug gi dngos po'i sems can gyi phung po chu dang me'i khams ji ltar 'du bar 'gyur zhes zhus pa'o //
T02TD1915E:236b-2: de kho na yang rgyas par zhus pa /
T02TD1915E:236b-3: ma las skye ba'i gsum tsam dang //
T02TD1915E:236b-4: de bzhin pha las skye ba gsum //
T02TD1915E:236b-5: de dag drug rdzogs gong bu las //
T02TD1915E:236b-6: ji ltar mi rnams skye ba lags //
T02TD1915E:236b-7: zhes pa ste 'jig rten pa'i phung po gong bu'i sgo nas zhus pa'o //
T02TD1915E:236b-8: sangs rgyas gzugs ni bdag mi 'tshal //
T02TD1915E:236b-9: zhes pa ni phung po'i sgo nas bsdu ba la zhus pa'o //
T02TD1915E:236b-10: thub pa chen pos bka' stsol mdzod //
T02TD1915E:236b-11: ces pa ni zhus pa'i tshig bsdus pa ste /
T02TD1915E:236b-12: de la thub pa chen po zhes pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
T02TD1915E:236b-13: sku gsung thugs rtag par mnyam par gzhag pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:236b-15: rdo rje can gyis bka' stsal pa /
T02TD1915E:236b-16: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1915E:236b-17: de la rdo rje can gyis bka' stsal pa //
T02TD1915E:236b-18: zhes pa ni bshad zin to //
T02TD1915E:236b-19: de la re zhig / chos kyi dbyings kyi bsdu ba dang //
T02TD1915E:236b-21: gsang las shin tu gsang 'gyur pa //
T02TD1915E:236b-22: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1915E:236b-23: de la gsang zhes pa ni gsang ba'i rdo rje'o //
T02TD1915E:236b-24: shin tu gsang 'gyur ba zhes pa ni gsang ba'i padma'o //
T02TD1915E:236b-25: de ltar yang gsang ba'i nor bu thig le'i rgyud las gsungs pa ;
T02TD1915E:236b-26: rdo rje de ni gsang ba ste //
T02TD1915E:236b-27: de las padma shin tu gsang //
T02TD1915E:236b-29: nyon cig lha mo bshad par bya //
T02TD1915E:236b-30: zhes pa ni gsang ba'i tshig ste yig 'bru bshad zin to //
T02TD1915E:236b-31: shin tu gsang ba de kho na'i don bshad pa /
T02TD1915E:236b-32: skye gnas dbus su rtsa gnyis ni //
T02TD1915E:236b-33: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1915E:236b-34: de la skye gnas zhes pa ni gsang ba'i padma'o //
T02TD1915E:236b-35: de'i dkyil ni skye gnas dbus su zhes so //
T02TD1915E:236b-36: de bya lce'i g-yas g-yon gyi rtsa ni rtsa gnyis ni g-yon dang de bzhin g-yas pa ste zhes so //
T02TD1915E:236b-37: de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis gsal bar gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:236b-38: g-yon du byang chub sems zhes pa ni g-yon gyi rtsa las ni lhag pa'i byang chub sems 'bab pa'o zhes pa'i don to //
T02TD1915E:236b-40: zhes pa ni g-yas pa'i rtsa la ni rakta 'bab pa'o //
T02TD1915E:237a-0: de gnyis phrad nas zhes pa ni thabs dang shes rab rol ba'i dus su rtsa de gnyis las byang chub sems dang rakta bde ba chen po'i ngo bo babs @237a * //
T02TD1915E:237a-1: te chu dang 'o ma 'dres pa ltar gcig par gyur pa zhes so //
T02TD1915E:237a-3: kye lha mo chos kyi dbyings ni 'dus pa yin //
T02TD1915E:237a-5: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi //
T02TD1915E:237a-6: rang bzhin nyid ni ji ltar lags //
T02TD1915E:237a-8: mun pa sku de rdul gsung gzugs //
T02TD1915E:237a-9: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1915E:237a-10: de la mun pa zhes pa ni ma rig pa'i mun pa'o //
T02TD1915E:237a-11: de'i rang bzhin gnas gyur pa ni sku zhes pa ste sku'i rdo rje'o //
T02TD1915E:237a-12: rdul zhes pa ni 'dod chags te /
T02TD1915E:237a-13: de'i rang bzhin gnas gyur pa ni gsung zhes pa ste gsung gi rdo rje'o //
T02TD1915E:237a-14: gzugs zhes pa ni yang ba gsal ba'o //
T02TD1915E:237a-15: de sems kyi rang bzhin yin pas gzugs thugs kyi rang bzhin zhes so //
T02TD1915E:237a-16: de nas snying stobs te zhes pa ste thugs kyi rdo rje'o //
T02TD1915E:237a-17: de ltar mun pa dang rdul dang snying stobs sku gsung thugs zhes shes par bya'o //
T02TD1915E:237a-18: de yum gyi don bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis yang gsal por bstan pa /
T02TD1915E:237a-19: rdul ni rakta byang sems ni //
T02TD1915E:237a-20: mun pa de bzhin bskyed pa yin //
T02TD1915E:237a-21: zhes pa ste de la rdul ni rakta zhes pa ni rakta la mu stegs pas rdul zhes btags pa ste /
T02TD1915E:237a-22: ras gsher ba la rdul chags pa bzhin du 'dod chags chen po'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:237a-23: byang chub sems ni mun pa zhes pa ni lhag pa'i byang chub sems khu ba la mu stegs pas mun pa zhes btags te gti mug chen po'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:237a-24: de bzhin bskyed pa min zhes pa ni de bzhin du rgyu 'bras la zhe sdang ba'i rang bzhin gnyis su med pa'i ye shes can skye ba'i ngo bor gyur pa la mu stegs pas snying stobs zhes btags te /
T02TD1915E:237a-25: de gsum 'dus nas skye bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:237a-28: snying stobs kyi rang bzhin sku gsung thugs de ji ltar rang bzhin cig tu gyur zhe na bshad pa /
T02TD1915E:237a-29: rdo rje padma mnyam sbyar nas //
T02TD1915E:237a-30: rang bzhin mnyam pa'i ror 'gyur ro //
T02TD1915E:237a-32: thabs dang shes rab phyag rgya'i gsang bar rdo rje dang padma sbyor ba'i bde ba chen po las sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa ro gcig tu 'gyur ba'o zhes pa ste /
T02TD1915E:237a-33: yang dag par sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin las dbyer med pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:237a-34: gang gi 'od kyis gong bur bsdu //
T02TD1915E:237a-36: dri chen chu dang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1915E:237b-0: de la dri chen @237b zhes pa ni bshang gci'o //
T02TD1915E:237b-1: chu dang zhes pa ni gsang ba'i rdo rje'i chu'o //
T02TD1915E:237b-2: shel zhes pa ni lus kyi sna las byung ba ste /
T02TD1915E:237b-3: shel dang kha dog mthun pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:237b-4: me tog ces pa ni padma rakta ste /
T02TD1915E:237b-5: 'bras bu la nye ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:237b-6: de bzhin lnga pa byang chub sems //
T02TD1915E:237b-7: zhes pa ni lhag pa'i byang chub sems khu ba ste /
T02TD1915E:237b-8: byang chub sems dang 'dra ba'i bde ba chen po'i sems skyed par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:237b-9: lnga pa zhes pa'i sgras ni drug dang bzhi sun dbyung ba ste sha chen la sogs pa'i lcags kyu lnga la gtogs pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:237b-10: de bas na bdud rtsi ni lnga kho nar shes par bya'o //
T02TD1915E:237b-11: rdzas de rnams bdud rtsi lnga zhes pa ste /
T02TD1915E:237b-12: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gzhom pa'i rtsi yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:237b-14: dri chen dang chu'i ni lus kyi rims dang 'bras gzhom pa'o //
T02TD1915E:237b-15: shel gyis ni 'tshe ba dang nad med pa 'phel bar byed pa'o //
T02TD1915E:237b-16: de rnams ni 'jig pa'i yon tan no //
T02TD1915E:237b-17: me tog gis ni sku gsung thugs grub par byed pa'o //
T02TD1915E:237b-18: byang chub sems kyis ni ye shes shes bya grub par byed pa'o ;
T02TD1915E:237b-19: / de dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yon tan no //
T02TD1915E:237b-20: de ltar rdzas de lngas nad dang 'tshe ba'i bar chad la sogs pa'i 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal 'joms pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud rtsi zhes bstan to //
T02TD1915E:237b-21: de ltar yang bdud rtsi'i rgyud las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:237b-22: ye shes shes bya bsgrub pa'i phyir //
T02TD1915E:237b-24: de lnga dang dbyer med pa'i 'od kyi gong bu ni bdud rtsi lnga dngos gong bur bsdus zhes pa ste /
T02TD1915E:237b-25: 'od kyi gong bu dang bdud rtsi lnga tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:237b-26: da ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'od kyi gong bur bsdu ba bstan pa'o //
T02TD1915E:237b-27: rdo rje sems dpa' ji ltar lags //
T02TD1915E:237b-29: de las rdo rje 'dir gsungs so zhes pa ste /
T02TD1915E:237b-30: 'od kyi gong bu 'dus pa de las grub pa rdo rje sems dpa'i rgyud 'dir gsungs so zhes pa ste /
T02TD1915E:237b-31: mngon par shes pa lnga'i rang bzhin ye shes lnga dang rigs lnga'i ngo bo bdud rtsi lnga las grub pa'i bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:237b-32: gsungs shig de nyid yig 'bru'i tshig /
T02TD1915E:237b-33: ces pa'i lan btab pa cha shas gnyis pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1915E:237b-34: de la cha shas gnyis pa dang ldan pa zhes pa ni yig 'bru ksha de ka dang sha brtsegs pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:237b-35: yig 'bru de gsal bar mdzad pas yang gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:237b-36: de bzhin dgu pa yang yin no //
T02TD1915E:237b-38: ya'i sde las brtsis pa'i dgu pa ni yi ge ksha kho na'o //
T02TD1915E:238a-2: ksha de la ma dang ra dang ya btags nas zhabs skyed ring por byas te /
T02TD1915E:238a-3: zla tshes dang thig le brtsegs pa'i yig 'bru kshmry'um 'dod de de ni man ngag go //
T02TD1915E:238a-4: don de gsal bar mdzad pas bcom ldan 'das nyid yang gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:238a-5: de skad gsungs pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1915E:238a-6: de la sum cu zhes pa ni ri r'i li l'i ma brtsis pa'i yi ge aa las brtsis pa'i ha'i bar du'o //
T02TD1915E:238a-7: bcu dang ni zhes pa ni yi ge dha nas brtsis pa'i ra'i bar du'o //
T02TD1915E:238a-8: de bzhin lnga pa zhes pa ni yi ge la nas ha'i bar du'o //
T02TD1915E:238a-9: sa bon zhes pa ni ha de'i 'og ma yi ge ksha'o //
T02TD1915E:238a-10: cha shas gnyis pa zhes pa ni ksha'i dngos bstan pa'o //
T02TD1915E:238a-11: lnga yis zhes pa ni ksha la ma dang ra dang ya dang thig le byas pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi yig 'bru bsdu ba dang gsungs pa'o zhes pa'o //
T02TD1915E:238a-12: 'dus pa ji ltar gyur pa lags //
T02TD1915E:238a-14: yig 'bru bhr'um dang chos kyi dbyings yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1915E:238a-15: de la yig 'bru bhr'um zhes pa ni go sla'o //
T02TD1915E:238a-16: chos kyi dbyings yang zhes pa ni gong gi yi ge kshmry'am ngo //
T02TD1915E:238a-17: skye gnas padma zhes pa ni gsang ba'i padma'o //
T02TD1915E:238a-18: la gnas pa zhes pa ni gsang ba'i padmar yi ge de rnams bkod pa'o //
T02TD1915E:238a-19: yig 'bru de gnyis 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir na de nyid ces so //
T02TD1915E:238a-20: de nyid sa bon zhes pa ni skye ba rnams kyi rgyur gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:238a-21: sv'a h'a mtha' zhes pa ni /
T02TD1915E:238a-22: sngags kyis mtha' na sv'a h'a sbyor ba'o //
T02TD1915E:238a-25: 'dus pa la ni shes par bya //
T02TD1915E:238a-27: chos kyi dbyings yig 'bru de lta bu'i ngo bor 'dus pa yin zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
T02TD1915E:238a-28: chu khams dang ni zhes pa nas //
T02TD1915E:238a-29: ji ltar mi rnams skye ba lags //
T02TD1915E:238a-30: zhes pa'i bar gyi lan btab pa /
T02TD1915E:238a-31: chu khams pa las skye zhes bya //
T02TD1915E:238a-32: zhes pa la sogs pa ste de la /
T02TD1915E:238a-33: chu khams pha las skye zhes bya //
T02TD1915E:238a-34: zhes pa ni chu'i khams ni pha las 'ba' zhig tu skye ba bstan pa'o //
T02TD1915E:238a-35: me'i khams ni ma las skye //
T02TD1915E:238a-36: zhes pa ni me'i khams ni ma las 'ba' zhig tu skye ba bstan pa'o //
T02TD1915E:238a-40: nam mkha'i khams ni gnyi ga la skye ba don gyis skye ba shes par bya'o //
T02TD1915E:238a-41: de la sa la sogs pa'i khams bzhi ni bshad zin to //
T02TD1915E:238a-42: nam mkha'i khams ni phung po'i sgo dgu'i bu ga'o //
T02TD1915E:238a-43: de ltar chos mngon pa mdzod las kyang gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:238a-44: bu ga nam mkha'i khams zhes bya //
T02TD1915E:238a-45: snang dang mun pa dag yin no //
T02TD1915E:238b-0: rnam @238b par shes pa'i khams ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i rnam par shes pa'i khams so //
T02TD1915E:238b-1: de ltar yang chos mngon pa mdzod las kyang gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:238b-2: zag dang bcas pa'i rnam shes ni //
T02TD1915E:238b-3: rnam shes khams yin skye ba'i rten //
T02TD1915E:238b-5: chu dang me'i khams kyi don de gsal bar mdzad pas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bstan pa /
T02TD1915E:238b-6: sha dang khrag dang pags pa dang /
T02TD1915E:238b-7: ma las skye pa zhes bshad de /
T02TD1915E:238b-8: tshil dang rkang dang khu ba ni //
T02TD1915E:238b-9: pha las skye zhes bshad pa yin //
T02TD1915E:238b-11: gong bur yang dag par 'dus pa ni zhes pa ni 'jig rten pa'i gong bu phung por 'dus pa'o //
T02TD1915E:238b-12: bsdus pa gang zhe na de dag tsam du zhes pa ste /
T02TD1915E:238b-14: pha'i khams gsum drug tsam 'dus pa ni bshad pa yin zhes so //
T02TD1915E:238b-15: sangs rgyas gzugs ni bdag mi 'tshal //
T02TD1915E:238b-19: 'du shes dang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1915E:238b-20: de la gzugs zhes pa ni gzugs kyi phung po ste /
T02TD1915E:238b-21: phyin ci log pa'i glen pa'i gzugs rnam par dag pa gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo gti mug chen po'o //
T02TD1915E:238b-22: de ltar yang gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud phyi ma las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:238b-23: gzugs ni gti mug ces bstan pa //
T02TD1915E:238b-24: glen pas bcings pa'i ngo bo'o //
T02TD1915E:238b-26: tshor ba dang zhes pa ni tshor ba'i phung po ste /
T02TD1915E:238b-27: phyin ci log gi nga rgyal rnam par dag pa me thams cad la mi dmigs pa'i nga rgyal can mnyam pa nyid kyi bdag nyid do //
T02TD1915E:238b-28: de ltar yang gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud phyi ma las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:238b-29: tshor ba 'dod pas myos bstan pa //
T02TD1915E:238b-30: nga rgyal gyi ni ngo bo la /
T02TD1915E:238b-32: 'du shes dang zhes pa ni 'du shes kyi phung po ste /
T02TD1915E:238b-33: phyin ci log par dngos po la mtshan mar chags pa rnam par dag pa dang /
T02TD1915E:238b-34: rig pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo la chags pa'o //
T02TD1915E:238b-35: de ltar yang gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud phyi ma las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:238b-37: dngos po la ni rags pa'i mtshan //
T02TD1915E:238b-39: de bzhin 'du byed ces pa ni 'du byed kyi phung po ste /
T02TD1915E:238b-40: phyin ci log pa'i rang don 'du byed rnam par dag pa yang dag pa'i phrag dog gi rang bzhin te /
T02TD1915E:238b-41: sems can gyi don dang rang kho nas byed 'dod pa'o //
T02TD1915E:238b-42: de ltar yang gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud phyi ma las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:238b-43: 'du byed rtag tu phrag dog ste //
T02TD1915E:238b-44: rtse gcig bdag nyid stong pa'o //
T02TD1915E:238b-46: rnam shes rnams ni zhes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i phung po ste rgyu 'bras dbye ba la sdang ba'i zhe sdang chen po'o //
T02TD1915E:239a-1: ltar yang gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud phyi ma las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:239a-2: rnam shes zhe sdang zhes bstan te //
T02TD1915E:239a-3: rgyu dang 'bras bu zhes su grags //
T02TD1915E:239a-5: de lta bu'i rang bzhin go rims su /
T02TD1915E:239a-6: sangs rgyas dngos po lnga yi gzugs //
T02TD1915E:239a-7: zhes pa ste gzugs ni rnam par snang mdzad /
T02TD1915E:239a-8: tshor ba ni rin chen 'byung ldan 'du shes ni snang ba mtha' yas /
T02TD1915E:239a-9: 'du byed ni don yod grub pa /
T02TD1915E:239a-10: rnam par shes pa ni mi bskyod pa'o //
T02TD1915E:239a-11: de ltar rigs lngar sangs rgyas pa rnal 'byor pa'i gzugs la sogs pa phung po zhes bya ba lnga shin tu sbyor ba la bshad pa yin zhes so //
T02TD1915E:239a-12: lha mo bzhis yongs su zhus pa las zhes pa ni gong ma dang mthun gsungs pa'o zhes pa ni gnyis pa'i 'og ma'o //
T02TD1915E:239a-13: lha mo bzhis yongs su zhus pa'i le'u gsum pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02TD1915E:239a-15: // / da ni le'u bzhi pa las chos kyi dbyings byang chub sems bsgrub pa /
T02TD1915E:239a-16: lha mo sgrol mas zhus pa /
T02TD1915E:239a-17: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1915E:239a-18: de la de nas zhes pa ni le'u gsum pa dang bzhi pa mgo mjug 'brel ba'i tshig go //
T02TD1915E:239a-19: bzhad pa'i zhal gyur te zhes pa ni bzhad pa'i sgo nas mchod pa byas pa ste thugs la dgyes pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:239a-20: de ltar yang 'phags pa gdan bzhi pa las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:239a-21: mchod pa nyi shu las bshad pa dang khro ba la sogs pa yang mchod par gsungs so //
T02TD1915E:239a-22: lha mo zhes pa ni bshad zin to //
T02TD1915E:239a-23: lha mo yang de sgrol ma yang de nyid pas lha mo sgrol ma zhes pa ste /
T02TD1915E:239a-24: sems can thams cad la yang dag par don bstan pa'i phyag brkyang nas srid pa'i rgya mtsho las sgrol pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:239a-25: lha mo de kho na'i khyad par gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:239a-26: bcom ldan 'das mas zhes pa ste 'brel zin to //
T02TD1915E:239a-27: rdo rje sems dpa' la zhus pa zhes pa ni gong ma dang mthun no //
T02TD1915E:239a-28: chos kyi dbyings kyi bsgrub pa ni zhes pa ni chos kyi dbyings gang gis grub par byed pa de ni sgrub pa ste rgyu'i ngo bor gyur ba'o //
T02TD1915E:239a-29: gsungs shig rdo rje 'chang chen po //
T02TD1915E:239a-30: zhes pa ste chos kyi dbyings bsgrub pa'i sgo nas zhus pa'o //
T02TD1915E:239a-31: yang rdzas bsgrub pa zhus pa /
T02TD1915E:239a-32: rdzas rnams bsgrub pa bka' stsal 'tshal //
T02TD1915E:239a-34: de la rdzas rnams zhes pa ni dam tshig gi sman rnams so //
T02TD1915E:239a-35: de bzhin rig pa'i sngags rnams kyang //
T02TD1915E:239a-36: zhes pa ni zhi ba la sogs pa'i las byed pa'i sngags so //
T02TD1915E:239a-38: de ltar 'jig rten snang ba las kyang gsungs pa las byed pa ni rig pa'i sngags zhes so //
T02TD1915E:239b-0: de ni sngags kyi sgo nas chos kyi @239b dbyings bsgrub pa zhus pa'o //
T02TD1915E:239b-1: dkyil 'khor rnams ni brtags pa dang //
T02TD1915E:239b-2: zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa zhus pa'o //
T02TD1915E:239b-3: de la dkyil zhes pa ni snying po'am dbyings 'dus pa'o //
T02TD1915E:239b-4: 'khor zhes pa ni de lta bu dang du blangs pa'o //
T02TD1915E:239b-5: dkyil 'khor de bsgom pa ni brtags pa dang zhes pa'o /
T02TD1915E:239b-6: sbyin sreg so sor bya ba dang ;
T02TD1915E:239b-7: / zhes pa ni sbyin sreg gi sgrub pa zhus pa'o //
T02TD1915E:239b-8: de la sbyin sreg ces pa ni gsol zas kyis lha la mchod pa dbul ba'i don du me la bsreg pa'i ming ngo //
T02TD1915E:239b-9: so sor bya ba dang zhes pa ni sbyin sreg gis zhi ba la sogs pa'i las bya ba'o //
T02TD1915E:239b-10: de bzhin mchod pa'i cho ga yang //
T02TD1915E:239b-11: zhes pa ni mchod pas sgrub pa zhus pa'o ;
T02TD1915E:239b-12: / de la mchod pa zhes pa ste /
T02TD1915E:239b-13: pha rol mnyes par byed pa'o //
T02TD1915E:239b-14: cho ga yang zhes pa ni rim pa'o //
T02TD1915E:239b-15: khyad par du yang zhes pa ni mchod pa yang phyi nang gi khyad par du bka' stsal 'tshal zhes so //
T02TD1915E:239b-16: de ni zhus pa'i lan btab pa //
T02TD1915E:239b-17: de ltar lha mos zhus ma thag / rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa //
T02TD1915E:239b-18: zhes pa ste de la de ltar zhes pa ni gong ma'i tshig la bsnyegs pa'o //
T02TD1915E:239b-20: de la re zhig chos kyi dbyings kyi sgrub pa ni zhes pa'i lan btab pa /
T02TD1915E:239b-21: chos kyi dbyings kyi sgrub pa ni //
T02TD1915E:239b-22: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1915E:239b-24: gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ni //
T02TD1915E:239b-25: de bzhin ro dang reg la sogs//
T02TD1915E:239b-26: khams bco brgyad po de dag kyang //
T02TD1915E:239b-27: chos kyi dbyings zhes bya ba'o //
T02TD1915E:239b-28: zhes pa ni khams bco brgyad po de dag ni mdor na chos kyi dbyings su shes par bya ste /
T02TD1915E:239b-29: rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin dang 'dra ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:239b-30: de ltar yang mnyam sbyor gyi rgyud phyi ma las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:239b-31: gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri //
T02TD1915E:239b-32: ro dang reg bya kho na yang //
T02TD1915E:239b-33: de rnams rdo rje sems dang mnyam //
T02TD1915E:239b-35: yang na spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i phyir ni chos kyi khams ni dbyings te /
T02TD1915E:239b-36: de gnyis rgyu'am rigs su don gcig pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:239b-37: de dag nyid las byung ba ni zhes pa ni khams bco brgyad de dag las skye ba ni /
T02TD1915E:239b-38: byang chub sems zhes shes par bya ;
T02TD1915E:239b-39: / zhes pa ste lhag pa'i byang chub sems las gong bu skye zhes pa ni lhag pa'i byang chub sems de las kyang sa dang /
T02TD1915E:239b-42: rlung gi khams kyi bdag nyid gong bu skye'o //
T02TD1915E:239b-43: gong bu las kyang yid skyed do //
T02TD1915E:239b-44: zhes pa ni gong bu de las yang rnam par shes pa'i khams skyed pa ste /
T02TD1915E:240a-0: yid dang rnam par shes pa @240a * //
T02TD1915E:240a-1: rjes su dbyer med pas na /
T02TD1915E:240a-2: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams su shes par bya'o //
T02TD1915E:240a-3: yid las nam mkha'i khams kyang ni //
T02TD1915E:240a-4: zhes pa ni yid de las nam mkha'i khams sgo dgu'i bu gar gyur pa'o //
T02TD1915E:240a-6: spyi bo tshangs pa'i bu ga dang /
T02TD1915E:240a-15: de bzhin du yid kho na las khams bco brgyad dang /
T02TD1915E:240a-19: 'byung ba chen po bzhi yang skyes pa'o //
T02TD1915E:240a-21: khams rnams dang ni skye mched rnams //
T02TD1915E:240a-22: dbang po phung po 'byung ba rnams //
T02TD1915E:240a-23: zhes pa ste yig 'bru bcom zin to //
T02TD1915E:240a-24: de ltar dbyings su bsdu ba ste //
T02TD1915E:240a-25: zhes pa ni de la de ltar zhes pa ni /
T02TD1915E:240a-26: khams bco brgyad las lhag pa'i byang chub sems kyi khu ba skyed de /
T02TD1915E:240a-27: khu ba de las yang gong bu las byung ba chen po'i bar du 'khor bar skyes pa /
T02TD1915E:240a-28: de ni dbyings su bsdu ba ste //
T02TD1915E:240a-29: zhes pa ni phan tshun rgyu rkyen du gyur nas nang gi rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba tha ma med pa'o //
T02TD1915E:240a-30: de ltar yang chos mngon pa mdzod las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:240a-31: srid pa'i 'khor lo tha ma med //
T02TD1915E:240a-33: bsdu ba de ni bstan byas pa //
T02TD1915E:240a-34: zhes pa ni bsdu ba phan tshun du rgyur gyur pa bsgom pa'i sems mi g-yo ba rtse gcig par byed pa ni ;
T02TD1915E:240a-35: chos kyi dbyings kyi sgrub pa yin //
T02TD1915E:240a-36: zhes pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi don du gyur pa yin zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
T02TD1915E:240a-37: ci'i phyir chos kyi dbyings sgrub pa'i don de ltar yin pa /
T02TD1915E:240a-38: de bas thams cad nan tan gyis //
T02TD1915E:240a-39: sgrub pa yang dag spyad par bya //
T02TD1915E:240a-40: zhes pa ste de la de bas zhes pa ni gtan tshigs kyi don 'dren pa'o //
T02TD1915E:240a-41: thams cad ces pa ni 'das pa dang /
T02TD1915E:240a-43: da ltar gyi dus thams cad do //
T02TD1915E:240a-44: nan tan gyis zhes pa ni thos pa dang /
T02TD1915E:240a-46: bsgom pa'i shes rab rnam pa gsum gyis ji bzhin du byed pa'o //
T02TD1915E:240a-47: sgrub pa zhes pa ni chos kyi dbyings mngon du byed pa'i rgyu'i ngo bo'o //
T02TD1915E:240a-48: de la phyin ci ma log par sgrub pa la 'jug pa ni yang dag spyad par bya zhes pa ste bsgrub par bya'o zhes so //
T02TD1915E:240a-49: gang gi rim pas bsgrub par bya ba yin zhe na /
T02TD1915E:240a-50: ji ltar gal po zhes dngos kyis //
T02TD1915E:240a-51: bsgrub par bya ba rab tu brtags //
T02TD1915E:240a-53: de la ji ltar zhes pa ni sgrub pa'i gtan tshig 'dren pa'o //
T02TD1915E:240b-0: gal po zhes pa ni rgyud @240b kyi nang nas 'byung ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs so //
T02TD1915E:240b-1: de'i don dang mthun pa'i rang bzhin ni gal po zhes dngos kyis /
T02TD1915E:240b-2: bsgrub par bya ba rab tu brtags //
T02TD1915E:240b-3: zhes pa ste chos kyi dbyings sgrub pa yin no zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
T02TD1915E:240b-4: rdzas rnams bsgrub pa bka' stsal 'tshal //
T02TD1915E:240b-6: chos rnams bsgrub pa bshad nas su //
T02TD1915E:240b-7: zhes pa la sogs pa ste de la /
T02TD1915E:240b-8: chos rnams bsgrub pa bshad nas su //
T02TD1915E:240b-9: zhes pa ni chos kyi dbyings sgrub pa bshad zin ma thag tu /
T02TD1915E:240b-10: rdzas brgyad yan lag bsgrub pa bshad //
T02TD1915E:240b-11: ces pa ste de la rdzas brgyad yan lag ces pa ni thun mong gi dngos grub yan lag brgyad dang rdzas kyis bsgrub pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:240b-14: mig sman gyi dngos grub dang /
T02TD1915E:240b-17: nam mkha' la 'phur pa'i dngos grub dang /
T02TD1915E:240b-18: mig rnon gyi dngos grub dang /
T02TD1915E:240b-20: nad 'joms pa'i dngos grub dang brgyad do //
T02TD1915E:240b-21: don de kho na gsungs pa ri lu mig sman dngos grub dang //
T02TD1915E:240b-22: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1915E:240b-23: de la ri lu zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis 'og tu rgyas par bshad pas 'dir ma bkrol lo //
T02TD1915E:240b-24: mig sman dngos grub dang zhes pa ni 'di lta ste /
T02TD1915E:240b-25: zla ba mar po'i tshes nyi shu dgu'i nam phyed la lam gyi bzhi mdo na thod pa'i steng na 'dug ste /
T02TD1915E:240b-26: mdun na yang thod pa gsum sgyed bu ltar btsugs nas /
T02TD1915E:240b-27: de gnyis kyi bar du bdud rtsi lnga dang bsres pa'i tshil chen gyis bkang pa'i bhandha gzhag ste /
T02TD1915E:240b-28: de'i dkyil du khrag dang dri chen la sogs pa dang bsres pa'i shing aarga'i bal la padma'i skud pas dkris pa'i snying po btsugs nas me mar bltam par bya'o //
T02TD1915E:240b-29: shing aa rga'i bal dang padma'i skud pa ma rnyed na yang gzhan ci 'tshal ba la bya'o //
T02TD1915E:240b-30: me mar gyi me lce'i du ba la mar bhandha gcig gis bkab nas sgyed bu gsum la gzhag go //
T02TD1915E:240b-31: de la rdo rjes reg nas phung po lnga rigs lngar bsgoms pa'i rnal 'byor pas sngags aom a'a:h'um sv'ah'a /
T02TD1915E:240b-32: zhes nam ma langs bar du bzla bar bya'o //
T02TD1915E:240b-33: de nas dud pa de blangs nas rang gi mig la bskus na sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub 'grub po //
T02TD1915E:240b-34: de ltar gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:240b-35: lam gyi bzhi mdo shing gcig drung //
T02TD1915E:240b-36: ma mo'i gnas sam zhi gnas su //
T02TD1915E:240b-37: de ru rdo rje aa dza na //
T02TD1915E:240b-38: thod pa dag tu dbab par bya //
T02TD1915E:241a-1: ni sa 'og gi dngos grub ste /
T02TD1915E:241a-2: lha ma yin dang klu'i bu mo sgrub pa'o //
T02TD1915E:241a-4: 'phags pa rdo rje sa 'og zhal gsum phyag drug pa zhags pa dang dgra sta dang /
T02TD1915E:241a-5: rtse gsum pa dang lcags kyu 'dzin pa /
T02TD1915E:241a-6: phyag dang po gnyis kyis lha mo la 'khyud pa /
T02TD1915E:241a-7: sku mdog nag po bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pas bcag gam /
T02TD1915E:241a-9: bab blas shing ta la'i lo ma la sogs pa la rdo rje lcags kyu bris te /
T02TD1915E:241a-10: de'i kha la gtsugs [*gtsug] nas gzas zla ba zin pa'i dus su lcags kyu yang nas yang du kha las 'phros pas klu'i bu mo'am lha ma yin gyi bu mo dgug pa bsgoms nas /
T02TD1915E:241a-11: sngags aom a'a:h'um a'a karsha ya dza:zhes pa bzla bar bya'o //
T02TD1915E:241a-12: des ni klu dang lha ma yin gyi bu mo gang gi ming smras pa de dgug go //
T02TD1915E:241a-13: de ltar yang rnam par snang mdzad sgyu 'phrul dra ba las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:241a-14: btsag gam rdo rgyus zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1915E:241a-15: ral gri'i dngos grub ces pa ni g-yo mo'am gser la sogs pa la mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i gzugs byas te /
T02TD1915E:241a-16: mdun na ral gri bzhag nas /
T02TD1915E:241a-17: bdud rtsi rnam pa lngas byugs te /
T02TD1915E:241a-18: rigs lnga'i gtso bo don yod grub pa bsgoms nas /
T02TD1915E:241a-20: ral gri la sku gsung thugs thim par bsgoms te 'od zer 'bar bar bsgom pa'o //
T02TD1915E:241a-21: ral gri de 'phar ma thag tu gong gi sngags bzlas te lag par blangs nas blangs ma thag tu ral gri'i rig 'dzin du grub po //
T02TD1915E:241a-22: sgrub pa de kho na'i mthus gang+g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su rgyu bas na nam mkhar 'phur zhes so //
T02TD1915E:241a-23: de ltar rnam par snang mdzad sgyu 'phrul dra ba las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:241a-24: mdun du ral gri gzhag byas te //
T02TD1915E:241a-26: mig sman zhes pa ni mig rnon gyi dngos grub po //
T02TD1915E:241a-28: lam gyi bzhi mdo la sogs par thod pa 'dug pa la sogs pa gong ma bzhin byas nas /
T02TD1915E:241a-29: 'dir ni zha nye'i gong bu la tshil chen gyis bkad nas /
T02TD1915E:241a-30: sa la ma lhung ba'i ro dkris pa'i ras kyis snying po byas te me mar bltam par bya'o //
T02TD1915E:241a-31: phung po lnga rigs ldang bsgoms pa'i rnal 'byor pas aom a'a:h'um bzla bar bya'o //
T02TD1915E:241a-32: dud pa de blangs nas mig la bskus na /
T02TD1915E:241a-33: mi snang ba sku gsung thugs rdo rje la sogs pa lha klu kun mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1915E:241a-34: de ltar yang 'phags pa gdan bzhi las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:241a-35: ma lhung ba yi ro dkris ras //
T02TD1915E:241b-0: 'chi med dang @241b zhes pa ni bdud rtsi dri chen gyi bdud rtsi slong bas tshe bsgrub pa'o //
T02TD1915E:241b-2: dri chen phye mar brdungs nas mar dang sbrang rtsi dang bsres la rtog pa spangs te rigs lnga bsgoms pa'i rnal 'byor pas aom a'a:h'um bzlas te /
T02TD1915E:241b-3: lo gsum gyi bar du zos na nyi zla dang 'dra ba'i tshe grub bo //
T02TD1915E:241b-4: de ltar yang rnam par snang mdzad gal po las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:241b-5: dri chen phye mar gtags nas su //
T02TD1915E:241b-6: mar dang sbrang rtsi bsres nas bza' //
T02TD1915E:241b-7: lo gsum nas ni lha yi lus //
T02TD1915E:241b-8: nyi zla skar ma bzhin du tshe 'gyur ro //
T02TD1915E:241b-10: bdud rtsi slong ba de kho nas lha'i lus su 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD1915E:241b-11: nad 'joms dang zhes pa ste rims dang bkres sgom la sogs pa'i nad med pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:241b-12: dngos grub de rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings kho na 'grub pa ste /
T02TD1915E:241b-13: chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dang dbyer med pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:241b-14: da ni ri lu bsgrub pa'i rdzas bstan pa /
T02TD1915E:241b-15: mi dang glang po che dang rta //
T02TD1915E:241b-16: glang dang khyi dang bong bu dang //
T02TD1915E:241b-17: rnga mo ma he spyang gi rnams //
T02TD1915E:241b-19: sems can gyi khyad par de rnams kyi sha la shes par bya'o //
T02TD1915E:241b-21: mi'i shas ni sku gsung thugs 'grub pa dang /
T02TD1915E:241b-22: glang po che'i shas ni mngon par shes pa 'grub pa dang /
T02TD1915E:241b-23: rta'i shas ni mi snang ba 'grub pa dang /
T02TD1915E:241b-24: ba glang gi shas ni 'gugs pa 'grub pa dang /
T02TD1915E:241b-25: khyi'i shas ni sgrub pa thams cad 'grub pa dang ;
T02TD1915E:241b-26: bong bu la sogs pa'i shas ni gong ma'i spyi'i dngos grub po //
T02TD1915E:241b-27: ci'i phyir sems can de rnams kyi sha la brten nas de lta bu'i dngos grub thob ce na /
T02TD1915E:241b-29: 'jig rten pa'i gtsang ba dang mi gtsang ba'i rnam par rtog pas gzir ba'i sems can thams cad sha 'di dag sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin dang dbyer med par rtogs nas zos na rnam par rtog pa gzhom mo //
T02TD1915E:241b-30: rnam par rtog pa med ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlob po //
T02TD1915E:241b-31: de rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi yon tan /
T02TD1915E:241b-32: 'di dag thob par shes par bya'o //
T02TD1915E:241b-33: de ltar yang gsang ba 'dus pa las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:241b-34: sha chen dam tshig mchog gis ni //
T02TD1915E:241b-36: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin brlabs //
T02TD1915E:241b-38: sha de rnams mang nyung med pa ni /
T02TD1915E:241b-39: cha ni mnyam por bya ba'o //
T02TD1915E:241b-41: sha de kho na'i yang tshad gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:241b-42: mthe bo'i tshigs tsam tshad du ni //
T02TD1915E:242a-0: sha rnam pa dgu po de dag bsdu ba'i @242a * //
T02TD1915E:242a-1: tshad de srid pa'i sgo nas sha de dag mang du tshogs pa mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:242a-2: shin tu mnyam par bzhag nas sbyar //
T02TD1915E:242a-3: zhes pa ni sha de dag sbyang ba dang /
T02TD1915E:242a-4: dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la sems rtse gcig pa'i sngags bzlas te sbyor zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
T02TD1915E:242a-5: bdud rtsi'i tshad gsungs pa dri chen zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1915E:242a-6: de la bdud rtsi bzhi smos nas shel med pa ni don gyis shes par bya'o //
T02TD1915E:242a-7: nas tsam tshad du ni zhes pa'i bdud rtsi lnga'i ril lu de dag 'bru nas tsam du bsdu ba ste /
T02TD1915E:242a-8: dam tshig tsam du 'dod la mang ba na skyon yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:242a-9: sngags bzlas nas ni sbyang byas te //
T02TD1915E:242a-10: zhes pa ni 'dir yang sbyang ba dang dag pa'i sngags bzlas te /
T02TD1915E:242a-11: spyad ba'i ting nge 'dzin la yang mnyam par gzhag nas sbyar zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
T02TD1915E:242a-12: de ltar sbyar zin ma thag tu yang byin gyis brlabs kyang bya'o zhes pa ste sngags kyis bstan par bya ba'o //
T02TD1915E:242a-13: byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags bstan pa //
T02TD1915E:242a-14: phyag 'tshal dang ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1915E:242a-15: de la phyag 'tshal dang ni yi ge aom ste sngags kun gyi mgo na bzhag pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:242a-16: yi ge a'a:dbus su zhes pa ni /
T02TD1915E:242a-17: aom dang h'um gi bar na yi ge a'a:gzhag pa'o //
T02TD1915E:242a-18: de bzhin h'um byas te zhes pa ni mtha' na yi ge h'um gzhag pa'o //
T02TD1915E:242a-21: sngags 'di ni gong gi mig sman la sogs pa la yang bzla ba shes par bya'o //
T02TD1915E:242a-22: dag pa'i sngags dang sbyar ba'i bsgom pa gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:242a-26: yam las skyes pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi steng na ram las skyes pa'i me'i dkyil 'khor /
T02TD1915E:242a-27: de'i steng du aa las skyes pa'i padma bhandha la sha rnam pa dgu dang bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga bzhag ste /
T02TD1915E:242a-28: de'i dkyil du yi ge hr'i:bkod nas /
T02TD1915E:242a-29: de'i steng du yi ge h'um las rdo rje bsgom ste /
T02TD1915E:242a-30: rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis me'i dkyil 'khor bus nas me 'bar bas padma bhandha la bdud rtsi btso bar byed pa dang /
T02TD1915E:242a-31: steng du rdo rje kha gab las 'od mar thur du 'bar bas sha dang bdud rtsi sbyar ba bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1915E:242a-32: de nas yang yi ge hr'i:'i 'od kyis khams gsum gyi bdud rtsi bsdus nas gcig tu gyur pa dkar por bsgom par byas nas phyin ci log gi mthu gzhom ste dag par bya ba bsgom mo //
T02TD1915E:242a-33: de ltar kun du bzang mo las kyang gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:242a-34: phyag 'tshal dga' bas byin gyis brlabs pa'i rlung //
T02TD1915E:242b-0: me yi @242b dkyil 'khor la gnas 'bar ba yin //
T02TD1915E:242b-2: rgyud so so yin pas 'di'i gnas skabs su ni aom ma yin yi ge hr'i:la shes par bya'o //
T02TD1915E:242b-3: dgu pa de ni rab tu bsgrub //
T02TD1915E:242b-4: ces pa ni bdud rtsi lnga kho na 'di ltar bsgrub pa ma yin gyi sha dgu yang de ltar bsgrub par bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
T02TD1915E:242b-5: de ltar dag pa'i rdzas de dag ri lu bya ba'i thabs bstan pa /
T02TD1915E:242b-6: lan ni nyi shu rtsa gcig tu //
T02TD1915E:242b-7: sngags bzlas nas ni phye mar btags //
T02TD1915E:242b-8: zhes pa ste nub tu kha bltas nas sor nyi shu rtsa gcig tu btags pa'o //
T02TD1915E:242b-9: yungs kar lnga yi chad tsam du //
T02TD1915E:242b-10: zhes pa ni yungs kar ni go sla'o //
T02TD1915E:242b-11: de tsam lnga gcig tu byas pa'o //
T02TD1915E:242b-12: lnga dang lnga ni 'byor bar bya //
T02TD1915E:242b-13: zhes pa ni yungs kar lnga gcig tu bsdu ba'i tshad /
T02TD1915E:242b-14: de lnga yang gcig tu bya ba'i don to //
T02TD1915E:242b-16: tshes brgyad dang ni bcu bzhi la //
T02TD1915E:242b-18: ri lu rnams ni byas nas ni //
T02TD1915E:242b-19: zhes pa ni gong du gsungs pa'i tshad du ri lu dril ba'o //
T02TD1915E:242b-20: padma'i snod ces pa ni bhandha'o //
T02TD1915E:242b-22: bkang nas ri lu gzhag byas te //
T02TD1915E:242b-23: stong phrag brgyad ni bzla bar bya //
T02TD1915E:242b-25: aom a'a:h'um stong phrag brgyad bzlas nas byin gyis brlab pa'o //
T02TD1915E:242b-26: mtshams bzhi la ni bsgom byas nas //
T02TD1915E:242b-27: zhes pa ni snga dro dang nyin phyed dang /
T02TD1915E:242b-28: phyi dro dang nam phyed la gong ma bzhin du sbyar ba dang dag pa'i sgom pa'o //
T02TD1915E:242b-29: de ltar bsgoms zin ma thag tu dus bzhi la ri lu re re rgyun mi 'chad par bza' ba ni /
T02TD1915E:242b-30: nyin dang mtshan du bza' bar bya //
T02TD1915E:242b-32: da ni de'i yon tan gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:242b-33: de ni bskal pa'i tha mar yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1915E:242b-34: de la de ni zhes pa ni ri lu zos pa'i rnal 'byor pa'o //
T02TD1915E:242b-35: bskal pa'i tha mar yang zhes pa ni grangs med pa'i bskal pa mtha' yas pa'o //
T02TD1915E:242b-36: dngos grub rgyas par 'gro ba ste //
T02TD1915E:242b-37: zhes pa ni ri lu la brten nas mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba'o //
T02TD1915E:242b-38: gzi brjid ces pa ni 'od zer dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD1915E:242b-39: mdangs dang zhes pa ni gser btso ma'i sku mdog tu gyur pa'o //
T02TD1915E:242b-40: stobs zhes pa ni sred med kyi bu'i stobs dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD1915E:242b-41: sred med kyi bu'i stobs ni 'di lta ste /
T02TD1915E:242b-42: glang po che phal pa bcu'i stobs ni spos kyi glang po che'i stobs /
T02TD1915E:243a-0: spos kyi glang po che bcu'i stobs ni gcer bu chen po'i stobs gcer bu chen po'i stobs bcu ni phung po'i stobs phung po'i stobs bcu ni yan lag mchog gi @243a * //
T02TD1915E:243a-1: stobs de bcu ni stobs mchog / de bcu ni sred med kyi bu'i stobs zhes bya'o //
T02TD1915E:243a-2: brtson 'grub zhes pa ni dge ba la brod pa'o //
T02TD1915E:243a-3: de yang gsum ste sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus dang /
T02TD1915E:243a-5: mi 'gong mi ldog chog par mi 'dzin pa'i brtson 'grus so //
T02TD1915E:243a-6: lnga pa la ni smon lam yang //
T02TD1915E:243a-7: zhes pa ni sems can gyi don du sangs rgyas par 'dod pa'o //
T02TD1915E:243a-8: de yang rnam pa gsum ste /
T02TD1915E:243a-9: rang gi tshogs la rab tu 'brel pa'i smon lam dang /
T02TD1915E:243a-10: sems can gyi don la rab tu 'brel ba'i smon lam dang /
T02TD1915E:243a-11: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i smon lam dang gsum mo //
T02TD1915E:243a-12: mngon par shes pa lnga zhes pa ni lha'i mig dang /
T02TD1915E:243a-14: pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang /
T02TD1915E:243a-15: sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa dang /
T02TD1915E:243a-16: 'chi 'pho ba dran pa'i shes pa dang /
T02TD1915E:243a-18: de la lha'i mig dang rna ba ni kun rdzob kyi shes pa ste /
T02TD1915E:243a-19: bsgribs pa dang bsrings pa dang /
T02TD1915E:243a-20: phra ba thams cad spyod yul nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:243a-21: pha rol gyi sems shes pa ni chos dang rjes su dang lam dang /
T02TD1915E:243a-23: pha rol gyi sems shes pa rnams te /
T02TD1915E:243a-24: bsten pa'i cho 'phrul chen po'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:243a-25: sngon gyi gnas dang 'chi 'pho rjes su dran pa'i shes pa ni kun rdzob kyi shes pa ste /
T02TD1915E:243a-26: tshe sngon gyi ma rig pa dang tshe phyi ma'i ma rig pa bzlog pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:243a-27: rdzu 'phrul bya ba'i shes pa ni kun rdzob kyi shes pa ste /
T02TD1915E:243a-28: ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:243a-29: rdzu 'phrul de yang rnam pa gnyis te 'gro ba dang sprul pa'o //
T02TD1915E:243a-30: de la 'gro ba yang gsum ste /
T02TD1915E:243a-32: mos pa las byung ba dang /
T02TD1915E:243a-34: de gsum la de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid mgyogs pa ma gtogs pa 'dir gnyis thob po /
T02TD1915E:243a-35: rdzu 'phrul ni gcig las du mar gyur pa dang /
T02TD1915E:243a-36: du ma las gcig tu gyur pa lta bu ste /
T02TD1915E:243a-38: gzugs khams la gtogs pa gnyis so //
T02TD1915E:243a-39: thob pa zhes pa ni gong gi gzi brjid nas mngon par shes pa'i bar du yon tan mngon du gyur pa'o //
T02TD1915E:243a-40: de dag gang las mngon du gyur pa yin zhe na /
T02TD1915E:243a-41: ri lu chen po zos phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:243a-43: gong gi ri lu zos pa'i yon tan zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
T02TD1915E:243a-44: de bzhin rig pa'i sngags rnams kyang //
T02TD1915E:243b-1: rdzas kyi sgrub pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste rdzas kyi dngos grub ni bshad zin to //
T02TD1915E:243b-2: kye bcom ldan 'das da ni rig pa sngags rnams bdag la stsol zhes zhus pa'o //
T02TD1915E:243b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis rig pa'i sngags bstan pa /
T02TD1915E:243b-4: ae yig dang ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1915E:243b-5: de la ae yig dang ni zhes pa ni yi ge ram las bskyed pa'i zur gsum pa me'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD1915E:243b-6: bam yig dang zhes pa ni yi ge bam las bskyed pa zlum po chu'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD1915E:243b-7: lam yig ces pa ni yi ge lam las bskyed pa dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi'o //
T02TD1915E:243b-8: dbus su yang dag gnas zhes pa ni me'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su yi ge ram /
T02TD1915E:243b-9: chu'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su yi ge bam /
T02TD1915E:243b-10: dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su yi ge lam dgod pa'o //
T02TD1915E:243b-11: dang po mdog ni dmar po ste //
T02TD1915E:243b-12: zhes pa ni me'i dkyil 'khor dang sa bon ram gyi kha dog go //
T02TD1915E:243b-13: gnyis pa yin ni mdog dkar ba //
T02TD1915E:243b-14: zhes pa ni chu'i dkyil 'khor dang sa bon bam gyi kha dog go //
T02TD1915E:243b-15: gsum pa kha dog ser ba zhes pa ni dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor dang sa bon lam gyi kha dog go //
T02TD1915E:243b-16: de rnams gang 'gugs par byed pa'i bud med kyi bha ga'i dbus su brtsegs par bsgom par bya zhes so //
T02TD1915E:243b-17: dkyil 'khor de dag kyang ji ltar bsgom zhe na /
T02TD1915E:243b-18: 'khor lo ltar ni bskor ba ni //
T02TD1915E:243b-19: zhes pa ste rdza mkhan gyi 'khor lo ji ltar myur bar 'khor ba de bzhin du me'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa bha ga'i nang du 'khor ba bsgom pa'o //
T02TD1915E:243b-21: nyin phyed dang ni mtshan phyed la //
T02TD1915E:243b-22: zhes pa ste nyin phyed dang mtshan phyed la sems can thams cad sems kyi stobs nyams pas dbang du byas pa'i dus yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:243b-23: de'i yon tan bstan pa rig pa de ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1915E:243b-24: de la rig pa de ni zhes pa ni gong gi me'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1915E:243b-25: bu mo dgug pa'i las byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:243b-26: rab 'byor na zhes pa ni bha ga'i nang du bsgom pa'o //
T02TD1915E:243b-27: de ni skad cig kho nar 'grub //
T02TD1915E:243b-28: ces pa ni myur bar 'grub pa'i tha tshig ste /
T02TD1915E:243b-29: de la de'i skad cig ma ni skad cig ma brgya nyi shu'i dus kyi tshad se gol lan gnyis gtogs pa la skad cig ma brgyad kyis mchog pa'o //
T02TD1915E:243b-31: lha mo lha min bu mo'am //
T02TD1915E:243b-32: zhes pa ni de la lha mo zhes pa ni bshad zin to //
T02TD1915E:243b-33: lha min bu mo zhes pa ni rin po che'i 'od la longs spyod pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:244a-1: zhes pa ni rnam grangs bstan pa'o //
T02TD1915E:244a-2: mi'i zhes pa ni shes pa las byung ba'i phyir na ste /
T02TD1915E:244a-3: de las skye ba'i mi'i rigs ni mi'i bu mo'i zhes so //
T02TD1915E:244a-4: de yang rnam pa bzhis zhes pa ni padma can dang /
T02TD1915E:244a-8: de la padma can ma ni padma'i dri bro ba dang /
T02TD1915E:244a-10: sna rtse til gyi me tog 'dra ba dang /
T02TD1915E:244a-13: rkang mthil kun gyis sa la reg pa dang /
T02TD1915E:244a-14: nu ma til gyi shing tog dang 'dra ba dang /
T02TD1915E:244a-15: ba spu 'khyil pa dang ldan pa'i sor mo can gsus pa'i gnyer ma gsum dang ldan pa dang /
T02TD1915E:244a-17: glang po che ltar dal bus 'gro ba ste /
T02TD1915E:244a-18: de rnams kyi mtshan nyid do //
T02TD1915E:244a-19: dung can ma ni pa tshva'i dri bro ba dang /
T02TD1915E:244a-22: nu ma che la shing tog na rang ga 'dra ba dang /
T02TD1915E:244a-24: zho la sred pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid do //
T02TD1915E:244a-25: ri mo can ma ni sha'i dri bro ba dang /
T02TD1915E:244a-28: shing tog shing pa la lta bu'i nu ma dang /
T02TD1915E:244a-29: ngo tsha mi shes pa dang /
T02TD1915E:244a-31: rtag tu 'thab mo la dga' ba dang /
T02TD1915E:244a-32: rje ngar bya rog dang 'dra ba dang /
T02TD1915E:244a-33: phyi rgan du nyal ba dang /
T02TD1915E:244a-35: phug ron gyi skad 'dra ba de rnams kyi mtshan nyid do //
T02TD1915E:244a-36: glang po che can ma ni /
T02TD1915E:244a-37: chang gi dri bro ba dang /
T02TD1915E:244a-43: spyod pa rtsom pa de rnams kyi mtshan nyid do //
T02TD1915E:244a-45: zhes pa ni sa 'og dang sa steng dang sa bla'o //
T02TD1915E:244a-46: sngags kyis bkug nas spyad par bya //
T02TD1915E:244a-47: zhes pa ni gong du gsungs pa'i sngags kyi mthu yis bkug ste /
T02TD1915E:244a-48: bu mo thams cad spyad par bya'o zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
T02TD1915E:244a-49: dkyil 'khor rnams ni brtags pa dang //
T02TD1915E:244a-51: bsgom pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1915E:244a-52: de la bsgom pa zhes pa ni gong du me'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa bsgom pa'o //
T02TD1915E:244a-53: de bzhin rig pa'i sngags zhes pa ni ram dang bam dang lam dang ngo //
T02TD1915E:244a-54: de dag gi man ngag tu /
T02TD1915E:244a-55: kye lha mo bdag gis bshad pa zin byas te zhes so //
T02TD1915E:244a-57: dkyil 'khor rnams ni bshad par bya //
T02TD1915E:244a-58: dga' ma sems kyis rtse gcig nyon //
T02TD1915E:244a-60: bshad par dam bcas pa'i tshig go //
T02TD1915E:244a-61: de la dga' ma zhes pa ni lha mo sgrol ma bod pa'i tshig ste /
T02TD1915E:244a-62: bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs la byon pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:244b-0: sems @244b kyis rtse gcig zhes pa ni bum pa kha mar phub pa lta bu'i skyon dang /
T02TD1915E:244b-1: bum pa zhab [*zhabs?] rdol ba lta bu'i skyon dang /
T02TD1915E:244b-2: bum pa mi gtsang bas gang ba lta bu'i skyon gsum spangs nas ngang pa dang brtson 'grus dang yang dag pa'i lta ba gsum dang ldan par nyon zhes pa ste gnang ba'i tshig go //
T02TD1915E:244b-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dkyil 'khor bstan pa /
T02TD1915E:244b-4: dkyil 'khor lus zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1915E:244b-5: da la dkyil 'khor lus zhes gsungs pa ste zhes pa ni phung po lnga rigs lngar bstan pa dang /
T02TD1915E:244b-6: 'og tu bshad pas 'dir ma bkral lo //
T02TD1915E:244b-7: dkyil 'khor bha gar bstan pa yin //
T02TD1915E:244b-8: zhes pa ni chos kyi 'byung gnas ae gru gsum gyi nang du bsgom pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD1915E:244b-9: dkyil 'khor byang chub sems dang ni //
T02TD1915E:244b-10: zhes pa ni lhag pa'i byang chub sems las bskyed pa'i sa bon las gsang ba'i padma'i nang du bsgom pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD1915E:244b-11: dkyil 'khor gsum du brtags pa yin //
T02TD1915E:244b-12: zhes pa ni de ltar lus dang /
T02TD1915E:244b-14: byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor gsum kho na gnyis dang bzhi ma yin par gsang ba'i rgyud las yang dag par brtags so zhes so //
T02TD1915E:244b-15: dkyil 'khor ming ji ltar btags she na gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:244b-16: btags pa rnams kyang 'dus pa ste //
T02TD1915E:244b-17: zhes pa ste dkyil 'khor ming btags pa ni snying po 'dus pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:244b-18: de ltar 'jig rten snang ba las kyang gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:244b-21: snying po gang zhe na gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:244b-22: gang du gtso bo skyed par byed //
T02TD1915E:244b-23: ces pa ste de la gang du zhes pa ni gnas gang dang gang du'o //
T02TD1915E:244b-24: gtso bo zhes pa ni khyab bdag rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
T02TD1915E:244b-25: snang ba'i sgo nas kun du khyab pa'o //
T02TD1915E:244b-26: skyod par byed ces pa ni rgyu ba'o //
T02TD1915E:244b-28: rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bo rigs lnga la sogs pa'i lha dang lha mo'i 'dod pa'i 'bras bu mya ngan las 'das pa smin par byed pas na snying por 'dod de /
T02TD1915E:244b-29: de dag gang dang gang du 'dus pa de dang de ni dkyil 'khor zhes ming btags pa'i tha tshig go //
T02TD1915E:244b-30: da ni lus kyi dkyil 'khor bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis rgyas par bstan pa /
T02TD1915E:244b-31: phung po rnams ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1915E:244b-32: de la phung po rnams ni sangs rgyas gsungs //
T02TD1915E:244b-33: zhes pa ni phung po lnga rigs lngar bsgom pa'o //
T02TD1915E:245a-0: gzugs kyi phung po ni rnam par snang mdzad de de la rnam par snang mdzad kyi byang chub kyi sems 'phro ba'i sbyor bas phra mo'i @245a * //
T02TD1915E:245a-1: ye shes dang po'i sbyor ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems so //
T02TD1915E:245a-2: de ltar gsang chen thams cad rgyud las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:245a-3: sems kyi phra mo sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1915E:245a-4: ye shes phra mo dang sbyor ba //
T02TD1915E:245a-5: de bzhin gshegs kun ye shes ni //
T02TD1915E:245a-6: rnam par snang mdzad ces su 'dod //
T02TD1915E:245a-8: tshor ba'i phung po ni rin chen 'byung ldan te de la rin chen 'byung ldan ni /
T02TD1915E:245a-9: snying rje 'phro ba'i sbyor bas sems can gyi don byed pa dang ldan pa'i sems so //
T02TD1915E:245a-10: de ltar yang gsang chen thams cad rgyud las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:245a-11: snying rje 'phro ba'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1915E:245a-12: thams cad phan don byed pa'o //
T02TD1915E:245a-13: sems can don dang ldan sems ni //
T02TD1915E:245a-14: rin chen 'byung ldan zhes gsungs so //
T02TD1915E:245a-16: 'du shes kyi phung po ni snang ba mtha' yas te /
T02TD1915E:245a-17: de la snang ba mtha' yas ni dga' ba sbyor pa'i 'phro bas rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bdag pa'i sems so //
T02TD1915E:245a-18: de ltar yang gsang chen thams cad rgyud las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:245a-19: dga' ba 'phro ba'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1915E:245a-20: theg chen dri ma med pa'i mchog / rang bzhin 'od gsal dag sems ni //
T02TD1915E:245a-21: snang ba mtha' yas de gsungs so //
T02TD1915E:245a-23: 'du byed kyi phung po ni don yod grub pa ste /
T02TD1915E:245a-24: de la don yod grub pa ni btang snyoms 'phro ba'i sbyor bas gdon mi za bar sems can thams cad kyi don byed pa'i sems so //
T02TD1915E:245a-25: de ltar yang gsang chen thams cad rgyud las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:245a-26: btang snyoms 'phro ba'i sems kyis ni //
T02TD1915E:245a-27: sems can thams cad shes byed pa //
T02TD1915E:245a-28: thogs med bla med don byed pa //
T02TD1915E:245a-29: don yod grub pa de gsungs so //
T02TD1915E:245a-31: rnam par shes pa'i phung po ni mi bskyod pa ste de la mi bskyod pa ni /
T02TD1915E:245a-32: byams pa 'phro ba'i sbyor bas zag pa med pa brtan par gyur pa'i brtan pa'i sems so //
T02TD1915E:245a-33: de ltar yang gsang chen thams cad rgyud las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:245a-34: byams pa 'phro ba'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1915E:245a-35: mchog gi spyod pa spyod byed pa //
T02TD1915E:245a-36: zag pa med par brtan 'gyur ba //
T02TD1915E:245a-37: sems ni mi bskyod par gsungs so //
T02TD1915E:245a-39: de ltar phung po lnga sems las gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:245a-40: sems de dag ni rigs lngar gsungs so //
T02TD1915E:245a-41: de ltar yang 'phags pa sa bcu pa la gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:245a-42: kye rgyal ba'i sras khams gsum yang sems tsam mo //
T02TD1915E:245a-43: dus gsum yang sems tsam mo //
T02TD1915E:245a-44: phung po lnga yang sems tsam mo //
T02TD1915E:245b-0: 'byung ba rig mar btags pa'o zhes pa la @245b 'byung ba ni sa dang chu dang me dang rlung ste /
T02TD1915E:245b-1: rang rang gi mtshan nyid nye bar blangs nas gzugs 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD1915E:245b-2: rig mar zhes pa ni spyan ma dang m'a ma k'i dang na bza' dkar mo dang /
T02TD1915E:245b-3: sgrol ma ste zhi ba la sogs pa'i las byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:245b-5: sa ni spyan ma ste byang chub sems kyi mthus sangs rgyas nyid du phyin pa'i bdag nyid do //
T02TD1915E:245b-6: de ltar yang gsang chen thams cad rgyud las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:245b-7: byang chub sems kyi mthu yis ni //
T02TD1915E:245b-8: sangs rgyas nyid du pha rol phyir //
T02TD1915E:245b-9: thob pa'i pha rol phyin zhes pa //
T02TD1915E:245b-10: sems ma'i rdo rje ma zhes btags //
T02TD1915E:245b-11: zhes so 'dir ni spyan ma la shes par bya ste spyan ma dang sems ma'i rdo rje ma gnyis kyis pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gcig pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:245b-12: chu ni m'a ma k'i ste bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bdag nyid do //
T02TD1915E:245b-13: de ltar yang gsang chen thams cad rgyud las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:245b-14: bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi rnams la //
T02TD1915E:245b-15: shes rab pha rol phyin dge ba //
T02TD1915E:245b-16: chos bzhi gcig tu 'byung ba ni //
T02TD1915E:245b-17: rin chen rdo rje ma ru 'dod //
T02TD1915E:245b-19: 'dir yang m'a ma k'i la shes par bya ste m'a ma k'i dang rin chen rdo rje ma ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gcig pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:245b-20: de ni na bza' dkar mo ste /
T02TD1915E:245b-21: de kho na nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo'o //
T02TD1915E:245b-22: de ltar yang gsang chen thams cad rgyud las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:245b-23: gsang ba'i chos kyi theg chen la ;
T02TD1915E:245b-24: / de nyid pha rol phyin dge ba//
T02TD1915E:245b-25: pha rol phyin zhes 'byung ba ni //
T02TD1915E:245b-26: chos kyi rdo rje ma ru 'dod //
T02TD1915E:245b-28: 'dir yang na bza' dkar mo la shes par bya ste /
T02TD1915E:245b-29: na bza' dkar mo dang chos kyi rdo rje ma pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gcig pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:245b-30: rlung ni sgrol ma ste rdo rje pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD1915E:245b-31: de ltar yang gsang chen thams cad rgyud las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:245b-32: pha rol phyin bzhi rgyal mos te //
T02TD1915E:245b-33: rdo rje pha rol phyin pa dge / sbyor ba'i bcas la btags pa ni //
T02TD1915E:245b-34: las kyi rdo rje ma zhes 'dod //
T02TD1915E:245b-36: 'dir yang sgrol ma la shes par bya ste /
T02TD1915E:245b-37: sgrol ma dang las kyir do rje ma pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin cig pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:245b-38: chags pa lcags kyu kho na ste //
T02TD1915E:245b-39: zhes pa ni rig ma la sogs pa lnga'i sgo nas dbyer med pa'i thabs chen pos spyod yul 'dzin pa'i sems ni rdo rje lcags khyu ma'o //
T02TD1915E:245b-40: de ltar yang gsang chen thams cad rgyud las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:245b-41: 'dod kun la ni thabs che ba //
T02TD1915E:245b-42: rdo rje lcags kyu la 'dod do //
T02TD1915E:246a-2: zhes pa ni 'khrig pa'i 'dod chags la sred pa'i sgo nas ma yin pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:246a-3: byang chub kyi spyod pa'i sgo nas padma la gsang ba'i rdo rje bcug pa'i sems ni rdo rje zhags pa'o //
T02TD1915E:246a-4: de ltar yang gsang chen thams cad rgyud las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:246a-5: spyod pa byang chub tu spyod pa //
T02TD1915E:246a-6: rdo rje zhags pa zhes 'dod do //
T02TD1915E:246a-8: kha phrad pa ni sgrog yin par zhes pa ni rnal 'byor pa dang /
T02TD1915E:246a-9: rnal 'byor mas byang chub kyi spyod pa bsgoms pa las sems mi g-yo bar kha phrad pa ni rdo rje sgrog go //
T02TD1915E:246a-10: de ltar yang gsang chen thams cad rgyud las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:246a-11: gang zhig de la brten pa gang //
T02TD1915E:246a-14: sgra grag pa ni dril bur bshad //
T02TD1915E:246a-15: ces pa ni chos thams cad ni mi skye ba yin no zhes pa'i sngags kyi sgra brjod nas thabs dang shes rab rol pa ni rdo rje dril bu'o //
T02TD1915E:246a-17: aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharmm'a n'am a'adya nutpanna tv'ata /
T02TD1915E:246a-19: da ltar yang gsang chen thams cad rgyud las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:246a-20: chos thams cad ni ma skyes pa //
T02TD1915E:246a-21: nam mkha' dang mnyam gdod zhi pa //
T02TD1915E:246a-22: de ltar ngag ni smrar 'jug pa //
T02TD1915E:246a-23: rdo rje dril bu zhes 'dod do //
T02TD1915E:246a-25: spos ni dri chen zhes gsungs te //
T02TD1915E:246a-26: zhes pa ni gtsang ba dang mi gtsang ba rnam par mi rtog par mnyam pa nyid du 'gyur pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin spos yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:246a-27: de ltar yang gsang chen thams cad rgyud las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:246a-28: thams cad du ni mnyam pa'i mchog / shes rab pha rol phyin pa spos //
T02TD1915E:246a-30: me tog ra kta zhes 'dod de //
T02TD1915E:246a-31: zhes pa ni phyin ci log pa'i 'dod chags kyis ma g-yos pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin me tog yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:246a-32: de ltar yang gsang chen thams cad rgyud las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:246a-34: bsam gtan pha rol phyin me tog / ces so //
T02TD1915E:246a-35: mar me sha rnams kho na yin //
T02TD1915E:246a-36: zhes pa ni gtsang ba dang /
T02TD1915E:246a-37: mi gtsang ba'i sha rnams kun gyi rnam par rtog pa spangs pa la smon pa'i rang bzhin me yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:246a-38: de ltar yang gsang chen thams cad rgyud las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:246a-39: phyogs kun du ni gsal byed pa //
T02TD1915E:246a-40: smon lam pha rol phyin mar me //
T02TD1915E:246a-42: dri ni byang chub sems shes 'dod //
T02TD1915E:246a-43: ces pa ni lhag pa'i byang chub sems dring ba na yang thabs kyis dge ba'i bde bar gyur ba'i rang bzhin ni dri 'dod pa'o//
T02TD1915E:246b-0: @246b de ltar yang gsang chen thams cad rgyud las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:246b-1: dri nga ba yang dge ba'i bde //
T02TD1915E:246b-2: thabs kyi pha rol phyin pa'i dri //
T02TD1915E:246b-5: zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa 'bul ba'i sgo nas rnal 'byor ba'i dge ba'i rol ba'i rang bzhin ni sgeg mo yin pa'o //
T02TD1915E:246b-6: de ltar yang gsang chen thams cad rgyud las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:246b-7: ci phyir dge ba'i rol pa ni //
T02TD1915E:246b-8: sbyin ba'i pha rol phyin sgeg mo //
T02TD1915E:246b-10: phreng ba bha ga kho na yin //
T02TD1915E:246b-11: zhes pa ni dam tshig tshul dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor mas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thugs mnyes par byed pa'i rang bzhin ni phreng ba mar 'dod pa'o //
T02TD1915E:246b-12: de ltar yang gsang chen thams cad rgyud las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:246b-13: brgyan pa'i lus can yid 'phrog ma //
T02TD1915E:246b-14: tshul khrims pha rol phyin phreng ma //
T02TD1915E:246b-16: dbyangs ma dbugs su bstan ma dang //
T02TD1915E:246b-17: zhes pa ni thabs dang shes rab rol ba'i dus su sngags ched du brjod pa bzod pa'i rang bzhin ni dbyings ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:246b-18: de ltar yang gsang chen thams cad rgyud las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:246b-19: ched du brjod pas legs brjod pas //
T02TD1915E:246b-20: bzod pa'i pha rol phyin dbyangs ma //
T02TD1915E:246b-22: gar mkhan ma ni kha sbyor te //
T02TD1915E:246b-23: zhes pa ni sangs rgyas par bya ba'i don du gnyer pa'i rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor ma sbyor nas lha bsgom pa'i brtson 'grus kyi rang bzhin ni gar zhes 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:246b-24: de ltar yang gsang chen thams cad rgyud las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:246b-25: myur bar sangs rgyas nyid sbyin pa //
T02TD1915E:246b-26: brtson 'grus pha rol phyin gar mkhan //
T02TD1915E:246b-28: de lta bu'i lus kyi dkyil 'khor ni bha ga'i dkyil 'khor byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor las khyad par du gyur pa la ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bzang por gsungs zhes pa ste shin tu sbyor ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:246b-29: de rtogs pa ni bskal bzang yin //
T02TD1915E:246b-30: zhes pa ni lus kyi dkyil 'khor bzang po'i don de rtogs pa'i rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad gang yin pa de ni bskal bzang yin zhes pa ste /
T02TD1915E:246b-31: sngar sangs rgyas pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:246b-32: rtogs pa zhes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad do //
T02TD1915E:246b-33: de rnams byams pa la sogs zhes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad byams pa la sogs pa'i bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' brgyad bsgom mo zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
T02TD1915E:246b-35: kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa'i byams pa ste /
T02TD1915E:246b-36: de rnams byams pa'i sgo nas /
T02TD1915E:247a-2: nyon mongs pa'i yid ni 'jam dpal lo //
T02TD1915E:247a-3: yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni kun du bzang po'o //
T02TD1915E:247a-4: mig gi rnam par shes pa ni sa'i snying po'o //
T02TD1915E:247a-5: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni phyag na rdo rje'o //
T02TD1915E:247a-6: sna'i rnam par shes pa ni nam mkha'i snying po'o //
T02TD1915E:247a-7: lce'i rnam par shes pa ni 'jig rten dbang phyug go //
T02TD1915E:247a-8: lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni sgrib pa rnam par sel ba'o //
T02TD1915E:247a-9: de ltar nang gi bdag nyid gsungs //
T02TD1915E:247a-10: zhes pa ni de ltar nang gi lus kyi dkyil 'khor rnal 'byor pa dang /
T02TD1915E:247a-11: rnal 'byor mas bsgom pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
T02TD1915E:247a-12: dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum las gnyis ma bshad pa ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02TD1915E:247a-13: dkyil 'khor gzhan ni sngon bshad zin //
T02TD1915E:247a-14: zhes pa ste rtsa ba'i rgyud las bha ga'i dkyil 'khor dang /
T02TD1915E:247a-15: byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor rgyas par bshad zin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:247a-16: sbyin sreg so sor bya ba dang //
T02TD1915E:247a-18: sbyin sreg las ni bshad par bya //
T02TD1915E:247a-19: zhes pa la sogs ba ste de la sbyin sreg ces pa ni bshad zin to //
T02TD1915E:247a-20: de'i las zhes pa ni lus ngag gi las bya ba'i ngo bo'o //
T02TD1915E:247a-21: nyon cig ces pa ni lha mo sgrol ma la bod pa'i tshig go //
T02TD1915E:247a-22: sbyin sreg rnam pa bzhi zhes pa ni zhi ba dang /
T02TD1915E:247a-26: de la zhi ba ni gnod pa dang /
T02TD1915E:247a-31: longs spyod rgyas par byed cing 'phel bar byed do //
T02TD1915E:247a-32: dbang ni gzhan gyi sems bsgyur zhes rang gi ci 'dod pa bzhin du byar bcug pa'o //
T02TD1915E:247a-33: drag po ni gzhan la gnod cing phung par byed pa'o //
T02TD1915E:247a-34: de bzhin yang phyi nang du dbye ba gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:247a-35: sbyin sreg phyi dang nang gsungs te //
T02TD1915E:247a-36: zhes pa ste de la sbyin sreg phyi dang zhes pa ni phyi rol du hom khung brtsigs pa la sogs pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga'o //
T02TD1915E:247a-37: de ni rtsa ba'i rgyud las bstan zin pas na /
T02TD1915E:247a-38: phyi ni sngon du bstan pa yin //
T02TD1915E:247a-40: nang gi sbyin sreg gsungs pa nyon cig ces pa ni sogs pa ste //
T02TD1915E:247a-42: nyon cig khyod kyi nang gi ni //
T02TD1915E:247a-43: zhes pa ni kye lha mo sgrol ma nang gi sbyin sreg rgyas par bshad kyis nyon cig ces pa'i tha tshig go //
T02TD1915E:247a-45: lus kyi dbus su nye bar gnas //
T02TD1915E:247a-46: zhes pa ni gsang ba dang /
T02TD1915E:247a-49: mgrin pa dang bzhi la padma'i gdan re re bsgom pa'o //
T02TD1915E:247b-0: me dang zhes pa ni lte ba'i padma'i steng du ram las bskyed pa'i zur @247b gsum pa me'i dkyil 'khor dmar po'i dkyil du sa bon ram gyis mtshan pa bsgom mo //
T02TD1915E:247b-1: de bzhin rlung dang ni zhes pa ni gsang ba'i padma'i gdan la yam las bskyed pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor zla gam mdog sngon po'i dkyil du yi ge yam gis mtshan pa bsgom pa'o //
T02TD1915E:247b-2: dbang chen dang ni zhes pa ni snying ga'i padmar yi ge lam las skyes pa dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa mdog ser po dkyil du yi ge lam gyis mtshan pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1915E:247b-3: chu de bzhin zhes pa ni mgrin pa'i padmar yi ge bam las bskyed pa chu'i dkyil 'khor zlum po kha dog dkar ba dbus su yi ge bam gyis mtshan pa bsgom pa'o //
T02TD1915E:247b-4: de dag gi las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:247b-5: rlung gis me la 'bar bar byed //
T02TD1915E:247b-6: ces pa ste gsang ba'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor las me'i dkyil 'khor la 'bud pa'o //
T02TD1915E:247b-7: chu yis yongs su smin par byed //
T02TD1915E:247b-8: ces pa ni dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor gyi drod byung bas zas thams cad mgrin pa'i chu'i dkyil 'khor la smin par byed pa'o //
T02TD1915E:247b-9: de'i don kho na gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:247b-10: dbang chen dkyil 'khor las byung ba //
T02TD1915E:247b-12: dbang chen gyi drod ji ltar 'byung zhe na /
T02TD1915E:247b-13: gang du me ni bskyod pa'o //
T02TD1915E:247b-14: zhes pa ste me'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od kyis dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor la reg pa'o //
T02TD1915E:247b-15: de ltar dkyil 'khor gyi go rims su rgyud las ma bstan pa ni bla ma'i man ngag la brten par bya ba'i phyir dang /
T02TD1915E:247b-16: shes rab can gyi nga rgyal ba cag pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:247b-17: de dag gi yon tan gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:247b-18: ra yig ces pa la sogs pa ste go sla'o //
T02TD1915E:247b-20: gang zhig zas dang btung ba ni //
T02TD1915E:247b-21: zhes pa ni de la gang zhig zas dang zhes pa ni rnal 'byor pa'i zas gtsang ba dang mi gtsang ba thun mong du bzung ba'o //
T02TD1915E:247b-22: de la gtsang ba ni 'bras chan dang zho dang bu ram la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1915E:247b-23: 'jig rten pas gtsang bar brtags pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:247b-24: mi gtsang ba ni sha dgu dang bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1915E:247b-25: 'jig rten pas mi gtsang bar brtags pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:247b-27: chang dang 'o ma la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1915E:247b-28: de dag thams cad chu la ste //
T02TD1915E:247b-29: zhes pa ni zas dang btung ba de dag chu'i dkyil 'khor la sbyin sreg bya'o zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
T02TD1915E:247b-30: padmar ksha yig kha mar bltas //
T02TD1915E:247b-31: zhes pa ni mgrin pa'i padma'i steng gi chu'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na yi ge ksha mdog dkar ba kha thur du blta ba 'od zer mar 'bar ba kha gab kyi tshul du bsgom pa'o //
T02TD1915E:248a-1: dag kyang chu'i dkyil 'khor las mar babs te snying ga'i padmar btsud par bya'o //
T02TD1915E:248a-3: sbyin sreg de ji ltar bya ba yin zhe na phyi rol //
T02TD1915E:248a-4: kha sbyor tshul gyi sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1915E:248a-5: zhes pa ste phyi rol du thabs dang shes rab sbyor bas sbyin sreg bya ba'o //
T02TD1915E:248a-6: yang phyi rol gyi sbyin sreg la mngon par rtogs pa'i lha bsgom pa ji lta ba bzhin du //
T02TD1915E:248a-7: lus kyi dkyil 'khor la lha bsgom pa dang sbyar nas sbyin sreg bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD1915E:248a-8: gsang ba'i padmar 'gro ma thag / thal bar mtha' ru rnam par bstan //
T02TD1915E:248a-9: zhes pa ni sreg rdzas de dag gi bdud rtsis lus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshim ste snyigs ma tshig par bsgom par bya zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
T02TD1915E:248a-11: de rnams sbyin sreg bdag bshad pa //
T02TD1915E:248a-12: zhes pa la sogs pa ste de la bdag ces pa ni ston pa'o //
T02TD1915E:248a-14: zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhing khyad par can la mchod pa dang /
T02TD1915E:248a-15: bsam pa khyad par can du gyur pas tshe 'di kho na la chos mthong nas myong ba'i 'bras bur gyur pa'o //
T02TD1915E:248a-16: de ltar yang chos mngon ba mdzod las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:248a-17: zhing dang bsam pa'i khyad par las //
T02TD1915E:248a-18: mthong chos 'bras bu can gyi yin //
T02TD1915E:248a-20: gas pa med cing zhes pa nas sems can thams cad dga' bar smra //
T02TD1915E:248a-21: zhes pa'i bar ni go sla'o //
T02TD1915E:248a-22: mthong ba tsam gyis skul byed do //
T02TD1915E:248a-23: zhes pa ni rnal 'byor pa de sems can gzhan gyis mthong ba tsam gyis /
T02TD1915E:248a-24: 'jig rten pa thams cad chags par 'gyur ro zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
T02TD1915E:248a-25: de bzhin mchod pa'i cho ga yang //
T02TD1915E:248a-27: sbyin sreg las rnams bshad byas nas //
T02TD1915E:248a-28: zhes pa la sogs pa ste de la lha mo zhes pa ni sgrol ma la pod pa'i tshig go //
T02TD1915E:248a-29: mchod pa zhes pa ni nang gi mchod pa ste bkur sti bya ba'o //
T02TD1915E:248a-30: phreng zhes pa ni me tog gi phreng ba'o //
T02TD1915E:248a-31: sogs pa'i sgras ni mar me gzung bar bya'o //
T02TD1915E:248a-33: dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyor nas //
T02TD1915E:248a-34: zhes pa ni gsang ba'i mchod pa ste /
T02TD1915E:248a-35: thabs dang shes rab rol pa ste /
T02TD1915E:248a-36: mchod pa de dag gis gad du mchod ce na /
T02TD1915E:248a-37: bdag la mchod pa rnams ni bya //
T02TD1915E:248a-38: zhes pa ste rang gi lus kho na la mchod par bya zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
T02TD1915E:248a-39: ci'i phyir 'phags pa'i sku tshad mchod rten la sogs pa la mchod pa mi byed ce na gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:248a-40: bdag ni thams cad sangs rgyas nyid //
T02TD1915E:248b-0: ces pa ste rang gi @248b phung po lnga dang /
T02TD1915E:248b-1: skye mched la rigs lnga dang /
T02TD1915E:248b-2: byang chub sems dpa' nyid du bsgom pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:248b-3: sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas yin te //
T02TD1915E:248b-5: ji ltar mchod rten sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzhir 'gyur ba /
T02TD1915E:248b-6: de bzhin du dbang dang man ngag thob pa'i rnal 'byor ba'i lus la yang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas su gyur pa'o //
T02TD1915E:248b-7: de ltar yang rnam par snang mdzad sgyu 'phrul dra ba las kyang gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:248b-8: rdo rje slob dpon ni phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs nas mchod do zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1915E:248b-9: de ltar rdo rje slob dpon sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang mchod gnas su gyur pa ci'i phyir /
T02TD1915E:248b-10: de bas nan tan thams cad kyis //
