T02TD1915E:248b-11: rnal 'byor pas ni rtag tu mchod //
T02TD1915E:248b-13: de la thams cad ces pa ni /
T02TD1915E:248b-15: yang na dus thams cad do //
T02TD1915E:248b-16: nan tan zhes pa ni bdag nyid ltar bsgom pa la brtson pa'o //
T02TD1915E:248b-18: gang zhig 'ga' yang bya ba'i las //
T02TD1915E:248b-19: zhes pa ste ngag gis dbyangs len pa la sogs pa dang /
T02TD1915E:248b-20: lus kyis gang byed pa la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1915E:248b-21: rnal 'byor pa yis mchod par bsgom //
T02TD1915E:248b-22: zhes pa ni lus ngag gi las de dag rnal 'byor pas lus kyi dkyil 'khor la mchod par bsgoms na tshig 'tshal ba dang /
T02TD1915E:248b-23: dag 'khyal par mi 'gyur zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
T02TD1915E:248b-24: mchod pa bsgom pa bstan pa zas dang zhes pa la sogs pa ste de la /
T02TD1915E:248b-25: rig ma bzhi yis rnam brgyan pa'i //
T02TD1915E:248b-26: bdag ni lha nyid bsam par bya //
T02TD1915E:248b-28: 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i ngo bor gyur pa zas la sogs pa gang de rnams lha mo bzhi'i rang bzhin dang /
T02TD1915E:248b-29: rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin du bsgom mo //
T02TD1915E:248b-30: de ltar yang gsang ba 'dus pa las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:248b-31: yang na 'di la bsgom pa ni //
T02TD1915E:248b-32: rigs kyi bsgom par rnam par bsgom //
T02TD1915E:248b-35: sa'i rang bzhin du gyur pa'i zas rnams spyan mar bsgom pa dang /
T02TD1915E:248b-36: chu'i rang bzhin du gyur pa'i btung ba rnams m'a ma k'ir bsgom pa lta bu'o //
T02TD1915E:248b-37: da ni thugs kyi sgo nas chos ston pa de ltar bshad nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1915E:248b-38: de la de ltar bshad nas zhes pa ni le'u dang po la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa'i tshig dang po bzung nas le'u 'di la bdag nyid bsam par bya zhes pa'i bar du gsung gi sgo nas chos bstan pa'o //
T02TD1915E:248b-39: rdo rje zhes pa ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02TD1915E:249a-1: zhes pa sku dang gsung gi sgo nas /
T02TD1915E:249a-2: gong du chos ston pa po rdo rje sems dpa' gang de kho na bcom ldan 'das chos brjod du med pa'i don ston 'dod pas cang mi gsung bar dngos por bzhugs zhes pa ste /
T02TD1915E:249a-3: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni don dam par brjod du med pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:249a-4: 'o na bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis bstan pa ji ltar yin zhe na /
T02TD1915E:249a-6: thugs rje chen po'i dbang gis kun rdzob tu bstan par zad kyi don dam par ni bstan pa med do //
T02TD1915E:249a-7: de bas na mdo las kyang /
T02TD1915E:249a-8: bdag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du bdag gis chos bstan pa med pas zhes gsungs so //
T02TD1915E:249a-9: de ltar klu sgrub zhabs kyis kyang theg pa chen po nyi shu pa las gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:249a-10: tshig gis brjod du mi lang ba'i //
T02TD1915E:249a-11: chos rnams snying rjes gang gis bstan //
T02TD1915E:249a-12: sangs rgyas thogs med mkhyen pa yis //
T02TD1915E:249a-13: bsam med sgo de la phyag 'tshal //
T02TD1915E:249a-15: de ltar bcom ldan 'das gnyis su med pa'i ye shes mngon du gyur pa mthong ma thag 'khor gyis ci byed ce na gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:249a-16: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste de la rnam par mi rtog pa thob ste zhes pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi sgo nas 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa so so ma yin tha mi dad par mngon du gyur nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs par gyur to zhes te /
T02TD1915E:249a-17: chos nyid khong du chud pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:249a-18: gsung rab gzhan gyi gzhung na ni mngon par bstod do zhes 'byung ba la rgyud 'dir ni cang mi gsung bar gyur pa ni /
T02TD1915E:249a-21: sku gsung thugs kyi sgo nas bstan pa'i chos la thugs kyi sgo nas bstan pa'i chos gtso bar gyur pas /
T02TD1915E:249a-22: thugs kyi sgo nas bstan pa'i chos la gnyis su med pa'i shes rab kyis rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes mngon du gyur pas cang mi gsung bar gyur par shes par bya'o //
T02TD1915E:249a-23: lha mo bzhis zhes pa la sogs pa ni bshad zin to //
T02TD1915E:249a-25: zhes pa ni gsum gyi phyi ma'o //
T02TD1915E:249a-26: thams cad gsang ba'i zhes pa ni gsang ba'i rgyud rnams so//
T02TD1915E:249a-27: de rnams las yang dang yang du rab tu gyur pa'i rgyud 'di ni thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchog chen po zhes pa ste /
T02TD1915E:249a-28: chos kyi dbyings don 'ba' zhig gi sgo nas bstan pa'i phyir dang /
T02TD1915E:249a-29: thabs dang shes rab kyi don bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:249a-30: dam pa zhes pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyur gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:249b-0: @249b gsang chen zhes pa ni rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir dang /
T02TD1915E:249b-1: rdo rje sems dpas bstan pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i zhes pa ni mtshan gyi gtan tshigs 'dren pa'o //
T02TD1915E:249b-2: rgyud ces pa ni mgo mjug rab tu 'brel ba ste chos kyi dbyings 'phro ba la sogs pa'i don rgyud pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:249b-3: lha mo bzhis chos kyi dbyangs yongs su zhus pa ni lha mo rnams kyis sdud pa po byas pa yin la /
T02TD1915E:249b-4: phyag na rdo rje la sogs pas sdud pa bo byas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:249b-7: rgyud 'di ni shin tu gsang ba'i don yin pas gtsor byas pa rnal 'byor ma rnams la bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:249b-8: lha mo kho nas sdud pa po byas pa'o //
T02TD1915E:249b-9: rgyud kyi bstan pa'i gnas gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:249b-10: dpal au rgyan las byung ba zhes pa ste de la dpal zhes pa ni bsod nams kyi gzhir gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:249b-11: au dyan gyi yul zhes pa ni gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa'i don bya ba'i spyod pa byed pa rnams kyi yul lo //
T02TD1915E:249b-12: de bas ston pa po rnams kyis kyang gsang ba'i rgyud rnams der bstan la /
T02TD1915E:249b-13: bya rgod phung po'i ri la sogs pa rnams la ni bstan pa ma yin no //
T02TD1915E:249b-14: yul de las rnyed pa'i rgyud 'di ni dpal au dyan las byung ba zhes so //
T02TD1915E:249b-15: ston pa pos rgyud 'di yongs su gtad pa'i 'khor gsungs pa /
T02TD1915E:249b-16: rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i de kho na nyid ces pa ste /
T02TD1915E:249b-17: de la rnal 'byor ma zhes bya ba ni chos kyi dbyings rnam par bsgom la phung po dang lha sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD1915E:249b-18: de rnams kyi man ngag gi rgyus 'di 'gyur ba med pas na de kho na nyid nges so //
T02TD1915E:249b-19: rdzogs so zhes pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi don bshad pa'i rim par phye ba'i tshig mthar phyin pa'o //
T02TD1915E:249b-20: dpal ldan rgyud rgyal thams cad gsang mchog dam pa gsang chen rgyud //
T02TD1915E:249b-21: 'di yi rnam bshad bdag gis byas pas dge ba thob pa gang //
T02TD1915E:249b-22: de yis sems can thams cad chos dbyings mngon du gyur nas //
T02TD1915E:249b-23: bla med yang dag go 'phang dpal ldan rdo rje sems par shog / rgya gar gyi mkhan po rdo rje slob dpon smri ti dzny'a na k'i rtis mdzad pa lha mo bzhis yongs su zhus pa'i rnam par bshad pa man ngag rgyas pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so /
T02TD1915E:249b-25: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po rdo rje smri ti dzany'a na k'i rti nyid kyis bsgyur cing zhus te bshad nas gtan la phab pa'o /
